 dropitem MaxHealthBonus 1
 dropitem SauronGauntlets 1
 dropitem FloraRandomArmor

  +AVOIDMELEE
  DamageFactor "Crush", 2.4
  DamageFactor "Holy", 2 // Demons = +200% Holy Damage
  Painchance "Holy", 60 // Demons = +300% Pain Chance

  Painchance 20
  Painchance "GravityHP", 255
  Painchance "GravityMP", 255
  Painchance "GravityHPMP", 255 

 states
 {
  CheckMapSkillSpawn:
    TNT1 A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(872,0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 1 A_SetUserVar("user_checkmapskill",user_checkmapskill+1)
    Goto Spawn+2
  CheckMapSkillSee:
    TNT1 A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(872,0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 1 A_SetUserVar("user_checkmapskill",user_checkmapskill+1)
    Goto See+1
  Spawn:
    CYBR A 0 A_Look
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_checkmapskill < 1,"CheckMapSkillSpawn")
    CYBR AB 10 A_Look
    loop
  See:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_checkmapskill < 1,"CheckMapSkillSee")
    CYBR A 3 A_Hoof
    CYBR ABBCC 3 A_Chase
    CYBR D 3 A_Metal
    CYBR D 3 A_Chase
    loop

  Missile:
    CYBR E 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(user_HPCritRange, "StartShock1")
    CYBR E 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(user_HPLowRange, "StartShockCheck1")
  Attack1:
    CYBR E 6 A_FaceTarget
    CYBR F 12 A_CyberAttack // See Rocket
    CYBR E 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(user_HPCritRange, "StartShock2")
    CYBR E 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(user_HPLowRange, "StartShockCheck2")
  Attack2:
    CYBR E 12 A_FaceTarget
    CYBR F 12 A_CyberAttack // See Rocket
    CYBR E 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(user_HPCritRange, "StartShock3")
    CYBR E 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(user_HPLowRange, "StartShockCheck3")
  Attack3:
    CYBR E 12 A_FaceTarget
    CYBR F 12 A_CyberAttack // See Rocket
    goto See

  StartShockCheck1:
    CYBR E 0 A_Jump(192, "Attack1")
  StartShock1:
    CYBR E 6 A_FaceTarget
    CYBR F 0 A_SetUserVar("user_theta",0)
  Shock1:
    CYBR F 0 A_CustomMissile("Rocket",32,0,user_theta)
    CYBR F 0 A_SetUserVar("user_theta",user_theta+12)
    CYBR F 0 A_JumpIf(user_theta==360,"EndShock1")
    Loop
  EndShock1:
    CYBR F 12
    Goto Attack1+2

  StartShockCheck2:
    CYBR E 0 A_Jump(192, "Attack2")
  StartShock2:
    CYBR E 12 A_FaceTarget
    CYBR F 0 A_SetUserVar("user_theta",0)
  Shock2:
    CYBR F 0 A_CustomMissile("Rocket",32,0,user_theta)
    CYBR F 0 A_SetUserVar("user_theta",user_theta+12)
    CYBR F 0 A_JumpIf(user_theta==360,"EndShock2")
    Loop
  EndShock2:
    CYBR F 12
    Goto Attack2+2

  StartShockCheck3:
    CYBR E 0 A_Jump(192, "Attack3")
  StartShock3:
    CYBR E 12 A_FaceTarget
    CYBR F 0 A_SetUserVar("user_theta",0)
  Shock3:
    CYBR F 0 A_CustomMissile("Rocket",32,0,user_theta)
    CYBR F 0 A_SetUserVar("user_theta",user_theta+12)
    CYBR F 0 A_JumpIf(user_theta==360,"EndShock3")
    Loop
  EndShock3:
    CYBR F 12
    goto See

  Pain.GravityHP:
    TNT1 A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(871,0,0,0,0)
    Goto See
  Pain.GravityMP:
    TNT1 A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(871,0,1,0,0)
    Goto See
  Pain.GravityHPMP:
    TNT1 A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(871,0,2,0,0)
    Goto See
  Pain.Sceptre:
    TNT1 A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(862,0,14,0,0) // Increase EXP for Sceptre [1+(HP/300)]
    Goto Pain
  Death.Sceptre:
    TNT1 A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(862,0,14,0,0) // Increase EXP for Sceptre [1+(HP/300)]
    Goto Death
  Pain.Gauntlets:
    TNT1 A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(850,0,0,1,0) // Give some life when hurting a monster [1+(HP/500)]
    Goto Pain
  Death.Gauntlets:
    TNT1 A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(850,0,0,2,0) // Give some life when killing a monster [3+(HP/100)]
    Goto Death
  DeathCheck:
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(255, 3)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("TheOneRing",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0)
    
    TNT1 A 0 
    goto Death+1
  Death:
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(1, "DeathCheck")
    CYBR H 10
    CYBR I 10 A_Scream
    CYBR JKL 10
    CYBR M 10 A_NoBlocking
    CYBR NO 10
    CYBR P 30
    TNT1 A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(872,0,1,0,0)
    CYBR P -1 A_BossDeath
  Raise:
    CYBR ON 10 ACS_ExecuteAlways(872,0,0,0,0)
    CYBR M 10 ACS_ExecuteAlways(872,0,0,0,0)
    CYBR LKJ 10 ACS_ExecuteAlways(872,0,0,0,0)
    CYBR I 10 ACS_ExecuteAlways(872,0,0,0,0)
    CYBR H 10 ACS_ExecuteAlways(872,0,0,0,0)
    goto See
 }
}

    CYBR I 10 ACS_ExecuteAlways(872,0,0,0,0)
    CYBR H 10 ACS_ExecuteAlways(872,0,0,0,0)

 }
}

  dropitem MaxHealthBonus 1
  dropitem MaxHealthBonus 1
  dropitem MaxHealthBonus 1
  dropitem MaxHealthBonus 1
  dropitem MaxHealthBonus 1
  dropitem MaxHealthBonus 1
  dropitem SauronGauntlets 1
  dropitem FloraRandomArmor

  Obituary "The Cyber Annihilator blew %o away with its rockets."
  Health 8000 
  Radius 40 
  Height 110 
  Mass 1000 
  Speed 16 
  MONSTER
  +NOTARGET 
  +FLOORCLIP 
  +NORADIUSDMG 
  +BOSS 
  +MISSILEEVENMORE 
  +AVOIDMELEE
  SeeSound "monster/annsit" 
  PainSound "cyber/pain" 
  DeathSound "monster/anndth" 
  ActiveSound "cyber/active" 

  DamageFactor "Crush", 2.4
  DamageFactor "Holy", 2 // Demons = +200% Holy Damage
  Painchance "Holy", 30 // Demons = +300% Pain Chance

  Painchance 10
  Painchance "GravityHP", 255
  Painchance "GravityMP", 255
  Painchance "GravityHPMP", 255 

  States 
   {    
   Missile:
     ANNI E 0 A_Jump (128, "AttackCheck2")
     ANNI E 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(user_HPCritRange, "StartShock1")
     ANNI E 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(user_HPLowRange, "StartShockCheck1")
   Attack1:
     ANNI E 6 A_FaceTarget 
     ANNI F 0 Bright A_CustomMissile ("Rocket2",40,27,0)
     ANNI F 12 Bright A_CustomMissile ("Rocket2",40,-27,0)
     ANNI E 12 A_FaceTarget 
     ANNI F 0 Bright A_CustomMissile ("Rocket2",40,27,0)
     ANNI F 12 Bright A_CustomMissile ("Rocket2",40,-27,0) 
     ANNI E 12 A_FaceTarget 
     ANNI F 0 Bright A_CustomMissile ("Rocket2",40,27,0)
     ANNI F 12 Bright A_CustomMissile ("Rocket2",40,-27,0)
     ANNI E 0 A_Jump (128, "AttackCheck2")
     Goto See

   StartShockCheck1:
     ANNI E 0 A_Jump(192, "Attack1")
   StartShock1:
     ANNI E 6 bright A_FaceTarget
     ANNI F 0 bright A_SetUserVar("user_theta",0)
   Shock1:
     ANNI F 0 Bright A_CustomMissile("Rocket2",32,0,user_theta)
     ANNI F 0 Bright A_SetUserVar("user_theta",user_theta+6)
     ANNI F 0 Bright A_JumpIf(user_theta==360,"Shock1AB")
     Loop
   Shock1AB:
     ANNI F 12 bright
     ANNI E 12 A_FaceTarget
	 ANNI E 0 A_SetUserVar("user_theta",0)
   Shock1B:
     ANNI F 0 Bright A_CustomMissile("Rocket2",32,0,user_theta)
     ANNI F 0 Bright A_SetUserVar("user_theta",user_theta+6)
     ANNI F 0 Bright A_JumpIf(user_theta==360,"Shock1BC")
     Loop
   Shock1BC:
     ANNI F 12 bright
     ANNI E 12 A_FaceTarget
	 ANNI E 0 A_SetUserVar("user_theta",0)
   Shock1C:
     ANNI F 0 Bright A_CustomMissile("Rocket2",32,0,user_theta)
     ANNI F 0 Bright A_SetUserVar("user_theta",user_theta+6)
     ANNI F 0 Bright A_JumpIf(user_theta==360,"EndShock1")
     Loop
   EndShock1:
     ANNI F 12 Bright
     ANNI E 0 A_Jump (128, "AttackCheck2")
     Goto See

   AttackCheck2:
     ANNI E 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(user_HPCritRange, "StartShock2")
     ANNI E 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(user_HPLowRange, "StartShockCheck2")
   Attack2:
     ANNI E 6 A_FaceTarget 
     ANNI F 0 Bright A_CustomMissile ("HomRocket1",40,27,0)
     ANNI F 12 Bright A_CustomMissile ("HomRocket1",40,-27,0)
     ANNI E 12 A_FaceTarget 
     ANNI F 0 Bright A_CustomMissile ("HomRocket1",40,27,0)
     ANNI F 12 Bright A_CustomMissile ("HomRocket1",40,-27,0) 
     ANNI E 12 A_FaceTarget 
     ANNI F 0 Bright A_CustomMissile ("HomRocket1",40,27,0)
     ANNI F 12 Bright A_CustomMissile ("HomRocket1",40,-27,0)  
     Goto See 

   StartShockCheck2:
     ANNI E 0 A_Jump(192, "Attack2")
   StartShock2:
     ANNI E 6 bright A_FaceTarget
     ANNI F 0 bright A_SetUserVar("user_theta",0)
   Shock2:
     ANNI F 0 Bright A_CustomMissile("HomRocket1",32,0,user_theta)
     ANNI F 0 Bright A_SetUserVar("user_theta",user_theta+6)
     ANNI F 0 Bright A_JumpIf(user_theta==360,"Shock2AB")
     Loop
   Shock2AB:
     ANNI F 12 bright
     ANNI E 12 A_FaceTarget
	 ANNI E 0 A_SetUserVar("user_theta",0)
   Shock2B:
     ANNI F 0 Bright A_CustomMissile("HomRocket1",32,0,user_theta)
     ANNI F 0 Bright A_SetUserVar("user_theta",user_theta+6)
     ANNI F 0 Bright A_JumpIf(user_theta==360,"Shock2BC")
     Loop
   Shock2BC:
     ANNI F 12 bright
     ANNI E 12 A_FaceTarget
	 ANNI E 0 A_SetUserVar("user_theta",0)
   Shock2C:
     ANNI F 0 Bright A_CustomMissile("HomRocket1",32,0,user_theta)
     ANNI F 0 Bright A_SetUserVar("user_theta",user_theta+6)
     ANNI F 0 Bright A_JumpIf(user_theta==360,"EndShock2")
     Loop
   EndShock2:
     ANNI F 12 Bright
     Goto See

  ApplyDesperate:
    ANNI B 0 A_GiveInventory("20PercentDMGReduction",1)
    ANNI B 0 A_GiveInventory("20PercentDMGBonus",1)
    goto See+2
  CheckMapSkillSpawn:
    TNT1 A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(872,0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 1 A_SetUserVar("user_checkmapskill",user_checkmapskill+1)
    Goto Spawn+2
  CheckMapSkillSee:
    TNT1 A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(872,0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 1 A_SetUserVar("user_checkmapskill",user_checkmapskill+1)
    Goto See+2
  Spawn: 
    ANNI A 0 A_Look
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_checkmapskill < 1,"CheckMapSkillSpawn")
    ANNI AB 10 A_Look 
    Loop 
  See:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_checkmapskill < 1,"CheckMapSkillSee")
    ANNI A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(user_HPBuffRange, "ApplyDesperate")
    ANNI A 3 A_Playsound ("monster/anhoof")
    ANNI ABBCC 3 A_Chase 
    ANNI D 3 A_Playsound ("monster/anhoof") 
    ANNI D 3 A_Chase 
    Loop 

  Pain: 
    ANNI G 10 A_Pain 
    Goto See 
  Pain.GravityHP:
    TNT1 A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(871,0,0,0,0)
    Goto See
  Pain.GravityMP:
    TNT1 A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(871,0,1,0,0)
    Goto See
  Pain.GravityHPMP:
    TNT1 A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(871,0,2,0,0)
    Goto See
  Pain.Sceptre:
    TNT1 A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(862,0,27,0,0) // Increase EXP for Sceptre [1+(HP/300)]
    Goto Pain
  Death.Sceptre:
    TNT1 A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(862,0,27,0,0) // Increase EXP for Sceptre [1+(HP/300)]
    Goto Death
  Pain.Gauntlets:
    TNT1 A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(850,0,0,1,0) // Give some life when hurting a monster [1+(HP/500)]
    Goto Pain
  Death.Gauntlets:
    TNT1 A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(850,0,0,2,0) // Give some life when killing a monster [3+(HP/100)]
    Goto Death
  DeathCheck:
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(255, 3)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("TheOneRing",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 
    goto Death+1
  Death: 
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(1, "DeathCheck")
    ANNI H 10 Bright
    ANNI I 10 Bright A_Scream 
    ANNI JKL 10 Bright
    ANNI M 10 Bright A_NoBlocking 
    ANNI NO 10 Bright
    ANNI P 30 
    TNT1 A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(872,0,1,0,0)
    ANNI P -1 A_BossDeath 
  Raise:
    ANNI ONMLKJIH 10 Bright ACS_ExecuteAlways(872,0,0,0,0)
    goto See
   } 
}

actor Rocket2
{
  obituary "%o rode %k's rocket."
  radius 11
  height 8
  speed 20
  damage 20
  seesound "weapons/rocklf"
  deathsound "weapons/rocklx"
  PROJECTILE  
  +RANDOMIZE
  +ROCKETTRAIL
  // +THRUGHOST
  Decal Scorch
  states
  {
  Spawn:
    MISL A 1 bright
    loop
  Death:
    MISL B 0 bright A_SetTranslucent (0.67,1)
    MISL B 8 bright A_Explode
    MISL C 6 bright
    MISL D 4 bright
    stop
  }
}

ACTOR HomRocket1
{
   Radius 8
   Height 11
   Speed 30
   Damage 10
   PROJECTILE
   DeathSound "weapons/hrlexp"
   ExplosionDamage 64
   ExplosionRadius 96
   +SeekerMissile
   +Rockettrail
   // +THRUGHOST
   SeeSound "weapons/hrlfir"
   Decal Scorch
   States
   {
   Spawn:
      HMIS A 4 Bright A_SeekerMissile (25,35)
      HMIS A 4 Bright
      HMIS A 2 Bright A_SeekerMissile (10,25)
      HMIS A 2 Bright
      goto Spawn+2
   Death:
      BAL3 C 0 Bright A_SetTranslucent (0.67,1)
      BAL3 C 8 Bright A_Explode
      BAL3 DE 5 Bright
      stop
   }
}



ACTOR DiarisArrow : Ammo
{
  Scale 0.276
  Inventory.PickupMessage "Picked up 6 Diaris Arrows."
  Inventory.Amount 6
  Inventory.MaxAmount 99999
  Ammo.BackpackAmount 6
  Ammo.BackpackMaxAmount 99999
  Inventory.Icon "SHELA0"
  States
  {
   FloraNotDetected: // Bow will be removed
    TNT1 A 0 A_FadeOut(1.0)
    Loop
   Idle:
    TNT1 A 0
    TNT1 A 1 ACS_ExecuteAlways(860,0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(args[4] != 2,"FloraNotDetected")
    TNT1 A 1 ACS_ExecuteAlways(860,0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(args[4] != 2,"FloraNotDetected")
    TNT1 A 1 ACS_ExecuteAlways(860,0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(args[4] != 2,"FloraNotDetected")
  Spawn:
    ARSE A -1
    Stop
  }
}

ACTOR DiarisArrowQuiver : DiarisArrow
{
  Scale 0.276
  Inventory.PickupMessage "Picked up a quiver of 30 Diaris Arrows."
  Inventory.Amount 30
  Inventory.MaxAmount 99999
  Ammo.BackpackAmount 30
  Ammo.BackpackMaxAmount 99999
  Inventory.Icon "SHELA0"
  States
  {
   FloraNotDetected: // Bow will be removed
    TNT1 A 0 A_FadeOut(1.0)
    Loop
   Idle:
    TNT1 A 0
    TNT1 A 1 ACS_ExecuteAlways(860,0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(args[4] != 2,"FloraNotDetected")
    TNT1 A 1 ACS_ExecuteAlways(860,0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(args[4] != 2,"FloraNotDetected")
    TNT1 A 1 ACS_ExecuteAlways(860,0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(args[4] != 2,"FloraNotDetected")
  Spawn:
    ARQU A -1
    Stop
  }
}

  +INVENTORY.PICKUPFLASH

  states

   Spawn:
    MAN3 ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOP 4 Bright
    Loop
  }

//**********************************************
//***Doomspell Attacks For Deggaris & Illucia***

ACTOR RagingSpirit : HolySpirit
{
 SpawnID 255
 DamageType "Magic"
 +ACTIVATEIMPACT
 +ACTIVATEPCROSS
 +THRUGHOST
 +THRUSPECIES
 species "Players"
 MeleeDamage 2 // ((2 + random(0,2)) * random(1,8) * random(2,3)) // 4 to 96 damage per hit
 Health 2000
 Mass 2000
 
 CLEARFLAGS
 
 MONSTER
  + NOBLOCKMONST
  + FRIENDLY
  - SOLID
 States
 {
  Spawn:
   SPIR AB 4 A_Look
  See:
   SPIR AAAABBBBAAAABBBB 1 A_Chase
   SPIR A 0 A_Jump(64,1)
   Loop
   SPIR A 0 A_Die
  Melee:
   SPIR AAA 1
   SPIR A 1 A_CustomMeleeAttack(((2 + random(0,2)) * random(1,8) * random(2,3)),"SpiritAttack","SpiritAttack")
   SPIR BBB 1
   SPIR B 1 A_CustomMeleeAttack(((2 + random(0,2)) * random(1,8) * random(2,3)),"SpiritAttack","SpiritAttack")
   Goto See
 }
}


ACTOR RagingSpiritGA : RagingSpirit
{
 SpawnID 221
 Scale 1.25
 MeleeDamage 2 // (((2 + random(0,2)) * random(1,8) * random(2,3))*4) // 4 to 96 damage per hit
 States
 {
  Melee:
   SPIR AAA 1
   SPIR A 1 A_CustomMeleeAttack((((2 + random(0,2)) * random(1,8) * random(2,3))*4),"SpiritAttack","SpiritAttack")
   SPIR BBB 1
   SPIR B 1 A_CustomMeleeAttack((((2 + random(0,2)) * random(1,8) * random(2,3))*4),"SpiritAttack","SpiritAttack")
   Goto See
 }
}

ACTOR MinorFireBall : DoomImpBall
{
 SpawnID 254
 DamageType "Magic"
 DamageType "Fire"
 +ACTIVATEIMPACT
 +ACTIVATEPCROSS
 +THRUGHOST
 +THRUSPECIES
 species "Players"
 Radius 2
 Height 2
 Damage (48 + random(-12,12)) // 36-60 (24)
 Scale 0.75
 Speed 14

 States
 {
  Spawn: 
    BRB2 A 0 Bright 
    BRB2 A 3 Bright 
    BRB2 B 3 Bright 
    Goto Spawn+1
  Death: 
    BRB2 C 0 Bright A_SetScale(1.125)
    BRB2 C 3 Bright A_Explode((24 + random(-9,9)),28,0,14)
    BRB2 D 3 Bright 
    BRB2 E 3 Bright 
    BRB2 F 3 Bright 
    BRB2 G 3 Bright 
    BRB2 H 3 Bright 
    BRB2 I 3 Bright 
    Stop
 } 
}

ACTOR MinorFireBallGA : MinorFireBall
{
 SpawnID 220
 DamageType "Magic"
 DamageType "Fire"
 +ACTIVATEIMPACT
 +ACTIVATEPCROSS
 +THRUGHOST
 +THRUSPECIES
 species "Players"
 Radius 2
 Height 2
 Damage ((48 + random(-12,12))*4) // 144-240 (96)
 Scale 0.75
 Speed 14

 States
 {
  Spawn: 
    BRB2 A 0 Bright 
    BRB2 A 3 Bright 
    BRB2 B 3 Bright 
    Goto Spawn+1
  Death: 
    BRB2 C 0 Bright A_SetScale(1.125)
    BRB2 C 3 Bright A_Explode(((24 + random(-9,9))*4),28,0,14)
    BRB2 D 3 Bright 
    BRB2 E 3 Bright 
    BRB2 F 3 Bright 
    BRB2 G 3 Bright 
    BRB2 H 3 Bright

{
 DamageType "Magic"

 +THRUSPECIES

 species "Players"
 Speed 2.16
 Radius 1.5

 deathsound "null"

 FusedOut:

ACTOR SauronEyeWeak 202
{
 SpawnID 202
 health 5600
 radius 32
 height 32
 mass 50000000
 gravity 0.0
 obituary "%o was erased from life by one of Sauron's lesser 'eyes'."
 species "Sauron"
 painchance 255
 DamageFactor "Gauntlets", 5
 DamageFactor "Magic", 3.333
 RadiusDamageFactor 0.4
 var int user_attackpoint;
 var int user_MaxHP; var int user_HPLowRange; var int user_HPCritRange; var int user_HPBuffRange; var int user_HPXDeathRange;
 var int user_checkmapskill; // For checking if a monster has been given Skill/Map inventory items yet.
 
 seesound "SauronLaugh1"
 painsound "SauronEPain"
 deathsound "SauronEDeath"
 activesound "null"

 +AMBUSH
 +NOGRAVITY
 +SHOOTABLE
 +LOOKALLAROUND
 +NOTARGETSWITCH
 +INVISIBLE
 +NOBLOOD
 +DONTFALL
 +NOTARGET
 +NOFEAR
 +NOINFIGHTING
 +CANTSEEK
 +DONTMORPH
 +DONTSQUASH
 +NOTELEOTHER
 -ISMONSTER
 -COUNTKILL
 +FULLVOLACTIVE
 +FULLVOLDEATH
 +BOSS
 +THRUSPECIES

  DamageFactor "Holy", 3 // Sauron-Class = +300% Holy Damage
  Painchance "Holy", 255 // Sauron-Class = +600% Pain Chance

  Painchance 255
  Painchance "GravityHP", 255
  Painchance "GravityMP", 255
  Painchance "GravityHPMP", 255 


 States
 {
  CheckMapSkillSpawn:
    TNT1 A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(872,0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 1 A_SetUserVar("user_checkmapskill",user_checkmapskill+1)
    Goto Spawn+2
  CheckMapSkillSee:
    TNT1 A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(872,0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 1 A_SetUserVar("user_checkmapskill",user_checkmapskill+1)
    Goto See+1
  Spawn:
    SOUL A 0
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_checkmapskill < 1,"CheckMapSkillSpawn")
    SOUL A 1 A_Look
    loop
  See:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_checkmapskill < 1,"CheckMapSkillSee")
    SOUL A 0 A_Jump (256, "85sec", "8sec", "95sec", "9sec")
    SOUL A 1
    loop

  MissileHealthLow:
    SOUL A 0 A_FaceTarget
    SOUL A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_attackpoint",0)
  EyebeamHealthLow:
    SOUL A 0 A_FaceTarget
    SOUL A 0 A_CustomMissile("SauronEyePlasma",20,-30,0,8)
    SOUL A 0 A_CustomMissile("SauronEyePlasma",20,0,0,8)
    SOUL A 2 A_CustomMissile("SauronEyePlasma",20,30,0,8)
    SOUL G 0 A_SetUserVar("user_attackpoint",user_attackpoint+1)
    SOUL G 0 A_JumpIf(user_attackpoint==20,"EndEyeBeamHealthLow")
    Loop
  EndEyeBeamHealthLow:
    SOUL A 0 A_FaceTarget
    goto See+1
  Missile:
    SOUL A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(1400,"MissileHealthLow")
    SOUL A 0 A_FaceTarget
    SOUL A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_attackpoint",0)
  Eyebeam:
    SOUL A 0 A_FaceTarget
    SOUL A 2 A_CustomMissile("SauronEyePlasma",20)
    SOUL G 0 A_SetUserVar("user_attackpoint",user_attackpoint+1)
    SOUL G 0 A_JumpIf(user_attackpoint==20,"EndEyeBeam")
    Loop
  EndEyeBeam:
    SOUL A 0 A_FaceTarget
    goto See+1
  8sec:
    SOUL AAAAAAAA 35 A_FaceTarget
    goto Missile
  85sec:
    SOUL AAAAAAAA 35 A_FaceTarget
    SOUL A 17 A_FaceTarget
    goto Missile
  9sec:
    SOUL AAAAAAAAA 35 A_FaceTarget
    goto Missile
  95sec:
    SOUL AAAAAAAAA 35 A_FaceTarget
    SOUL A 17 A_FaceTarget
    goto Missile
  Pain:
    SOUL A 0 A_PlaySoundEx("SauronEPain",Voice,0,2)
    SOUL A 1 A_Jump (96, "Missile")
    goto See
  Death:
    SOUL A 0 ACS_Execute(813,0,0,0,0)
    SOUL A 0 A_StopSoundEx("Voice")
    SOUL A 0 A_StopSoundEx("Body")
    SOUL A 0 A_StopSoundEx("Auto")
    SOUL A 1 A_PlaySoundEx("SauronEDeath",Voice,0,2)
    Stop
 }
}

ACTOR SauronEyeStrong1 : SauronEyeWeak 203
{
 var int user_checkmapskill; // For checking if a monster has been given Skill/Map inventory items yet.
  var int user_MaxHP; var int user_HPLowRange; var int user_HPCritRange; var int user_HPBuffRange; var int user_HPXDeathRange;
 SpawnID 203
 health 9600
 DamageFactor "Gauntlets", 5
 DamageFactor "Magic", 3
 RadiusDamageFactor 0.35
 obituary "%o couldn't keep Sauron's left eye off of %h."

 DamageFactor "Holy", 3 // Sauron-Class = +300% Holy Damage
 Painchance "Holy", 255 // Sauron-Class = +600% Pain Chance

 Painchance 255
 Painchance "GravityHP", 255
 Painchance "GravityMP", 255
 Painchance "GravityHPMP", 255 

 states
 {
  MissileHealthLow:
    SOUL A 0 A_FaceTarget
    SOUL A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_attackpoint",0)
  EyebeamHealthLow:
    SOUL A 0 A_FaceTarget
    SOUL A 0 A_CustomMissile("SauronEyePlasma2",20,-30,0,8)
    SOUL A 0 A_CustomMissile("SauronEyePlasma2",20,0,0,8)
    SOUL A 2 A_CustomMissile("SauronEyePlasma2",20,30,0,8)
    SOUL G 0 A_SetUserVar("user_attackpoint",user_attackpoint+1)
    SOUL G 0 A_JumpIf(user_attackpoint==20,"EyeBeam1to2HealthLow")
    Loop
  Eyebeam1to2HealthLow:
    SOUL A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_attackpoint",0)
  Eyebeam2HealthLow:
    SOUL A 0 A_FaceTarget
    SOUL A 0 A_CustomMissile("SauronEyePlasma",10,-30,0,8)
    SOUL A 0 A_CustomMissile("SauronEyePlasma",10,0,0,8)
    SOUL A 2 A_CustomMissile("SauronEyePlasma",10,30,0,8)
    SOUL G 0 A_SetUserVar("user_attackpoint",user_attackpoint+1)
    SOUL G 0 A_JumpIf(user_attackpoint==10,"EndEyeBeamHealthLow")
    Loop
  EndEyeBeamHealthLow:
    SOUL A 0 A_FaceTarget
    goto See+1
  Missile:
    SOUL A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(2400,"MissileHealthLow")
    SOUL A 0 A_FaceTarget
    SOUL A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_attackpoint",0)
  Eyebeam:
    SOUL A 0 A_FaceTarget
    SOUL A 2 A_CustomMissile("SauronEyePlasma2",20)
    SOUL G 0 A_SetUserVar("user_attackpoint",user_attackpoint+1)
    SOUL G 0 A_JumpIf(user_attackpoint==20,"EyeBeam1to2")
    Loop
  Eyebeam1to2:
    SOUL A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_attackpoint",0)
  Eyebeam2:
    SOUL A 0 A_FaceTarget
    SOUL A 2 A_CustomMissile("SauronEyePlasma",10)
    SOUL G 0 A_SetUserVar("user_attackpoint",user_attackpoint+1)
    SOUL G 0 A_JumpIf(user_attackpoint==10,"EndEyeBeam")
    Loop
  EndEyeBeam:
    SOUL A 0 A_FaceTarget
    goto See+1

  8sec:
    SOUL AAAAAAAA 24 A_FaceTarget
    goto Missile
  85sec:
    SOUL AAAAAAAA 24 A_FaceTarget
    SOUL A 12 A_FaceTarget
    goto Missile
  9sec:
    SOUL AAAAAAAAA 24 A_FaceTarget
    goto Missile
  95sec:
    SOUL AAAAAAAAA 24 A_FaceTarget
    SOUL A 12 A_FaceTarget
    goto Missile
  Pain:
    SOUL A 0 A_PlaySoundEx("SauronEPain",Voice,0,2)
    SOUL A 1 A_Jump (144, "Missile")
    goto See
  Death:
    SOUL A 0 ACS_Execute(814,0,0,0,0)
    SOUL A 0 A_StopSoundEx("Voice")
    SOUL A 0 A_StopSoundEx("Body")
    SOUL A 0 A_StopSoundEx("Auto")
    SOUL A 1 A_PlaySoundEx("SauronEDeath",Voice,0,2)
    Stop
 }

ACTOR SauronEyeMain : SauronEyeWeak replaces BossBrain
{
 var int user_checkmapskill; // For checking if a monster has been given Skill/Map inventory items yet.
 var int user_attackpoint;
 var int user_MaxHP; var int user_HPLowRange; var int user_HPCritRange; var int user_HPBuffRange; var int user_HPXDeathRange;
 SpawnID 88
 health 28800
 mass 50000000
 species "Sauron"
 DamageFactor "Gauntlets", 5
 DamageFactor "Magic", 2.666
 RadiusDamageFactor 0.30
 obituary "%o bowed to the might of Sauron's ultimate eye of power."

 DamageFactor "Holy", 3 // Sauron-Class = +300% Holy Damage
 Painchance "Holy", 255 // Sauron-Class = +600% Pain Chance

 Painchance 255
 Painchance "GravityHP", 255
 Painchance "GravityMP", 255
 Painchance "GravityHPMP", 255 

 +AMBUSH
 +NOGRAVITY
 +SHOOTABLE
 +LOOKALLAROUND
 +NOTARGETSWITCH
 +INVISIBLE
 +NOBLOOD
 +DONTFALL
 +NOTARGET
 +NOFEAR
 +NOINFIGHTING
 +CANTSEEK
 +DONTMORPH
 +DONTSQUASH
 +NOTELEOTHER
 -ISMONSTER
 -COUNTKILL
 +FULLVOLACTIVE
 +FULLVOLDEATH
 +BOSS
 +THRUSPECIES

 States
 {
  CheckMapSkillSpawn:
    TNT1 A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(872,0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 1 A_SetUserVar("user_checkmapskill",user_checkmapskill+1)
    Goto Spawn+2
  CheckMapSkillSee:
    TNT1 A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(872,0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 1 A_SetUserVar("user_checkmapskill",user_checkmapskill+1)
    Goto See+1
  Spawn:
    SOUL A 0
    // TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_checkmapskill < 1,"CheckMapSkillSpawn")
    SOUL A 0 Thing_ChangeTID(0,1123)
    SOUL A 0 Thing_SetTranslation(1123,16)
    SOUL A 0 Thing_ChangeTID(1123,1123)
    SOUL A 1 A_Look
    loop
  See:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_checkmapskill < 1,"CheckMapSkillSee")
    SOUL A 0 ACS_Execute(823,0,0,0,0)
    SOUL A 0 A_Jump (256, "85sec", "8sec", "95sec", "9sec")
    SOUL A 1
    loop

  MissileHealthLow:
    SOUL A 0 A_FaceTarget
    SOUL A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_attackpoint",0)
  EyebeamHealthLow:
    SOUL A 0 A_FaceTarget
    SOUL A 0 A_CustomMissile("SauronEyePlasma3",20,-30,0,8)
    SOUL A 0 A_CustomMissile("SauronEyePlasma3",20,0,0,8)
    SOUL A 2 A_CustomMissile("SauronEyePlasma3",20,30,0,8)
    SOUL G 0 A_SetUserVar("user_attackpoint",user_attackpoint+1)
    SOUL G 0 A_JumpIf(user_attackpoint==24,"EyeBeam1to2HealthLow")
    Loop
  Eyebeam1to2HealthLow:
    SOUL A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_attackpoint",0)
  Eyebeam2HealthLow:
    SOUL A 0 A_FaceTarget
    SOUL A 0 A_CustomMissile("SauronEyePlasma2",20,-30,0,8)
    SOUL A 0 A_CustomMissile("SauronEyePlasma2",20,0,0,8)
    SOUL A 2 A_CustomMissile("SauronEyePlasma2",20,30,0,8)
    SOUL G 0 A_SetUserVar("user_attackpoint",user_attackpoint+1)
    SOUL G 0 A_JumpIf(user_attackpoint==12,"EyeBeam2to3HealthLow")
    Loop
  Eyebeam2to3HealthLow:
    SOUL A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_attackpoint",0)
  Eyebeam3HealthLow:
    SOUL A 0 A_FaceTarget
    SOUL A 0 A_CustomMissile("SauronEyePlasma",20,-30,0,8)
    SOUL A 0 A_CustomMissile("SauronEyePlasma",20,0,0,8)
    SOUL A 2 A_CustomMissile("SauronEyePlasma",20,30,0,8)
    SOUL G 0 A_SetUserVar("user_attackpoint",user_attackpoint+1)
    SOUL G 0 A_JumpIf(user_attackpoint==6,"EndEyeBeamHealthLow")
    Loop
  EndEyeBeamHealthLow:
    SOUL A 0 A_FaceTarget
    goto See+1
  Missile:
    SOUL A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(7200,"MissileHealthLow")
    SOUL A 0 A_FaceTarget
    SOUL A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_attackpoint",0)
  Eyebeam:
    SOUL A 0 A_FaceTarget
    SOUL A 2 A_CustomMissile("SauronEyePlasma3",20)
    SOUL G 0 A_SetUserVar("user_attackpoint",user_attackpoint+1)
    SOUL G 0 A_JumpIf(user_attackpoint==20,"EyeBeam1to2")
    Loop
  Eyebeam1to2:
    SOUL A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_attackpoint",0)
  Eyebeam2:
    SOUL A 0 A_FaceTarget
    SOUL A 2 A_CustomMissile("SauronEyePlasma2",10)
    SOUL G 0 A_SetUserVar("user_attackpoint",user_attackpoint+1)
    SOUL G 0 A_JumpIf(user_attackpoint==10,"EyeBeam2to3")
    Loop
  Eyebeam2to3:
    SOUL A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_attackpoint",0)
  Eyebeam3:
    SOUL A 0 A_FaceTarget
    SOUL A 2 A_CustomMissile("SauronEyePlasma",10)
    SOUL G 0 A_SetUserVar("user_attackpoint",user_attackpoint+1)
    SOUL G 0 A_JumpIf(user_attackpoint==5,"EndEyeBeam")
    Loop
  EndEyeBeam:
    SOUL A 0 A_FaceTarget
    goto See+4
  8sec:
    SOUL AAAAAAAA 12 A_FaceTarget
    goto Missile
  85sec:
    SOUL AAAAAAAA 12 A_FaceTarget
    SOUL A 6 A_FaceTarget
    goto Missile
  9sec:
    SOUL AAAAAAAAA 12 A_FaceTarget
    goto Missile
  95sec:
    SOUL AAAAAAAAA 12 A_FaceTarget
    SOUL A 6 A_FaceTarget
    goto Missile

  Pain:
    SOUL A 0 A_PlaySoundEx("SauronEPain",Voice,0,2)
    SOUL A 1 A_Jump (208, "Missile")
    goto See+4
  Death:
    SOUL A 0 ACS_Execute(816,0,0,0,0)
    SOUL A 0 A_StopSoundEx("Voice")
    SOUL A 0 A_StopSoundEx("Body")
    SOUL A 0 A_StopSoundEx("Auto")
    SOUL A 100 A_PlaySoundEx("SauronEDeath",Voice,0,2)
    SOUL AA 15
    SOUL A 0 ACS_Execute(811,0,0,0,0)
    Stop
 }
}

// Sauron makes one final effort to kill your ass with a Cyberdemon-like avatar. [DVI-DS]
ACTOR Sauravatar : Cyberdemon 201
{
 SpawnID 201
 mass 50000000
 species "Sauron"
 + DROPOFF
 + FLOORHUGGER
 + NOBLOCKMONST
 // - MISSILEMORE
 + MISSILEEVENMORE
 + NOTARGETSWITCH
 + NOINFIGHTING
 + NOTARGET
 + NOTELEFRAG
 + NOTIMEFREEZE
 + SHADOW
 + LOOKALLAROUND
 Scale 0.75
 radius 29
 height 77
 RadiusDamageFactor 0.25
 var int user_MaxHP; var int user_HPLowRange; var int user_HPCritRange; var int user_HPBuffRange; var int user_HPXDeathRange;
 var int user_healthset;
 var int user_healthmoderaterange;
 var int user_healthlowrange;
 var int user_checkmapskill; // For checking if a monster has been given Skill/Map inventory items yet.
 translation "64:79=88:103", "48:63=103:88", "144:151=88:103", "32:47=224:231", "168:191=224:231", "224:231=[255, 255, 255]:[128, 255, 128]", "208:223=112:127"

 health 162000 // His BASE health, but not his actual maximum.
 obituary "%o was obliterated by an avatar of the Almighty Sauron."
 mass 76000
 speed 32
 seesound "SauronSight"
 painsound "null"
 deathsound "SauronDeath"
 activesound "null"

 DamageFactor "Gauntlets", 5
 DamageFactor "Magic", 2.333
 DamageFactor "Crush", 2.8
 DamageFactor "Holy", 3 // Sauron-Class = +300% Holy Damage
 Painchance "Holy", 30 // Sauron-Class = +600% Pain Chance

 Painchance 5
 painchance "Gauntlets", 255
 Painchance "GravityHP", 255
 Painchance "GravityMP", 255
 Painchance "GravityHPMP", 255 

 States
 {
  CheckMapSkillSpawn:
    TNT1 A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(872,0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 1 A_SetUserVar("user_checkmapskill",user_checkmapskill+1)
    Goto Spawn+2
  CheckMapSkillSee:
    TNT1 A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(872,0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 1 A_SetUserVar("user_checkmapskill",user_checkmapskill+1)
    Goto See+1
  Spawn:
    CYBS A 0
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_checkmapskill < 1,"CheckMapSkillSpawn")
    CYBS A 0 Thing_ChangeTID(0,1124)
    CYBS A 0 Thing_SetTranslation(1124,16)
    CYBS A 0 Thing_ChangeTID(1124,1124)
    CYBS A 0 ACS_Execute(821,0,0,0,0)
    goto Idle
  Idle:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_checkmapskill < 1,"CheckMapSkillSpawn")
    CYBR A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(822,0,1,0,0)
    CYBR A 3 A_Look
    CYBR B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(822,0,1,0,0)
    CYBR B 3 A_Look
    loop  

  Chatter1:
    CYBR A 0 A_PlaysoundEx("SauronActive1","Voice",0,1)
    goto See+9
  Chatter2:
    CYBR A 0 A_PlaysoundEx("SauronActive2","Voice",0,1)
    goto See+9
  Chatter3:
    CYBR A 0 A_PlaysoundEx("SauronActive3","Voice",0,1)
    goto See+9
  Chatter4:
    CYBR A 0 A_PlaysoundEx("SauronActive4","Voice",0,1)
    goto See+9
  Hoof1:
    CYBR A 0 A_Quake(4.7,14,0,960,"SauronStomp1")
    CYBR A 0 A_PlaysoundEx("SauronStomp1","Body",0,1)
    goto See+1  
  Hoof2:
    CYBR A 0 A_Quake(4.9,15,0,1024,"SauronStomp2")
    CYBR A 0 A_PlaysoundEx("SauronStomp2","Body",0,1)
    goto See+1  
  Hoof3:
    CYBR A 0 A_Quake(5.3,17,0,1152,"SauronStomp3")
    CYBR A 0 A_PlaysoundEx("SauronStomp3","Body",0,1)
    goto See+1  
  Hoof4:
    CYBR A 0 A_Quake(5.1,16,0,1088,"SauronStomp4")
    CYBR A 0 A_PlaysoundEx("SauronStomp4","Body",0,1)
    goto See+1  
  See:
    CYBR A 0 A_Jump (256, "Hoof1", "Hoof2", "Hoof3", "Hoof4")
    CYBR A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(822,0,0,0,0)
    CYBR A 3 A_Chase
    CYBR A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(822,0,0,0,0)
    CYBR A 3 A_Chase
    CYBR B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(822,0,0,0,0)
    CYBR B 3 A_Chase
    CYBR B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(822,0,0,0,0)
    CYBR B 3 A_Chase("","Missile", CHF_FASTCHASE)
    CYBR C 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(822,0,0,0,0)
    CYBR C 3 A_Chase
    CYBR C 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(822,0,0,0,0)
    CYBR C 3 A_Chase
    CYBR D 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(822,0,0,0,0)
    CYBR D 3 A_Chase
    CYBR D 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(822,0,0,0,0)
    CYBR D 3 A_Chase("","Missile", CHF_FASTCHASE)
    CYBR D 0 A_Jump (32, "Chatter1", "Chatter2", "Chatter3", "Chatter4")
    loop
  MissileHealthLow:
    CYBR E 4 A_FaceTarget
    CYBR F 0 A_PlaySound ("weapons/bfgf")
    CYBR F 0 A_CustomMissile("SauronBFGBall3",45,0,45)
    CYBR F 0 A_CustomMissile("SauronBFGBall3",45,0,0)
    CYBR F 9 A_CustomMissile("SauronBFGBall3",45,0,-45)
    CYBR E 9 A_FaceTarget
    CYBR F 0 A_PlaySound ("weapons/bfgf")
    CYBR F 0 A_CustomMissile("SauronBFGBall3",45,0,30)
    CYBR F 0 A_CustomMissile("SauronBFGBall3",45,0,0)
    CYBR F 9 A_CustomMissile("SauronBFGBall3",45,0,-30)
    CYBR E 9 A_FaceTarget
    CYBR F 0 A_PlaySound ("weapons/bfgf")
    CYBR F 0 A_CustomMissile("SauronBFGBall3",45,0,60)
    CYBR F 0 A_CustomMissile("SauronBFGBall3",45,0,0)
    CYBR F 9 A_CustomMissile("SauronBFGBall3",45,0,-60)
    goto See
  MissileHealthMod:
    CYBR E 5 A_FaceTarget
    CYBR F 0 A_PlaySound ("weapons/bfgf")
    CYBR F 0 A_CustomMissile("SauronBFGBall2",45,0,22.5)
    CYBR F 11 A_CustomMissile("SauronBFGBall2",45,0,0)
    CYBR E 11 A_FaceTarget
    CYBR F 0 A_PlaySound ("weapons/bfgf")
    CYBR F 0 A_CustomMissile("SauronBFGBall2",45,0,0)
    CYBR F 11 A_CustomMissile("SauronBFGBall2",45,0,-22.5)
    CYBR E 11 A_FaceTarget
    CYBR F 0 A_PlaySound ("weapons/bfgf")
    CYBR F 0 A_CustomMissile("SauronBFGBall2",45,0,11.25)
    CYBR F 11 A_CustomMissile("SauronBFGBall2",45,0,-11.25)
    goto See
  Missile:
    CYBR A 0 A_JumpIf(Args[0] >= 2,"MissileHealthLow")
    CYBR A 0 A_JumpIf(Args[0] == 1,"MissileHealthMod")
    CYBR E 6 A_FaceTarget
    CYBR F 0 A_PlaySound ("weapons/bfgf")
    CYBR F 12 A_CustomMissile("SauronBFGBall",45,0,0)
    CYBR E 12 A_FaceTarget
    CYBR F 0 A_PlaySound ("weapons/bfgf")
    CYBR F 12 A_CustomMissile("SauronBFGBall",45,0,0)
    CYBR E 12 A_FaceTarget
    CYBR F 0 A_PlaySound ("weapons/bfgf")
    CYBR F 12 A_CustomMissile("SauronBFGBall",45,0,0)
    goto See
  PainS1:
    CYBR A 0 A_PlaysoundEx("SauronPain1","Body",0,1)
    goto Pain+1
  PainS2:
    CYBR A 0 A_PlaysoundEx("SauronPain2","Body",0,1)
    goto Pain+1
  PainS3:
    CYBR A 0 A_PlaysoundEx("SauronPain3","Body",0,1)
    goto Pain+1
  PainS4:
    CYBR A 0 A_PlaysoundEx("SauronPain4","Body",0,1)
   goto Pain+1

    goto See

  Pain.GravityHP:

    Goto See

    Goto See
  Pain.Sceptre:
    TNT1 A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(862,0,541,0,0) // Increase EXP for Sceptre [1+(HP/300)]
    Goto Pain
  Death.Sceptre:
    TNT1 A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(862,0,541,0,0) // Increase EXP for Sceptre [1+(HP/300)]
    Goto Death
  Pain.Gauntlets:
    CYBR A 0 A_Jump (256, "PainGS1", "PainGS2", "PainGS3", "PainGS4")
    TNT1 A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(850,0,0,1,0) // Give some life when hurting a monster [1+(HP/500)]
    CYBR G 0 A_SetReflectiveInvulnerable
    CYBR G 0 A_UnSetShootable
    CYBR G 10 A_SetTranslucent (0.50, 0)
    CYBR G 10 A_SetTranslucent (0.33, 0)
    CYBR G 10 A_SetTranslucent (0.50, 0)
    CYBR G 10 A_SetTranslucent (0.33, 0)
    CYBR G 10 A_SetTranslucent (0.50, 0)
    CYBR G 10 A_SetTranslucent (0.33, 0)
    CYBR G 10 A_SetTranslucent (0.50, 0)
    CYBR G 10 A_SetTranslucent (0.33, 0)
    CYBR A 0 A_JumpIf(Args[0] >= 2,"PainCounterHealthLow")
    CYBR A 0 A_JumpIf(Args[0] == 1,"PainCounterHealthMod")
    CYBR A 0 A_JumpIf(Args[0] <= 0,"PainCounter")
    CYBR G 0 A_SetTranslucent (1.0, 0)
    CYBR G 0 A_SetShootable
    CYBR G 0 A_UnSetReflectiveInvulnerable
    goto See
  Death.Gauntlets:
    TNT1 A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(850,0,0,2,0) // Give some life when killing a monster [3+(HP/100)]
    Goto Death
  Death:
    CYBR H 5 A_SetTranslucent (0.9775, 0)
    CYBR H 5 A_SetTranslucent (0.955, 0)
    CYBR I 0 ACS_Execute(817,0,0,0,0)
    CYBR I 0 A_PlaysoundEx("SauronDeath","Body",0,2)
    CYBR I 5 A_SetTranslucent (0.9325, 0)
    CYBR I 5 A_SetTranslucent (0.91, 0)
    CYBR J 5 A_SetTranslucent (0.8875, 0)
    CYBR J 5 A_SetTranslucent (0.865, 0)
    CYBR K 5 A_SetTranslucent (0.8425, 0)
    CYBR K 5 A_SetTranslucent (0.82, 0)
    CYBR L 5 A_SetTranslucent (0.7975, 0)
    CYBR L 5 A_SetTranslucent (0.775, 0)
    CYBR M 0 A_NoBlocking
    CYBR M 5 A_SetTranslucent (0.7525, 0)
    CYBR M 5 A_SetTranslucent (0.73, 0)
    CYBR N 5 A_SetTranslucent (0.7075, 0)
    CYBR N 5 A_SetTranslucent (0.685, 0)
    CYBR O 5 A_SetTranslucent (0.6625, 0)
    CYBR O 5 A_SetTranslucent (0.64, 0)
    CYBR P 5 A_SetTranslucent (0.6175, 0)
    CYBR P 5 A_SetTranslucent (0.595, 0)
    CYBR P 5 A_SetTranslucent (0.5725, 0)
    CYBR P 5 A_SetTranslucent (0.55, 0)
    CYBR P 5 A_SetTranslucent (0.5275, 0)
    CYBR P 5 A_SetTranslucent (0.505, 0)
    CYBR P 5 A_SetTranslucent (0.4825, 0)
    CYBR P 5 A_SetTranslucent (0.46, 0)
    CYBR P 5 A_SetTranslucent (0.4375, 0)
    CYBR P 5 A_SetTranslucent (0.415, 0)
    CYBR P 5 A_SetTranslucent (0.3925, 0)
    CYBR P 5 A_SetTranslucent (0.37, 0)
    CYBR P 5 A_SetTranslucent (0.3475, 0)
    CYBR P 5 A_SetTranslucent (0.325, 0)
    CYBR P 5 A_SetTranslucent (0.3025, 0)
    CYBR P 5 A_SetTranslucent (0.28, 0)
    CYBR P 5 A_SetTranslucent (0.2575, 0)
    CYBR P 5 A_SetTranslucent (0.235, 0)
    CYBR P 5 A_SetTranslucent (0.2125, 0)
    CYBR P 5 A_SetTranslucent (0.19, 0)
    CYBR P 5 A_SetTranslucent (0.1675, 0)
    CYBR P 5 A_SetTranslucent (0.145, 0)
    CYBR P 5 A_SetTranslucent (0.1225, 0)
    CYBR P 5 A_SetTranslucent (0.10, 0)
    CYBR P 5 A_SetTranslucent (0.0775, 0)
    CYBR P 5 A_SetTranslucent (0.055, 0)
    CYBR P 0 A_PlaysoundEx("SauronDeathS","Voice",0,2)
    CYBR P 5 A_SetTranslucent (0.0325, 0)
    CYBR P 5 A_SetTranslucent (0.01, 0)
    CYBR P 875
	// 1095 total time
    TNT1 A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(872,0,1,0,0)
    CYBR P -1 A_BrainDie
 }
}

// Sauravatar "Still"
ACTOR SauravatarStill : Sauravatar
{
 mass 50000000
 species "Sauron"
 -SHOOTABLE
 -ISMONSTER
 States
 {
  Spawn:
    CYBS A 0
    CYBS A 0 Thing_ChangeTID(0,1124)
    CYBS A 0 Thing_SetTranslation(1124,16)
    CYBS A 0 Thing_ChangeTID(1124,1124)
    goto Idle
  Idle:
    CYBR A 35
    CYBR B 35
    CYBR C 35
    CYBR D 35
    loop  
 }
}

ACTOR FWolfSS : WolfensteinSS
{
 var int user_theta;
 + FRIENDLY
 + NOBLOCKMONST
 + DROPOFF
 + FLOORHUGGER
 - COUNTKILL

 States
 {
  Spawn:
   SSWV A 0
   POSS A 0 Thing_ChangeTID(0,1011)
   SSWV A 0 Thing_SetTranslation(1011,13)
   POSS A 0 Thing_ChangeTID(1011,1000)
   SSWV A 10 A_Look
   SSWV B 10 A_Look
   Goto Spawn+2
  Missile:
    SSWV EF 10 A_FaceTarget
  Missile2:
    SSWV F 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(2, "StartShock1")
    SSWV F 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(26, "StartShockCheck1")
  Missile3:
    SSWV G 4 bright A_CPosAttack
    SSWV F 6 A_FaceTarget
  Missile4:
    SSWV F 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(2, "StartShock2")
    SSWV F 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(26, "StartShockCheck2")
  Missile5:
    SSWV G 4 bright A_CPosAttack
    SSWV F 1 A_CPosRefire
    goto Missile2
  StartShockCheck1:
    SSWV F 0 A_Jump(192, "Missile3")
  StartShock1:
    SSWV G 0 A_SetUserVar("user_theta",0)
  Shock1:
    SSWV G 0 A_SetAngle(12 + angle)
    SSWV G 0 A_CustomBulletAttack (22.5, 0, 1, random(1,5) * 3, "BulletPuff", 0, 1) // A_PosAttack
    SSWV G 0 A_PlaySound("shotguy/attack")
    SSWV G 0 A_SetUserVar("user_theta",user_theta+1)
    SSWV G 0 A_JumpIf(user_theta==30,"EndShock1")
    Loop
  EndShock1:
    SSWV G 4 bright
    SSWV F 6 A_FaceTarget
    Goto Missile4
  StartShockCheck2:
    SSWV F 0 A_Jump(192, "Missile5")
  StartShock2:
    SSWV G 0 A_SetUserVar("user_theta",0)
  Shock2:
    SSWV G 0 A_SetAngle(12 + angle)
    SSWV G 0 A_CustomBulletAttack (22.5, 0, 1, random(1,5) * 3, "BulletPuff", 0, 1) // A_PosAttack
    SSWV G 0 A_PlaySound("shotguy/attack")
    SSWV G 0 A_SetUserVar("user_theta",user_theta+1)
    SSWV G 0 A_JumpIf(user_theta==30,"EndShock2")
    Loop
  EndShock2:
    SSWV G 4 bright A_CPosAttack
    SSWV F 1 A_CPosRefire
    goto Missile2

  Pain.Gauntlets:
    TNT1 A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(850,0,1,0,0) // Give some life when killing a monster
    Goto Pain
  Death.Gauntlets:
    TNT1 A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(850,0,3,0,0) // Give some life when killing a monster
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(-50,"XDeath")
   Goto Death
 }
}

ACTOR FLostSoul : LostSoul
{
 + FRIENDLY
 + NOBLOCKMONST
 - COUNTKILL
 damage 3
 meleerange 160

 states
 {
  Spawn:
   SKUL A 0
   SKUL A 0 Thing_ChangeTID(0,1011)
   SKUL A 0 Thing_SetTranslation(1011,6)
   SKUL A 0 Thing_ChangeTID(1011,1000)
   SKUL A 10 A_Look
   SKUL B 10 A_Look
   Goto Spawn+2
  Aggressor:
    SKUL A 0 A_ChangeFlag("MISSILEEVENMORE", 1)
    SKUL A 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOFEAR", 1)
    SKUL A 0 A_ChangeFlag("CANTSEEK", 1)
    SKUL A 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOINFIGHTING", 1)
    SKUL A 0 A_ChangeFlag("THRUSPECIES", 1)
    SKUL A 0 A_ChangeFlag("DONTHARMSPECIES", 1)
    SKUL A 0 A_ChangeFlag("NORADIUSDMG", 1)
    goto See+1  
  Aggressor2:
    SKUL A 0 A_ChangeFlag("NOPAIN", 1)
    SKUL A 0 A_ChangeFlag("VISIBILITYPULSE", 1)
    SKUL A 0 A_ChangeFlag("REFLECTIVE", 1)
    SKUL A 0 A_ChangeFlag("DEFLECT", 1)
    SKUL A 0 A_ChangeFlag("DONTRIP", 1)
    SKUL A 0 A_ChangeFlag("DONTSQUASH", 1)
    SKUL A 0 A_ChangeFlag("DONTMORPH", 1)
    SKUL A 0 A_ChangeFlag("DONTBLAST", 1)
    goto See+2
  See:
    SKUL A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(67, "Aggressor")
    SKUL A 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(34, "Aggressor2")
    SKUL A 6 BRIGHT A_Chase
	SKUL B 6 BRIGHT A_Chase
    Loop
  Missile:
    SKUL C 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(13, "StartShock")
    SKUL C 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(51, "StartShockCheck")
  Missile2:
    SKUL C 10 BRIGHT A_FaceTarget
    SKUL D 4 BRIGHT A_SkullAttack
    SKUL CD 4 BRIGHT
    Goto Missile2+2
  StartShockCheck:
    SKUL C 0 A_Jump(192, "Missile2")
  StartShock:
    SKUL C 10 BRIGHT A_FaceTarget
    SKUL D 4 BRIGHT A_SkullAttack(50)
    SKUL CCCCCDDDD 1 BRIGHT A_CustomMeleeAttack(random(1,8)*12,"none","none")
    Goto StartShock+2

  Pain.Gauntlets:
    TNT1 A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(850,0,1,0,0) // Give some life when killing a monster
    Goto Pain
  Death.Gauntlets:
    TNT1 A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(850,0,3,0,0) // Give some life when killing a monster
    Goto Death

  Death:
    SKUL F 6 BRIGHT
    SKUL G 6 BRIGHT A_Scream
    SKUL H 6 BRIGHT
    SKUL I 6 BRIGHT A_NoBlocking
    SKUL J 6
    SKUL K 6
    Stop
 }	
}

actor FistPuff : BulletPuff
{
  Game Doom
  +NOBLOCKMAP
  +NOGRAVITY
  +ALLOWPARTICLES
  +RANDOMIZE
  RenderStyle Translucent
  Alpha 0.5
  VSpeed 1
  Mass 5
  SeeSound "FistHit"
  AttackSound "null"

  States
  {
  Spawn:
    PUFF C 4 // BRIGHT
    PUFF D 4
  Melee:
    PUFF C 4 // BRIGHT
    PUFF D 4
    Stop
  }
}

actor FistDeggaris : Weapon
{
  Game Doom
  Weapon.SelectionOrder 3700
  Weapon.Kickback 100
  +WEAPON.WIMPY_WEAPON
  +WEAPON.MELEEWEAPON
  Tag "Fist"
  Obituary "$OB_MPFIST" // "%o chewed on %k's fist."
  States
  {
  Ready:
    PUNG A 1 A_WeaponReady
    loop
  Deselect:
    PUNG A 1 A_Lower
    loop
  Select: 
    PUNG A 1 A_Raise
    loop
  Fire:
    PUNG A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("UseStaminaAttack",225,2) == 1, "PunchSuccess")
    goto Ready
  PunchSuccess:
    PUNG B 4
    PUNG C 4 A_CustomPunch(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(899),1,0,"FistPuff",0,0) // A_Punch
    PUNG D 5
    PUNG C 4
    PUNG B 5 A_ReFire
    goto Ready
  }
}

actor FistIllucia : Weapon
{
  Game Doom
  Weapon.SelectionOrder 3700
  Weapon.Kickback 90
  +WEAPON.WIMPY_WEAPON
  +WEAPON.MELEEWEAPON
  Tag "Fist"
  Obituary "$OB_MPFIST" // "%o chewed on %k's fist."

    loop
  Deselect:
    PUNG A 1 A_Lower
    loop
  Select: 
    PUNG A 1 A_Raise
    loop
  Fire:
    PUNG A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("UseStaminaAttack",250,2) == 1, "PunchSuccess")
    goto Ready
  PunchSuccess:
    PUNG B 3
    PUNG C 3 A_CustomPunch(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(899),1,0,"FistPuff",0,0) // A_Punch
    PUNG D 4
    PUNG C 3
    PUNG B 4 A_ReFire
    goto Ready
  }

ACTOR SauronGauntletsSpawner : CustomInventory 27329
{
  States
  {
   SpawnDeggaris:
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("SauronGauntlets",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_FadeOut(1.0)
    Loop
   SpawnIllucia:
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("SauronGauntletsIllucia",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_FadeOut(1.0)
    Loop
   SpawnFlora:
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("SauronGauntletsFlora",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_FadeOut(1.0)
    Loop

   Spawn:
    TNT1 A 0 
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf( ACS_ExecuteWithResult(864) == 1, "SpawnDeggaris" )
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf( ACS_ExecuteWithResult(864) == 2, "SpawnIllucia" )
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf( ACS_ExecuteWithResult(864) == 3, "SpawnFlora" )
    TNT1 A 0 A_FadeOut(1.0)
    Loop
  }
}

ACTOR SauronGauntlets : FWeapFist 27330
{
  var int user_theta;
  Tag "Sauron's Gauntlets"
  +BLOODSPLATTER
  +FLOATBOB
  +WEAPON.MELEEWEAPON
  +WEAPON.BFG
  Weapon.SelectionOrder 3400
  Weapon.KickBack 160
  Inventory.PickupMessage "What the feck are these things...?!"
  AttackSound "GauntletHit"

  States
  {
  DeggarisPickup:
    WGNT A 0 A_SpawnItemEX("SauronGauntlets")
    WGNT A 0 A_FadeOut(1.0)
    Loop
  IlluciaPickup:
    WGNT A 0 A_SpawnItemEX("SauronGauntletsIllucia")
    WGNT A 0 A_FadeOut(1.0)
    Loop
  FloraPickup:
    WGNT A 0 A_SpawnItemEX("SauronGauntletsFlora")
    WGNT A 0 A_FadeOut(1.0)
    Loop
  NoMore:
    WGNT A 0 A_FadeOut(1.0)
    Loop
  Spawn:
    WGNT A 0
    WGNT A 0 A_Stopsound(CHAN_ITEM)
    WGNT A 0 A_Playsound("SauronGauntlets/Hum",CHAN_ITEM)
    WGNT A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(837,0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(args[4] == 1,"IlluciaPickup")
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(args[4] == 3,"FloraPickup")
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(args[3] == 1,"NoMore")
    WGNT A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_theta",0)
  SpawnPhase1:
    WGNT A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(837,0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(args[4] == 1,"IlluciaPickup")
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(args[4] == 3,"FloraPickup")
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(args[3] == 1,"NoMore")
    WGNT A 1 
    WGNT A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_theta",user_theta+1)
    WGNT A 0 A_JumpIf(user_theta==140,"Spawn")
    loop

  Select:
    FPCH A 1 A_Raise
    Loop
  Deselect:
    FPCH A 1 A_Lower
    Loop
  Ready:
    FPCH A 1 A_WeaponReady
    Loop
  Fire:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("UseStaminaAttack",562,2) == 1, "PunchSuccess")
    goto Ready
  PunchSuccess:
    FPCH B 0 ACS_Execute(849,0,0,0,0)
    FPCH B 5 Offset (5, 40) A_PlaySound("GauntletSwing",CHAN_WEAPON)
    FPCH C 0 ACS_Execute(849,0,0,0,0)
    FPCH C 4 Offset (5, 40)
    FPCH D 0 ACS_Execute(849,0,0,0,0)
    FPCH D 4 Offset (5, 40) A_CustomPunch(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(899,0),1,0,"GauntletPuff",72) // A_FPunchAttack
    FPCH C 0 ACS_Execute(849,0,0,0,0)
    FPCH C 4 Offset (5, 40)
    FPCH B 0 ACS_Execute(849,0,0,0,0)
    FPCH B 5 Offset (5, 40) A_ReFire
    Goto Ready
  AltFire:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("UseStaminaAttack",1405,2) == 1, "AltPunchSuccess")
    goto Ready
  AltPunchSuccess:
    FPCH B 0 ACS_Execute(849,0,0,0,0)
    FPCH B 0 Offset (5, 40) A_PlaySound("*grunt",CHAN_VOICE,10.0)
    FPCH B 5 Offset (5, 40) A_PlaySound("GauntletSwing",CHAN_WEAPON)
    FPCH C 0 ACS_Execute(849,0,0,0,0)
    FPCH C 4 Offset (5, 40)
    FPCH D 0 ACS_Execute(849,0,0,0,0)
    FPCH D 4 Offset (5, 40) A_CustomPunch(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(899,1),1,0,"GauntletPuff",80)
    FPCH E 0 ACS_Execute(849,0,0,0,0)
    FPCH E 4 Offset (5, 40)
    FPCH E 0 ACS_Execute(849,0,0,0,0)
    FPCH E 1 Offset (15, 50)
    FPCH E 0 ACS_Execute(849,0,0,0,0)
    FPCH E 1 Offset (25, 60)
    FPCH E 0 ACS_Execute(849,0,0,0,0)
    FPCH E 1 Offset (35, 70)
    FPCH E 0 ACS_Execute(849,0,0,0,0)
    FPCH E 1 Offset (45, 80)
    FPCH E 0 ACS_Execute(849,0,0,0,0)
    FPCH E 1 Offset (55, 90)
    FPCH E 0 ACS_Execute(849,0,0,0,0)
    FPCH E 1 Offset (65, 90)
    FPCH E 0 ACS_Execute(849,0,0,0,0)
    FPCH E 10 Offset (0, 150)
    Goto Ready
  }
}

// Illucia-specfic version with slightly less base damage but more attack speed
ACTOR SauronGauntletsIllucia : SauronGauntlets 27331
{
  var int user_theta;
  Tag "Sauron's Gauntlets"
  +BLOODSPLATTER
  +FLOATBOB
  +WEAPON.MELEEWEAPON
  +WEAPON.BFG
  Weapon.SelectionOrder 3400
  Weapon.KickBack 150
  Inventory.PickupMessage "The hell are these things supposed to be?!"
  AttackSound "GauntletHit"

  States
  {
  DeggarisPickup:
    WGNT A 0 A_SpawnItemEX("SauronGauntlets")
    WGNT A 0 A_FadeOut(1.0)
    Loop
  IlluciaPickup:
    WGNT A 0 A_SpawnItemEX("SauronGauntletsIllucia")
    WGNT A 0 A_FadeOut(1.0)
    Loop
  FloraPickup:
    WGNT A 0 A_SpawnItemEX("SauronGauntletsFlora")
    WGNT A 0 A_FadeOut(1.0)
    Loop
  NoMore:
    WGNT A 0 A_FadeOut(1.0)
    Loop
  Spawn:
    WGNT A 0
    WGNT A 0 A_Stopsound(CHAN_ITEM)
    WGNT A 0 A_Playsound("SauronGauntlets/Hum",CHAN_ITEM)
    WGNT A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(837,0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(args[3] == 1,"NoMore")
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(args[4] == 2,"DeggarisPickup")
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(args[4] == 3,"FloraPickup")
    WGNT A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_theta",0)
  SpawnPhase1:
    WGNT A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(837,0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(args[3] == 1,"NoMore")
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(args[4] == 2,"DeggarisPickup")
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(args[4] == 3,"FloraPickup")
    WGNT A 1 
    WGNT A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_theta",user_theta+1)
    WGNT A 0 A_JumpIf(user_theta==140,"Spawn")
    loop

  Pickup:
    stop
  Select:
    FPCH A 1 A_Raise
    Loop
  Deselect:
    FPCH A 1 A_Lower
    Loop
  Ready:
    FPCH A 1 A_WeaponReady
    Loop
  Fire:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("UseStaminaAttack",625,2) == 1, "PunchSuccess")
    goto Ready
  PunchSuccess:
    FPCH B 0 ACS_Execute(849,0,0,0,0)
    FPCH B 4 Offset (5, 40) A_PlaySound("GauntletSwing",CHAN_WEAPON)
    FPCH C 0 ACS_Execute(849,0,0,0,0)
    FPCH C 3 Offset (5, 40)
    FPCH D 0 ACS_Execute(849,0,0,0,0)
    FPCH D 3 Offset (5, 40) A_CustomPunch(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(899,0),1,0,"GauntletPuff",72) // A_FPunchAttack
    FPCH C 0 ACS_Execute(849,0,0,0,0)
    FPCH C 3 Offset (5, 40)
    FPCH B 0 ACS_Execute(849,0,0,0,0)
    FPCH B 4 Offset (5, 40) A_ReFire
    Goto Ready
  AltFire:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("UseStaminaAttack",1562,2) == 1, "AltPunchSuccess")
    goto Ready
  AltPunchSuccess:
    FPCH B 0 ACS_Execute(849,0,0,0,0)
    FPCH B 0 Offset (5, 40) A_PlaySound("GauntletIlluciaSwing",CHAN_VOICE,10.0)
    FPCH B 4 Offset (5, 40) A_PlaySound("GauntletSwing",CHAN_WEAPON)
    FPCH C 0 ACS_Execute(849,0,0,0,0)
    FPCH C 3 Offset (5, 40)
    FPCH D 0 ACS_Execute(849,0,0,0,0)
    FPCH D 3 Offset (5, 40) A_CustomPunch(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(899,1),1,0,"GauntletPuff",80)
    FPCH E 0 ACS_Execute(849,0,0,0,0)
    FPCH E 3 Offset (5, 40)
    FPCH E 0 ACS_Execute(849,0,0,0,0)
    FPCH E 1 Offset (15, 50)
    FPCH E 0 ACS_Execute(849,0,0,0,0)
    FPCH E 1 Offset (25, 60)
    FPCH E 0 ACS_Execute(849,0,0,0,0)
    FPCH E 1 Offset (35, 70)
    FPCH E 0 ACS_Execute(849,0,0,0,0)
    FPCH E 1 Offset (45, 80)
    FPCH E 0 ACS_Execute(849,0,0,0,0)
    FPCH E 1 Offset (55, 90)
    FPCH E 0 ACS_Execute(849,0,0,0,0)
    FPCH E 1 Offset (65, 90)
    FPCH E 0 ACS_Execute(849,0,0,0,0)
    FPCH E 8 Offset (0, 150)
    Goto Ready
  }
}

// Flora-specfic version with even less base damage but more attack speed
ACTOR SauronGauntletsFlora : SauronGauntlets 27332
{
  var int user_theta;
  Tag "Sauron's Gauntlets"
  +BLOODSPLATTER
  +FLOATBOB
  +WEAPON.MELEEWEAPON
  +WEAPON.BFG
  Weapon.SelectionOrder 3400
  Weapon.KickBack 140
  Inventory.PickupMessage "Hmmm... these look like they'll be of use..."
  AttackSound "GauntletHit"

  States
  {
  DeggarisPickup:
    WGNT A 0 A_SpawnItemEX("SauronGauntlets")
    WGNT A 0 A_FadeOut(1.0)
    Loop
  IlluciaPickup:
    WGNT A 0 A_SpawnItemEX("SauronGauntletsIllucia")
    WGNT A 0 A_FadeOut(1.0)
    Loop
  FloraPickup:
    WGNT A 0 A_SpawnItemEX("SauronGauntletsFlora")
    WGNT A 0 A_FadeOut(1.0)
    Loop
  NoMore:
    WGNT A 0 A_FadeOut(1.0)
    Loop
  Spawn:
    WGNT A 0
    WGNT A 0 A_Stopsound(CHAN_ITEM)
    WGNT A 0 A_Playsound("SauronGauntlets/Hum",CHAN_ITEM)
    WGNT A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(837,0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(args[3] == 1,"NoMore")
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(args[4] == 2,"DeggarisPickup")
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(args[4] == 1,"IlluciaPickup")
    WGNT A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_theta",0)
  SpawnPhase1:
    WGNT A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(837,0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(args[3] == 1,"NoMore")
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(args[4] == 2,"DeggarisPickup")
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(args[4] == 1,"IlluciaPickup")
    WGNT A 1 
    WGNT A 0 A_SetUserVar("user_theta",user_theta+1)
    WGNT A 0 A_JumpIf(user_theta==140,"Spawn")
    loop

  Pickup:
    stop
  Select:
    FPCH A 1 A_Raise
    Loop
  Deselect:
    FPCH A 1 A_Lower
    Loop
  Ready:
    FPCH A 1 A_WeaponReady
    Loop
  Fire:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("UseStaminaAttack",832,2) == 1, "PunchSuccess")
    goto Ready
  PunchSuccess:
    FPCH B 0 ACS_Execute(849,0,0,0,0)
    FPCH B 3 Offset (5, 40) A_PlaySound("GauntletSwing",CHAN_WEAPON)
    FPCH C 0 ACS_Execute(849,0,0,0,0)
    FPCH C 3 Offset (5, 40)
    FPCH D 0 ACS_Execute(849,0,0,0,0)
    FPCH D 2 Offset (5, 40) A_CustomPunch(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(899,0),1,0,"GauntletPuff",72) // A_FPunchAttack
    FPCH C 0 ACS_Execute(849,0,0,0,0)
    FPCH C 3 Offset (5, 40)
    FPCH B 0 ACS_Execute(849,0,0,0,0)
    FPCH B 3 Offset (5, 40) A_ReFire
    Goto Ready
  AltFire:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("UseStaminaAttack",2081,2) == 1, "AltPunchSuccess")
    goto Ready
  AltPunchSuccess:
    FPCH B 0 ACS_Execute(849,0,0,0,0)
    FPCH B 0 Offset (5, 40) A_PlaySound("GauntletFloraSwing",CHAN_VOICE,10.0)
    FPCH B 3 Offset (5, 40) A_PlaySound("GauntletSwing",CHAN_WEAPON)
    FPCH C 0 ACS_Execute(849,0,0,0,0)
    FPCH C 3 Offset (5, 40)
    FPCH D 0 ACS_Execute(849,0,0,0,0)
    FPCH D 2 Offset (5, 40) A_CustomPunch(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(899,1),1,0,"GauntletPuff",80)
    FPCH E 0 ACS_Execute(849,0,0,0,0)
    FPCH E 3 Offset (5, 40)
    FPCH E 0 ACS_Execute(849,0,0,0,0)
    FPCH E 1 Offset (15, 50)
    FPCH E 0 ACS_Execute(849,0,0,0,0)
    FPCH E 1 Offset (25, 60)
    FPCH E 0 ACS_Execute(849,0,0,0,0)
    FPCH E 1 Offset (35, 70)
    FPCH E 0 ACS_Execute(849,0,0,0,0)
    FPCH E 1 Offset (45, 80)
    FPCH E 0 ACS_Execute(849,0,0,0,0)
    FPCH E 1 Offset (55, 90)
    FPCH E 0 ACS_Execute(849,0,0,0,0)
    FPCH E 1 Offset (65, 90)
    FPCH E 0 ACS_Execute(849,0,0,0,0)
    FPCH E 7 Offset (0, 150)
    Goto Ready
  }
}

actor GoToCast : Sauravatar
{

 Radius 3
 Height 8
 Scale 0.075

 {
  Spawn:
    CYBR A 0 A_BrainDie
    CYBR A 1 A_BrainDie
  See:
    CYBR A 0 A_BrainDie
    CYBR A 1 A_BrainDie
  Death:
    CYBR P -1 A_BrainDie
 }
}

        Loop

        ZMAY F 3 Bright A_MissileAttack

        ZMAY G 3 A_Pain

        ZMAY V -1

Actor CastRepeaterZombie
{
  Health 100
  Radius 20
  Height 56
  Speed 8
  PainChance 96
  Monster
  +FloorClip
  SeeSound "Grunt/Sight"
  PainSound "Grunt/Pain"
  DeathSound "Grunt/Death"
  ActiveSound "Grunt/Active"
  Obituary "%o was vapourized by a Repeater Zombie" 
  Decal MummyScorch

  States 
  {
  Spawn:
    RPZM AAAAAAAAAABBBBBBBBBB 1 A_Look 
    Loop 
  See:
    RPZM AABBCCDD 4 A_Chase 
    Loop 

  Missile:
    RPZM E 4 A_PlaySoundEx("Weapons/RepeaterSpinUp", "SoundSlot7", 0)
    RPZM EFFEFEF 4 A_FaceTarget

    RPZM G 2 A_PlaySound("Weapons/RepeaterFire")
    RPZM F 2 A_FaceTarget
    RPZM H 2 A_PlaySound("Weapons/RepeaterFire")
    RPZM E 2 A_FaceTarget
    RPZM G 2 A_PlaySound("Weapons/RepeaterFire")
    RPZM F 2 A_FaceTarget
    RPZM H 2 A_PlaySound("Weapons/RepeaterFire")
    RPZM E 2 A_FaceTarget
    RPZM G 2 A_PlaySound("Weapons/RepeaterFire")
    RPZM F 2 A_FaceTarget
    RPZM H 2 A_PlaySound("Weapons/RepeaterFire")
    RPZM E 2 A_FaceTarget
    RPZM G 2 A_PlaySound("Weapons/RepeaterFire")
    RPZM F 2 A_FaceTarget
    RPZM H 2 A_PlaySound("Weapons/RepeaterFire")
    RPZM E 2 A_FaceTarget
    RPZM G 2 A_PlaySound("Weapons/RepeaterFire")
    RPZM F 2 A_FaceTarget
    RPZM H 2 A_PlaySound("Weapons/RepeaterFire")
    RPZM E 2 A_FaceTarget
    RPZM G 2 A_PlaySound("Weapons/RepeaterFire")
    RPZM F 2 A_FaceTarget
    RPZM H 2 A_PlaySound("Weapons/RepeaterFire")
    RPZM E 2 A_FaceTarget

    RPZM E 4 A_PlaySoundEx("Weapons/RepeaterSpinDown", "SoundSlot7", 0)
    RPZM FEFEEFF 4
    Goto See
  Pain:
    RPZM I 0 A_StopSoundEx("SoundSlot7")
    RPZM I 0 A_JumpIfInventory("RepeaterZombieFiring", 1, "PainSpinDown")
    RPZM I 0 A_TakeInventory("RepeaterZombieFiring", 1)
    RPZM I 0 A_TakeInventory("RepeaterZombieHeat", 100)
    RPZM I 3 
    RPZM I 3 A_Pain 
    Goto See 
  Death:
    RPZM I 4 A_StopSoundEx("SoundSlot7")
    RPZM J 5
    RPZM K 5 A_Scream 
    RPZM L 5 A_Fall 
    RPZM M 5 
    TNT1 A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(872,0,1,0,0)
    RPZM N -1 
    Stop
  XDeath:
    RPZM O 5 A_StopSoundEx("SoundSlot7")
    RPZM P 5 A_XScream
    RPZM Q 5
    RPZM R 5 A_Fall
    RPZM STUV 5
    RPZM W -1
    Stop
  Raise: 
    RPZM NMLKJI 5
    Goto See 
  } 
}

actor CastDoomImp : DoomImp { }
actor CastDarkImp : DoomImp
{
  Game Doom
  SpawnID 155
  Obituary "%o was burned by a dark imp."
  HitObituary "%o was slashed by a dark imp."
  Health 120
  MissileType DarkImpBall
  States
  {
  Spawn:
    DIMP AB 10 A_Look
    Loop
  See:
    DIMP AABBCCDD 3 A_Chase
    Loop
  Melee:
  Missile:
    DIMP EF 8 A_FaceTarget
    DIMP G 6 A_ComboAttack  // See DarkImpBall
     Goto See
  Pain:
    DIMP H 2
    DIMP H 2 A_Pain
    Goto See
  Death:
    DIMP I 8
    DIMP J 8 A_Scream
    DIMP K 6
    DIMP L 6 A_NoBlocking
    DIMP M -1
    Stop
  XDeath:
    DIMP N 5
    DIMP O 5 A_XScream
    DIMP P 5
    DIMP Q 5 A_NoBlocking
    DIMP RST 5
    DIMP U -1
    Stop
  Raise:
    DIMP ML 8
    DIMP KJI 6
    Goto See
  }
}

ACTOR CastBloodDemon : Demon
{ 
  Health 300 
  Speed 15 
  Height 56
  Radius 30
  Mass 400
  PainChance 180
  Meleedamage 10
  REACTIONTIME 8 
  MONSTER
  +FLOORCLIP
  DamageFactor "Normal", 0.75
  RadiusDamageFactor 0.5
  SeeSound "blooddemon/sight"
  PainSound "blooddemon/pain"
  DeathSound "blooddemon/death"
  ActiveSound "blooddemon/active"
  MeleeSound "blooddemon/melee"
  Obituary "%o Was chewed up and spat out by a Blood demon."
  HitObituary "%o Was chewed up and spat out by a Blood demon." 
  States 
  { 
  Spawn: 
    SRG2 AB 10 A_Look
    Loop 
  See: 
    SRG2 A 0 A_PlaySound("blooddemon/walk")
    SRG2 A 2 A_Chase("Melee","", CHF_FASTCHASE | CHF_NIGHTMAREFAST)
    SRG2 ABB 2 A_Chase
    SRG2 C 0 A_PlaySound("blooddemon/walk")
    SRG2 CCDD 2 A_Chase
    SRG2 A 0 A_PlaySound("blooddemon/walk")
    SRG2 AA 2 A_Chase
	SRG2 B 2 A_Chase("Melee","", CHF_FASTCHASE | CHF_NIGHTMAREFAST)
	SRG2 B 2 A_Chase
    SRG2 C 0 A_PlaySound("blooddemon/walk")
    SRG2 CCDD 2 A_Chase
    SRG2 A 0 A_PlaySound("blooddemon/walk")
    SRG2 AABB 2 A_Chase
    SRG2 C 0 A_PlaySound("blooddemon/walk")
    SRG2 C 2 A_Chase
    SRG2 C 2 A_Chase("Melee","", CHF_FASTCHASE | CHF_NIGHTMAREFAST)
    SRG2 DD 2 A_Chase
    SRG2 A 0 A_PlaySound("blooddemon/walk")
    SRG2 AABB 2 A_Chase
    SRG2 C 0 A_PlaySound("blooddemon/walk")
    SRG2 CCD 2 A_Chase
    SRG2 D 2 A_Chase("Melee","", CHF_FASTCHASE | CHF_NIGHTMAREFAST)
    Loop 
  Melee: 
    SRG2 EF 8 A_FaceTarget
    SRG2 G 8 A_MeleeAttack
    Goto See 
  Pain: 
    SRG2 H 2
    SRG2 H 2 A_Pain
    Goto See
  Death:
    SRG2 I 8 
    SRG2 I 0 A_FaceTarget
    SRG2 J 0 A_SpawnItemEx("BloodDemonArm", 10, 0, 32, 0, 8, 0, 0, 128)
    SRG2 J 8 A_Scream
    SRG2 K 4 
    SRG2 L 4 A_NoBlocking
    SRG2 M 4 
    SRG2 N -1 
    Stop 
  Raise: 
    SRG2 NMLKJI 5 
    Goto See 
  } 
}

       DIAB [ 8 BRIGHT A_FaceTarget
       DIAB \ 8 BRIGHT A_FaceTarget
       DIAB ] 8 BRIGHT A_CustomMissile ("DTracer",0,40,0)
       Goto See 

   Heal:
       DIAB "[\]" 10 BRIGHT
       Goto See
   Pain: 
       DIAB Q 5 
       DIAB Q 5 A_Pain 
	   DIAB G 0 A_Jump(112, "GravityAttackCheck")
	   DIAB G 0 A_Jump(120, "AttackCheck1")
       Goto See 
   Death: 
	   DIAB Q 7 
       DIAB R 7 A_Scream 
       DIAB S 7 A_NoBlocking 
       DIAB TUVW 7 
       DIAB XY 5 
       DIAB Z -1 
       Stop    
   Raise:
       DIAB YX 5 
       DIAB WVUT 7 
       DIAB SRQ 7
       goto See
 } 
}

 var int user_healthlowrange;

  See:
    CYBR A 3 A_Chase

    CYBR C 3 A_Chase

  Missile:

    CYBR F 0 A_PlaySound ("weapons/bfgf")

    goto See
  Pain:

    CYBR G 10
    goto See
  Death:
    CYBR H 5
    CYBR H 5
    CYBR I 0 A_PlaysoundEx("SauronDeath","Body",0,2)
    CYBR I 5
    CYBR I 5
    CYBR J 5
    CYBR J 5
    CYBR K 5

    CYBR L 5

    CYBR M 5
    CYBR N 5
    CYBR N 5
    CYBR O 5
    CYBR O 5

    CYBR P 15
    CYBR P -1 A_BrainDie
 }

actor FloraAllWeapons : CustomInventory 27321 // Gives All of Floras Unique Armor as one item (for cheats mostly) :P
{
 var int user_theta;
 radius 20
 height 20
 scale 0.44
 mass 666
 +FLOATBOB
 +INVENTORY.ALWAYSPICKUP
 +INVENTORY.BIGPOWERUP
 inventory.icon "FLARA0"
 Inventory.PickupMessage "Picked up Flora's Entire Weapon Set! (you cheater :P)"

 States
 {
  Spawn:
   FLAR A 0
   FLAR A 4 // bright
   loop
  Pickup:
   // Slot 1
   TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("SauronGauntletsFlora", 1)
   // Slot 2 [none yet]
   // Slot 3
   TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("DiarisLongBow", 1)
   // Slot 4
   TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("ImpClawCI", 8)
   TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("DarkImpClawCI", 8)
   TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("CacodemonEyeCI", 8)
   TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("CacolanternEyeCI", 8)
   TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("AbaddonEyeCI", 8)
   // Slot 5
   TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("KnightFistCI", 8)
   TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("BaronFistCI", 8)
   TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("BelphegorFistCI", 8)
   TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("BruiserFistCI", 8)
   TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("ArchonFistCI", 8)
   TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("PyroFistCI", 8)
   // Slot 6
   TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("IncarnateSkullCI", 8)
   TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("ArchvileHandCI", 8)
   TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("DiabloistHandCI", 8)
   TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("BalrogFistCI", 8)
   // Slot 7 [none yet]
   Stop
 }
}

// Used in DVI Game Mode to randomly spawn a piece of Flora's permenant armor [includes the Ruinous Shield or the Divine Shield, so beware!]
actor FloraRandomArmor : CustomInventory 27322
{
 var int user_theta;
 radius 20
 height 20
 RenderStyle Add
 Alpha 0.0
 scale 0.44
 mass 666
 +FLOATBOB
 States
 {
  Spawn:
   FLAR A 0
   FLAR A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RandomSeedDrop",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,112) // Extra addition that quickly attaches seed dropping support for any entity that drops the RandomArmor actor: has a 7/16 chance of not spawning
   FLAR A 1 ACS_ExecuteAlways(869,0,0,0,0)
   FLAR A 1
   FLAR A 1
   FLAR A 1
   stop
 }
}

 {
  Spawn:
   FLAR A 0
   FLAR A 1 ACS_ExecuteAlways(869,0,0,0,1)
   FLAR A 1
   FLAR A 1
   FLAR A 1
   stop
 }
}

actor FloraFullArmor : CustomInventory 27324 // Gives All of Floras Unique Armor as one item (for cheats mostly) :P
{
 var int user_theta;
 radius 20
 height 20
 scale 0.44
 mass 666
 +FLOATBOB
 +INVENTORY.ALWAYSPICKUP
 +INVENTORY.BIGPOWERUP
 inventory.icon "FLARA0"
 Inventory.PickupMessage "Picked up Flora's Entire Unique Armor Set! (you cheater :P)"

 States
 {
  Spawn:
   FLAR A 0
   FLAR A 4 bright
   loop
  Pickup:
   TNT1 A 0 A_TakeInventory("RuinousShield", 1) // Makes sure to remove the Ruinous Shield if grabbed
   TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("SafeTeaShoes", 1)
   TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("PearlyCorset", 1)
   TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("WaterFlyingDress", 1)
   TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("EvenstarNecklace", 1)
   TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("CloakofEvasion", 1)
   TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("FalconKnifeEarrings", 1)
   TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("AnubisCufflinks", 1)
   TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("KissaBra", 1)
   TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("DivineShield", 1)
   TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("BalrogRing", 1)
   TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("DoveRibbon", 1)
   Stop
 }
}

actor SafeTeaShoes : CustomInventory 27301
{
 var int user_theta;
 radius 20
 height 20
 scale 0.33
 mass 666
 +FLOATBOB
 +INVENTORY.ALWAYSPICKUP
 +INVENTORY.BIGPOWERUP
 inventory.icon "ARMRA0"
 Inventory.PickupMessage "Got the Safe Tea Shoes!!"

 States
 {
  Spawn:
   ARMR A 0
   ARMR AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA 1 bright ACS_ExecuteAlways(870,0,1,0,0)
   ARMR A 0 A_Stopsound(CHAN_ITEM)
   ARMR A 0 A_Playsound("FloraArmor/Hum",CHAN_ITEM)
   loop
  Use:
   TNT1 A 0
   Stop
 }
}

{
 var int user_theta;

 +INVENTORY.ALWAYSPICKUP

actor HasteBuff : PowerSpeed
{
 Speed 2
 Powerup.Duration -604800
 inventory.icon "TNT1A0"
 +POWERSPEED.NOTRAIL
}

actor SlowAilment : PowerSpeed
{
 Speed 0.5
 Powerup.Duration -604800
 inventory.icon "TNT1A0"
 +POWERSPEED.NOTRAIL
}

Actor Chainsaw2 : Chainsaw { }
Actor ChainsawChecker : CustomInventory replaces Chainsaw
{
  States
  {
   FloraDetected: // bonus will be turned into something else
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("Berserk",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_FadeOut(1.0)
    Loop

   Spawn:
    TNT1 A 0
    TNT1 A 1 ACS_ExecuteAlways(860,0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(args[4] == 2,"FloraDetected")
    TNT1 A 1 ACS_ExecuteAlways(860,0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(args[4] == 2,"FloraDetected")
    TNT1 A 1 ACS_ExecuteAlways(860,0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(args[4] == 2,"FloraDetected")
   Idle:
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("Chainsaw2",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_FadeOut(1.0)
    Loop
  }
}

Actor DualPistols : Weapon
{
	Game Doom
	Weapon.SelectionOrder 1900
	Weapon.AmmoUse 1
	Weapon.AmmoGive 20
	Weapon.AmmoType "Clip"
      Inventory.PickupMessage "You got an extra Pistol!"
      Obituary "%o got pecked by %k's twin peashooters!"
	Tag "Dual Pistols"
	States
	{
	Ready:
		PISD A 1 A_WeaponReady
		Loop
	Deselect:
		PISD A 1 A_Lower
		Loop
	Select:
		PISD A 1 A_Raise
		Loop
	Fire:
		PISD A 0
		PISD B 3 A_FirePistol
		PISD B 2
		PISD C 3 A_FirePistol
		PISD C 2
		PISD B 3 A_ReFire
		Goto Ready
	Flash:
		TNT1 A 0 Bright A_Light1
		Goto LightDone
 	Spawn:
		PIST A -1
		Stop
      }
}
Actor DualPistolsChecker : CustomInventory
{
  States
  {
   FloraDetected: // bonus will be turned into something else
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HealthBonus",12,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,96)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HealthBonus",-12,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,254)
    TNT1 A 0 A_FadeOut(1.0)
    Loop

   Spawn:
    TNT1 A 0
    TNT1 A 1 ACS_ExecuteAlways(860,0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(args[4] == 2,"FloraDetected")
    TNT1 A 1 ACS_ExecuteAlways(860,0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(args[4] == 2,"FloraDetected")
    TNT1 A 1 ACS_ExecuteAlways(860,0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(args[4] == 2,"FloraDetected")
   Idle:
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DualPistols",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_FadeOut(1.0)
    loop
  }
}

{
  States
  {
   FloraDetected: // bonus will be turned into something else
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HealthBonus",12,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,24)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HealthBonus",-12,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,48)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HealthBonus",0,-12,0,0,0,0,0,0,64)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HealthBonus",0,12,0,0,0,0,0,0,192)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HealthBonus",0,-12,0,0,0,0,0,0,232)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HealthBonus",12,-12,0,0,0,0,0,0,244)

    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DiarisLongBow",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,251)
    TNT1 A 0 A_FadeOut(1.0)
    Loop

   Spawn:
    TNT1 A 0
    TNT1 A 1 ACS_ExecuteAlways(860,0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(args[4] == 2,"FloraDetected")
    TNT1 A 1 ACS_ExecuteAlways(860,0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(args[4] == 2,"FloraDetected")
    TNT1 A 1 ACS_ExecuteAlways(860,0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(args[4] == 2,"FloraDetected")
   Idle:
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(16,"SpawnMinigun")
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("Chaingun2",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_FadeOut(1.0)
    Loop
   SpawnMinigun:
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("Minigun",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_FadeOut(1.0)
    Loop
  }
}

// Skulltag's Minigun
ACTOR Minigun : Weapon
{
 Weapon.AmmoType "Clip"
 Weapon.AmmoGive 20
 Weapon.AmmoUse 1
 Inventory.PickupSound "misc/w_pkup"
 Inventory.PickupMessage "Picked up a minigun!"
 Obituary "%o was shredded by %k's minigun."
 AttackSound "weapons/minigunfire"
 States
 {
  Spawn:
   MNGN A -1
   Loop
  Ready:
   MNGG A 1 A_WeaponReady
   Loop
  Deselect:
   MNGG A 1 A_Lower
   Loop
  Select:
   MNGG A 1 A_Raise
   Loop
  Fire:
   MNGG A 0 A_GunFlash
   // MNGG A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PisCaseSpawn", 20, 6, 20, 0, 0, 0, 0, 128)
   MNGG A 2 A_FireBullets(5, 1, 1, 5, "DBTPuff", 1)
   // MNGG B 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PisCaseSpawn", 20, 6, 20, 0, 0, 0, 0, 128)
   MNGG B 2 A_FireBullets(5, 1, 1, 5, "DBTPuff", 1)
   MNGG B 0 A_ReFire
   MNGG B 2
   MNGG A 5
   MNGG B 8
   MNGG A 11
   MNGG B 14
   MNGG A 17
   goto Ready
  Flash:
   MNGF A 3 BRIGHT A_Light1
   MNGF B 3 BRIGHT A_Light0
   Stop
 }
}
Actor MinigunChecker : CustomInventory
{
  States
  {
   FloraDetected: // bonus will be turned into something else
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HealthBonus",12,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,24)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HealthBonus",-12,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,48)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HealthBonus",0,-12,0,0,0,0,0,0,64)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HealthBonus",0,12,0,0,0,0,0,0,192)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HealthBonus",0,-12,0,0,0,0,0,0,232)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HealthBonus",12,-12,0,0,0,0,0,0,244)

    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DiarisLongBow",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,251)
    TNT1 A 0 A_FadeOut(1.0)
    Loop

   Spawn:
    TNT1 A 0
    TNT1 A 1 ACS_ExecuteAlways(860,0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(args[4] == 2,"FloraDetected")
    TNT1 A 1 ACS_ExecuteAlways(860,0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(args[4] == 2,"FloraDetected")
    TNT1 A 1 ACS_ExecuteAlways(860,0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(args[4] == 2,"FloraDetected")
   Idle:
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("Minigun",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_FadeOut(1.0)
    Loop
  }
}

{
  States
  {
   FloraDetected: // bonus will be turned into something else
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HealthBonus",12,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,24)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HealthBonus",12,-12,0,0,0,0,0,0,48)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HealthBonus",0,-12,0,0,0,0,0,0,64)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HealthBonus",-12,12,0,0,0,0,0,0,72)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HealthBonus",-12,-12,0,0,0,0,0,0,192)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HealthBonus",-12,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,224)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HealthBonus",12,-12,0,0,0,0,0,0,232)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HealthBonus",-12,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,240)

    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DiarisLongBow",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,248)
    TNT1 A 0 A_FadeOut(1.0)
    Loop

   Spawn:
    TNT1 A 0
    TNT1 A 1 ACS_ExecuteAlways(860,0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(args[4] == 2,"FloraDetected")
    TNT1 A 1 ACS_ExecuteAlways(860,0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(args[4] == 2,"FloraDetected")
    TNT1 A 1 ACS_ExecuteAlways(860,0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(args[4] == 2,"FloraDetected")
   Idle:
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RocketLauncher2",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_FadeOut(1.0)
    Loop
  }
}

    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HealthBonus",0,-12,0,0,0,0,0,0,64)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HealthBonus",0,12,0,0,0,0,0,0,68)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HealthBonus",-12,12,0,0,0,0,0,0,72)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HealthBonus",-12,-12,0,0,0,0,0,0,192)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HealthBonus",-12,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,224)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HealthBonus",12,-12,0,0,0,0,0,0,232)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HealthBonus",-12,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,240)

    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("MaxHealthBonus",-12,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,252)

    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DiarisLongBow",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,244)
    TNT1 A 0 A_FadeOut(1.0)
    Loop

   Spawn:

    TNT1 A 1 ACS_ExecuteAlways(860,0,0,0,0)

    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(args[4] == 2,"FloraDetected")
   Idle:
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PlasmaRifle2",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_FadeOut(1.0)
    Loop
  }
}

Actor Repeater2 : Weapon
{
  Inventory.PickupSound "misc/w_pkup"
  Inventory.PickupMessage "You got the plasma repeater!"
  Obituary "%o was disintegrated by %k's repeater."
  Weapon.AmmoType1 "Cell"
  Weapon.AmmoGive 8
  Weapon.AmmoUse 2
  +Weapon.Explosive
  +Weapon.NoAlert
  Tag "Plasma Repeater"
  AttackSound "Weapons/RepeaterFire"
  States
  {
  Spawn:
    REPG I -1
    Loop
  Ready:
    REPG A 0 A_TakeInventory("RepeaterSpin", 3)
    REPG A 0 A_GiveInventory("RepeaterFrameA", 1)
    REPG A 1 A_WeaponReady
    Loop
  Deselect:
    REPG A 0 A_TakeInventory("RepeaterSpin", 3)
    REPG A 0 A_GiveInventory("RepeaterFrameA", 1)
    REPG A 1 A_Lower
    Loop
  Select:
    REPG A 1 A_Raise
    Loop
  Fire:
    //===========Spinup
    REPG A 0 A_PlaySound("Weapons/RepeaterSpinup")
    REPG A 0 A_JumpIfInventory("RepeaterSpin", 1, 8)
    REPG A 0 A_JumpIfInventory("RepeaterB", 1, 4)
    REPG A 0 A_JumpIfInventory("RepeaterC", 1, 4)
    REPG A 0 A_JumpIfInventory("RepeaterD", 1, 4)
    REPG A 4
    REPG B 4
    REPG C 4
    REPG D 4 A_GiveInventory("RepeaterFrameA")
    REPG A 0 A_JumpIfInventory("RepeaterSpin", 2, 9)
    REPG A 0 A_GiveInventory("RepeaterSpin", 1)
    REPG A 0 A_JumpIfInventory("RepeaterB", 1, 4)
    REPG A 0 A_JumpIfInventory("RepeaterC", 1, 4)
    REPG A 0 A_JumpIfInventory("RepeaterD", 1, 4)
    REPG A 3
    REPG B 3
    REPG C 3
    REPG D 3 A_GiveInventory("RepeaterFrameA")
    REPG A 0 A_JumpIfInventory("RepeaterB", 1, 4)
    REPG A 0 A_JumpIfInventory("RepeaterC", 1, 4)
    REPG A 0 A_JumpIfInventory("RepeaterD", 1, 4)
    REPG A 2
    REPG B 2
    REPG C 2
    REPG D 2 A_GiveInventory("RepeaterFrameA")
    //===========Fire
    REPG A 0 A_Refire
    //===========Spindown
    REPG A 0 A_PlaySound("Weapons/RepeaterSpindown")
    REPG A 0 A_GiveInventory("RepeaterFrameA", 1)
    REPG AA 1 A_WeaponReady(11)
    REPG A 0 A_GiveInventory("RepeaterFrameB", 1)
    REPG BB 1 A_WeaponReady(11)
    REPG A 0 A_GiveInventory("RepeaterFrameC", 1)
    REPG CC 1 A_WeaponReady(11)
    REPG A 0 A_GiveInventory("RepeaterFrameD", 1)
    REPG DD 1 A_WeaponReady(11)
    REPG A 0 A_TakeInventory("RepeaterSpin", 1)
    REPG A 0 A_GiveInventory("RepeaterFrameA", 1)
    REPG AAA 1 A_WeaponReady(11)
    REPG A 0 A_GiveInventory("RepeaterFrameB", 1)
    REPG BBB 1 A_WeaponReady(11)
    REPG A 0 A_GiveInventory("RepeaterFrameC", 1)
    REPG CCC 1 A_WeaponReady(11)
    REPG A 0 A_GiveInventory("RepeaterFrameD", 1)
    REPG DDD 1 A_WeaponReady(11)
    REPG A 0 A_TakeInventory("RepeaterSpin", 1)
    REPG A 0 A_GiveInventory("RepeaterFrameA", 1)
    REPG AAAA 1 A_WeaponReady(11)
    REPG A 0 A_GiveInventory("RepeaterFrameB", 1)
    REPG BBBB 1 A_WeaponReady(11)
    REPG A 0 A_GiveInventory("RepeaterFrameC", 1)
    REPG CCCC 1 A_WeaponReady(11)
    REPG A 0 A_GiveInventory("RepeaterFrameD", 1)
    REPG DDDD 1 A_WeaponReady(11)
    REPG A 0 A_GiveInventory("RepeaterFrameA", 1)
    REPG AAAA 1 A_WeaponReady(11)
    REPG A 0 A_GiveInventory("RepeaterFrameB", 1)
    REPG BBBB 1 A_WeaponReady(11)
    REPG A 0 A_GiveInventory("RepeaterFrameC", 1)
    REPG CCCC 1 A_WeaponReady(11)
    REPG A 0 A_GiveInventory("RepeaterFrameD", 1)
    REPG DDDD 1 A_WeaponReady(11)
    Goto Ready
  Hold:
    //===========Fire
    REPG E 0 Bright A_Gunflash
    REPG E 0 Bright A_AlertMonsters
    REPG E 2 Bright A_FireBullets(5, 4, 2, 6, "RepPuff", 1, 10240)
    REPG F 2 Bright
    REPG G 0 Bright A_AlertMonsters
    REPG G 2 Bright A_FireBullets(5, 4, 2, 6, "RepPuff", 1, 10240)
    REPG H 2 Bright
    REPG A 0 A_Refire
    //===========Spindown
    REPG A 0 A_PlaySound("Weapons/RepeaterSpindown")
    REPG A 0 A_GiveInventory("RepeaterFrameA", 1)
    REPG AA 1 A_WeaponReady(11)
    REPG A 0 A_GiveInventory("RepeaterFrameB", 1)
    REPG BB 1 A_WeaponReady(11)
    REPG A 0 A_GiveInventory("RepeaterFrameC", 1)
    REPG CC 1 A_WeaponReady(11)
    REPG A 0 A_GiveInventory("RepeaterFrameD", 1)
    REPG DD 1 A_WeaponReady(11)
    REPG A 0 A_TakeInventory("RepeaterSpin", 1)
    REPG A 0 A_GiveInventory("RepeaterFrameA", 1)
    REPG AAA 1 A_WeaponReady(11)
    REPG A 0 A_GiveInventory("RepeaterFrameB", 1)
    REPG BBB 1 A_WeaponReady(11)
    REPG A 0 A_GiveInventory("RepeaterFrameC", 1)
    REPG CCC 1 A_WeaponReady(11)
    REPG A 0 A_GiveInventory("RepeaterFrameD", 1)
    REPG DDD 1 A_WeaponReady(11)
    REPG A 0 A_TakeInventory("RepeaterSpin", 1)
    REPG A 0 A_GiveInventory("RepeaterFrameA", 1)
    REPG AAAA 1 A_WeaponReady(11)
    REPG A 0 A_GiveInventory("RepeaterFrameB", 1)
    REPG BBBB 1 A_WeaponReady(11)
    REPG A 0 A_GiveInventory("RepeaterFrameC", 1)
    REPG CCCC 1 A_WeaponReady(11)
    REPG A 0 A_GiveInventory("RepeaterFrameD", 1)
    REPG DDDD 1 A_WeaponReady(11)
    REPG A 0 A_GiveInventory("RepeaterFrameA", 1)
    REPG AAAA 1 A_WeaponReady(11)
    REPG A 0 A_GiveInventory("RepeaterFrameB", 1)
    REPG BBBB 1 A_WeaponReady(11)
    REPG A 0 A_GiveInventory("RepeaterFrameC", 1)
    REPG CCCC 1 A_WeaponReady(11)
    REPG A 0 A_GiveInventory("RepeaterFrameD", 1)
    REPG DDDD 1 A_WeaponReady(11)
    Goto Ready
  Flash:
    TNT1 A 2 A_Light2
    TNT1 A 2 A_Light1
    TNT1 A 0 A_Light0
    Stop
  }
}
Actor RepeaterChecker : CustomInventory
{
  States
  {
   FloraDetected: // bonus will be turned into something else
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HealthBonus",-12,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,12)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HealthBonus",12,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,24)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HealthBonus",12,-12,0,0,0,0,0,0,48)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HealthBonus",0,-12,0,0,0,0,0,0,64)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HealthBonus",0,12,0,0,0,0,0,0,68)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HealthBonus",-12,12,0,0,0,0,0,0,72)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HealthBonus",-12,-12,0,0,0,0,0,0,192)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HealthBonus",-12,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,224)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HealthBonus",12,-12,0,0,0,0,0,0,232)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HealthBonus",-12,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,240)

    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("MaxHealthBonus",-12,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,252)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("MaxHealthBonus",0,12,0,0,0,0,0,0,252)

    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DiarisLongBow",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,244)
    TNT1 A 0 A_FadeOut(1.0)
    Loop

   Spawn:
    TNT1 A 0
    TNT1 A 1 ACS_ExecuteAlways(860,0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(args[4] == 2,"FloraDetected")
    TNT1 A 1 ACS_ExecuteAlways(860,0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(args[4] == 2,"FloraDetected")
    TNT1 A 1 ACS_ExecuteAlways(860,0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(args[4] == 2,"FloraDetected")
   Idle:
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("Repeater2",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_FadeOut(1.0)
    Loop
  }
}

Actor RepeaterSpin : Inventory { Inventory.MaxAmount 2 }
Actor RepeaterB : Inventory { Inventory.MaxAmount 1 }
Actor RepeaterC : Inventory { Inventory.MaxAmount 1 }
Actor RepeaterD : Inventory { Inventory.MaxAmount 1 }

Actor RepeaterFrameA : CustomInventory
{
  Inventory.MaxAmount 0
  +Inventory.AutoActivate
  States
  {
  Spawn:
    TNT1 A 1
    Stop
  Use:
    TNT1 A 0 A_TakeInventory("RepeaterB", 1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_TakeInventory("RepeaterC", 1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_TakeInventory("RepeaterD", 1)
    Stop
  }
}

Actor RepPuff
{
  Radius 3
  Height 3
  RenderStyle Add
  Alpha 0.75
  +AlwaysPuff
  +PuffOnActors
  +NoGravity
  +NoBlockMap
  +PuffGetsOwner
  +ForceRadiusDmg
  +BloodlessImpact
  Decal MummyScorch
  States
  {
  Spawn:
    RPUF A 1 Bright
    RPUF A 0 Bright A_PlaySound("Weapons/RepeaterHit")
    RPUF A 2 Bright A_Explode(7, 44, 0)
    RPUF BCDEFG 3 Bright
    Stop
  }
}

Actor KaraSawa2 : Weapon
{
  Inventory.PickupSound "Misc/W_PkUp"
  Inventory.PickupMessage "You got the 'Karasawa' High-Density Plasma Rifle!"
  Obituary "%o was fried by %k's Karasawa!"
  Tag "'Karasawa' High-Density Plasma Rifle"
  Weapon.AmmoType "Cell"
  Weapon.AmmoGive 32
  Weapon.AmmoUse 8
  Weapon.KickBack 1000
  states
  {
  Spawn:
    KSWP A -1
    loop
  Select:
    KSAW C 1 A_Raise
    loop
  Deselect:
    KSAW C 1 A_Lower
    loop
  Ready:
    KSAW A 0 A_PlaySound("Weapons/KarasawaIdle")
    KSAW ABCB 4 A_WeaponReady
    loop
  Fire:
    KSAW A 0 A_PlayWeaponSound("Weapons/KarasawaFire")
    KSAW D 1 Bright A_FireCustomMissile("KsawBolt", 0, 1, 0, 0)
    KSAW E 1
    KSAW FGH 2 Bright A_Light2
    KSAW I 0 A_PlaySoundEx("Weapons/KarasawaCharge", "SoundSlot7", 0)
    KSAW IA 4 A_Light1
    KSAW JKLMN 4
    KSAW A 0 A_Light0
    KSAW N 6
    Goto Ready
  }
}

Actor KsawBolt
{
  Projectile
  +Ripper
  +BloodSplatter
  +StrifeDamage

  +CanBounceWater

  Radius 6
  Height 4
  Speed 80

  YScale 0.4

    KWBB A 0 Bright A_PlaySound("KsawBoltFly")
    KWBB ABCDABCDABCDABCDABCDABCDABCDABCDABCDABCDABCDABCDABCDABCDABCDABCDABCDABCDABCDABCDABCDABCDABCDABCDABCDABCDABCDABCD 1 Bright A_SpawnItemEx("BoltBlur", 0, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0, 180, 128)
  Death:
    KWBD ABCDEF 2 Bright
    Stop
  }
}

    TNT1 A 0 A_FadeOut(1.0)
    Loop
  }
}

Actor Clip2 : Clip replaces Clip
{
  Inventory.Pickupsound "getbulletclip"
}

Actor ClipBox2 : ClipBox replaces ClipBox
{
  Inventory.Pickupsound "getbulletbox"
}

Actor Shell2 : Shell replaces Shell
{
  Inventory.Pickupsound "getfourshells"
  States
  {
   SpawnDiarisQuiver:
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DiarisArrowQuiver",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_FadeOut(1.0)
    Loop

   SpawnDiarisArrow:
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(6, "SpawnDiarisQuiver")
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DiarisArrow",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_FadeOut(1.0)
    Loop

   SpawnMedMana:
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DoomSpellMana2",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_FadeOut(1.0)
    Loop

   FloraDetected: // bonus will be turned into something else
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(6, "SpawnDiarisArrow")
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(3, "SpawnMedMana")
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DoomSpellMana",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_FadeOut(1.0)
    Loop

   Spawn:
    TNT1 A 0
    SHEL A 1 ACS_ExecuteAlways(860,0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(args[4] == 2,"FloraDetected")
    SHEL A 1 ACS_ExecuteAlways(860,0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(args[4] == 2,"FloraDetected")
    SHEL A 1 ACS_ExecuteAlways(860,0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(args[4] == 2,"FloraDetected")
   Idle:
    SHEL A -1
    loop
  }
}
