actor ShieldPart // The Main segment of the sceptre-shield which deflects/blocks attacks
{
  Painchance 255
  Radius 24
  Height 24
  Scale 0.75
  RenderStyle None
  Alpha 0.003125
  // Bloodtype "ShieldHit"
  +SHOOTABLE
  +NOGRAVITY
  +NOTELEPORT
  +NODAMAGE
  +DONTRIP
  +NOBLOOD
  +NOBLOODDECALS
  +FLOORCLIP
  +REFLECTIVE
  +NOTELESTOMP
  +GHOST	//Give projectiles that you wish to pass through the shield THRUGHOST flag
  +NOTIMEFREEZE
  States
  {
  Spawn:
    HEXA A 2 bright
    stop
  Pain:
    TNT1 A 0 bright A_PlaySound ("SceptreEmpyrea/Reflect") // A_PlaySound ("ForceBarrier/Hit")
    stop
  Death:
    TNT1 A 1
    stop
  }
}

    stop
  Pain:
    TNT1 A 0 bright A_PlaySound ("SceptreEmpyrea/Reflect") // A_PlaySound ("ForceBarrier/Hit")
    stop
  Death:
    TNT1 A 1
    stop
  }
}

actor ShieldSpawner
{
  Radius 1
  Height 1
  +NOGRAVITY
  +NOINTERACTION
  +NOTIMEFREEZE
  States

  {
  Spawn:
    TNT1 A 0
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(255,2)
    TNT1 A 0 A_AlertMonsters

  Finish:
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(1,25)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx ("ShieldSpawner6upNoReflect", 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 32)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx ("ShieldSpawner5upNoReflect", 24, -12, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 32)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx ("ShieldSpawner5upNoReflect", -24, -12, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 32)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx ("ShieldSpawner4upNoReflect", 48, -28, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 32)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx ("ShieldSpawner4upNoReflect", -48, -28, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 32)

    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(6,19)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx ("ShieldSpawner6upNoReflect", 0, 12, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 32)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx ("ShieldSpawner5upNoReflect", 24, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 32)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx ("ShieldSpawner5upNoReflect", -24, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 32)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx ("ShieldSpawner4upNoReflect", 48, -16, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 32)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx ("ShieldSpawner4upNoReflect", -48, -16, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 32)

    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(21,13)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx ("ShieldSpawner6up", 0, 24, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 32)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx ("ShieldSpawner5up", 24, 12, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 32)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx ("ShieldSpawner5up", -24, 12, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 32)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx ("ShieldSpawner4up", 48, -4, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 32)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx ("ShieldSpawner4up", -48, -4, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 32)

    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(60,7)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx ("ShieldSpawner3upNoReflect", 60, -46, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 32)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx ("ShieldSpawner3upNoReflect", -60, -46, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 32)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx ("ShieldSpawner3upNoReflect", 60, -38, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 32)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx ("ShieldSpawner3upNoReflect", -60, -38, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 32)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx ("ShieldSpawner3up", 60, -24, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 32)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx ("ShieldSpawner3up", -60, -24, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 32)

    TNT1 A 0
    stop
  }
}

actor ShieldSpawnerSpinattack1
{
  Radius 1
  Height 1
  +NOGRAVITY
  +NOINTERACTION
  +NOTIMEFREEZE
  +NOTELESTOMP
  States
  {
  Spawn:
    TNT1 A 0
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx ("ShieldPartSpinAttack1", 0, 0, 16, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0)

    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx ("ShieldPartSpinAttack1", 0, 0, 48, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0)

  }

actor ShieldHit
{
  Radius 1
  Height 1
  Scale 0.5
  Renderstyle Add
  +NOGRAVITY
  +NOINTERACTION
  +NOTIMEFREEZE
  States
  {
  Spawn:
    FHIT A 0 bright
    FHIT A 1 bright A_Stop
    FHIT A 0 bright A_PlaySound ("ForceBarrier/Hit")
    FHIT BCDEFGH 1 bright
    stop
  }
}

actor SwingTimer : CustomInventory
{
  Inventory.Amount 1
  Inventory.MaxAmount 24
}

ACTOR SceptrePuff : BulletPuff
{
 VSpeed 0
 Scale 0.375 // 0.5
 Alpha 0.5
 RenderStyle Translucent
 +PUFFONACTORS
 +FORCEPAIN
 +THRUGHOST
 decal "SceptreScorch"
 damagetype "Sceptre"

 SeeSound "SceptreHitThing1" // "SceptreEmpyrea/HitThing"
 AttackSound "SceptreEmpyrea/HitWall" // "GauntletHitWall"

 States
 {
  Spawn:
    SCPU C 3 BRIGHT
    SCPU D 3 BRIGHT
    SCPU E 3 BRIGHT A_Fadeout(0.133)
    SCPU F 3 BRIGHT A_Fadeout(0.133)
    SCPU G 3 BRIGHT A_Fadeout(0.133)
    Stop
  Melee:
    SCPU C 3 BRIGHT
    SCPU D 3 BRIGHT
    SCPU E 3 BRIGHT A_Fadeout(0.133)
    SCPU F 3 BRIGHT A_Fadeout(0.133)
    SCPU G 3 BRIGHT A_Fadeout(0.133)
    Stop
 }
}

// The Main Weapon itself.
actor SceptreOfEmpyrea : DoomWeapon
{
  Tag "Sceptre of Empyrea"
  scale 0.5
  Weapon.KickBack 256
  +INVENTORY.UNDROPPABLE 
  +WEAPON.NOALERT
  +WEAPON.MELEEWEAPON
  Inventory.PickupMessage "What a sight... Simplistic in It's Majesty..."

  States
  {
  Ready:
    SEMR A 1 A_WeaponReady
    Loop

  // Level 16 of Sceptre = 7 Tics of Swing (-2), 1255-1305 Damage (15*16), 154 Range (+6), -5.03% Stamina
  SceptreSwingLv16:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("UseStaminaAttack",503,2) == 0, "Ready")
    TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("SceptreSwingLvl16",CHAN_WEAPON)
    SEMR E 1 Offset(96,0)
    SEMR E 1 Offset(0,12)
    SEMR E 1 Offset(-96,24)
    SEMR E 0 Offset(-192,36) A_CustomPunch(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(898),1,0,"SceptrePuff3",154)
    SEMR E 0 Offset(-192,36) A_SpawnItemEx ("ShieldSpawnerSpinattack4", 39, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0)
    SEMR E 0 Offset(-192,36) A_SpawnItemEx ("ShieldSpawnerSpinattack4", 77, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0)
    SEMR E 0 Offset(-192,36) A_SpawnItemEx ("ShieldSpawnerSpinattack4", 116, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0)
    SEMR E 1 Offset(-192,36) A_SpawnItemEx ("ShieldSpawnerSpinattack4D", 154, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0)
    SEMR E 1 Offset(-288,48)
    SEMR E 1 Offset(-384,60)
    SEMR E 1 Offset(-480,72)
    TNT1 A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(862,0,1,1,0) // Increase EXP by 1 Point for Sceptre
    TNT1 A 0 A_Refire
    goto Ready

  // Level 15 of Sceptre = 9 Tics of Swing (-1), 1015-1065 Damage (0*15), 148 Range (+4), -5.09% Stamina
  SceptreSwingLv15:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("UseStaminaAttack",509,2) == 0, "Ready")
    TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("SceptreSwingLvl15",CHAN_WEAPON)
    SEMR D 1 Offset(96,0)
    SEMR D 1 Offset(24,9)
    SEMR D 1 Offset(-48,18)
    SEMR D 1 Offset(-120,27)
    SEMR D 0 Offset(-192,36) A_CustomPunch(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(898),1,0,"SceptrePuff2",148)
    SEMR D 0 Offset(-192,36) A_SpawnItemEx ("ShieldSpawnerSpinattack4", 49, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0)
    SEMR D 0 Offset(-192,36) A_SpawnItemEx ("ShieldSpawnerSpinattack4", 99, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0)
    SEMR D 1 Offset(-192,36) A_SpawnItemEx ("ShieldSpawnerSpinattack4D", 148, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0)
    SEMR D 1 Offset(-264,45)
    SEMR D 1 Offset(-336,54)
    SEMR D 1 Offset(-408,63)
    SEMR D 1 Offset(-480,72)
    TNT1 A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(862,0,1,1,0) // Increase EXP by 1 Point for Sceptre
    TNT1 A 0 A_Refire
    goto Ready

  // Level 14 of Sceptre = 10 Tics of Swing, 1015-1065 Damage (+10*14), 144 Range (+2), -5.15% Stamina
  SceptreSwingLv14:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("UseStaminaAttack",515,2) == 0, "Ready")
    TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("SceptreSwingLvl14",CHAN_WEAPON)
    SEMR D 1 Offset(128,-4)
    SEMR D 1 Offset(64,4)
    SEMR D 1 Offset(0,12)
    SEMR D 1 Offset(-64,20)
    SEMR D 1 Offset(-128,28)
    SEMR D 0 Offset(-192,36) A_CustomPunch(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(898),1,0,"SceptrePuff2",144)
    SEMR D 0 Offset(-192,36) A_SpawnItemEx ("ShieldSpawnerSpinattack3", 48, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0)
    SEMR D 0 Offset(-192,36) A_SpawnItemEx ("ShieldSpawnerSpinattack3", 96, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0)
    SEMR D 1 Offset(-192,36) A_SpawnItemEx ("ShieldSpawnerSpinattack3D", 144, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0)
    SEMR D 1 Offset(-256,44)
    SEMR D 1 Offset(-320,52)
    SEMR D 1 Offset(-384,60)
    SEMR D 1 Offset(-448,68)
    TNT1 A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(862,0,1,1,0) // Increase EXP by 1 Point for Sceptre
    TNT1 A 0 A_Refire
    goto Ready

  // Level 13 of Sceptre = 11 Tics of Swing (0), 875-925 Damage (+5*13), 142 Range (+4), -5.20% Stamina
  SceptreSwingLv13:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("UseStaminaAttack",520,2) == 0, "Ready")
    TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("SceptreSwingLvl13",CHAN_WEAPON)
    SEMR D 1 Offset(96,0)
    SEMR D 1 Offset(38,7)
    SEMR D 1 Offset(-19,14)
    SEMR D 1 Offset(-77,22)
    SEMR D 1 Offset(-134,29)
    SEMR D 0 Offset(-192,36) A_CustomPunch(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(898),1,0,"SceptrePuff2",142)
    SEMR D 0 Offset(-192,36) A_SpawnItemEx ("ShieldSpawnerSpinattack3", 47, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0)
    SEMR D 0 Offset(-192,36) A_SpawnItemEx ("ShieldSpawnerSpinattack3", 95, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0)
    SEMR D 1 Offset(-192,36) A_SpawnItemEx ("ShieldSpawnerSpinattack3D", 142, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0)
    SEMR D 1 Offset(-250,43)
    SEMR D 1 Offset(-307,50)
    SEMR D 1 Offset(-365,58)
    SEMR D 1 Offset(-422,65)
    SEMR D 1 Offset(-480,72)
    TNT1 A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(862,0,1,1,0) // Increase EXP by 1 Point for Sceptre
    TNT1 A 0 A_Refire
    goto Ready

  // Level 12 of Sceptre = 11 Tics of Swing (-1), 810-860 Damage (+5*12), 138 Range (+2), -5.26% Stamina
  SceptreSwingLv12:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("UseStaminaAttack",526,2) == 0, "Ready")
    TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("SceptreSwingLvl12",CHAN_WEAPON)
    SEMR D 1 Offset(96,0)
    SEMR D 1 Offset(38,7)
    SEMR D 1 Offset(-19,14)
    SEMR D 1 Offset(-77,22)
    SEMR D 1 Offset(-134,29)
    SEMR D 0 Offset(-192,36) A_CustomPunch(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(898),1,0,"SceptrePuff2",138)
    SEMR D 0 Offset(-192,36) A_SpawnItemEx ("ShieldSpawnerSpinattack3", 46, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0)
    SEMR D 0 Offset(-192,36) A_SpawnItemEx ("ShieldSpawnerSpinattack3", 92, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0)
    SEMR D 1 Offset(-192,36) A_SpawnItemEx ("ShieldSpawnerSpinattack3D", 138, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0)
    SEMR D 1 Offset(-250,43)
    SEMR D 1 Offset(-307,50)
    SEMR D 1 Offset(-365,58)
    SEMR D 1 Offset(-422,65)
    SEMR D 1 Offset(-480,72)
    TNT1 A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(862,0,1,1,0) // Increase EXP by 1 Point for Sceptre
    TNT1 A 0 A_Refire
    goto Ready

  // Level 11 of Sceptre = 13 Tics of Swing (-1), 750-800 Damage (+10*11), 136 Range (+2), -5.31% Stamina
  SceptreSwingLv11:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("UseStaminaAttack",531,2) == 0, "Ready")
    TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("SceptreSwingLvl11",CHAN_WEAPON)
    SEMR D 1 Offset(96,0)
    SEMR D 1 Offset(48,6)
    SEMR D 1 Offset(-0,12)
    SEMR D 1 Offset(-48,18)
    SEMR D 1 Offset(-96,24)
    SEMR D 1 Offset(-144,30)
    SEMR D 0 Offset(-192,36) A_CustomPunch(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(898),1,0,"SceptrePuff2",136)
    SEMR D 0 Offset(-192,36) A_SpawnItemEx ("ShieldSpawnerSpinattack3", 46, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0)
    SEMR D 0 Offset(-192,36) A_SpawnItemEx ("ShieldSpawnerSpinattack3", 91, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0)
    SEMR D 1 Offset(-192,36) A_SpawnItemEx ("ShieldSpawnerSpinattack3D", 136, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0)
    SEMR D 1 Offset(-240,42)
    SEMR D 1 Offset(-288,48)
    SEMR D 1 Offset(-336,54)
    SEMR D 1 Offset(-384,60)
    SEMR D 1 Offset(-432,66)
    SEMR D 1 Offset(-480,72)
    TNT1 A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(862,0,1,1,0) // Increase EXP by 1 Point for Sceptre
    TNT1 A 0 A_Refire
    goto Ready

  ReadySceptreSwing:
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(252,2)
    TNT1 A 0 A_AlertMonsters // Sometimes a swing will be enough to wake up all monsters in the area.
    // TNT1 A 0 bright A_PlaySound("skeleton/swing",CHAN_WEAPON)

    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfInventory("SceptreLevel16",0,"SceptreSwingLv16")
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfInventory("SceptreLevel15",0,"SceptreSwingLv15")
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfInventory("SceptreLevel14",0,"SceptreSwingLv14")

    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfInventory("SceptreLevel8",0,"SceptreSwingLv8")
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfInventory("SceptreLevel7",0,"SceptreSwingLv7")
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfInventory("SceptreLevel6",0,"SceptreSwingLv6")
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfInventory("SceptreLevel5",0,"SceptreSwingLv5")
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfInventory("SceptreLevel4",0,"SceptreSwingLv4")
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfInventory("SceptreLevel3",0,"SceptreSwingLv3")
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfInventory("SceptreLevel2",0,"SceptreSwingLv2")
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfInventory("SceptreLevel1",0,"SceptreSwingLv1")
    goto SceptreSwingLv0

  SceptreSpinAttackLv3:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("UseStaminaAttack",855,2) == 0, "Ready")
    SEMR A 0 A_GiveInventory("SceptreSpinDefense4",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("SceptreSwingLvl4",CHAN_WEAPON)
  SceptreSpinAttackLv3Loop:
    SEMR C 0 Offset(-192,36) A_FireBullets(0,0,1,ACS_ExecuteWithResult(898,2,3),"SceptrePuff",FBF_NORANDOM | FBF_NOFLASH,288)
    SEMR C 0 Offset(-192,36) A_SpawnItemEx ("ShieldSpawnerSpinattack4", 96, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0)
    SEMR C 0 Offset(-192,36) A_SpawnItemEx ("ShieldSpawnerSpinattack4", 192, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0)
    SEMR C 0 Offset(-192,36) A_SpawnItemEx ("ShieldSpawnerSpinattack4D", 288, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0)
    SEMR C 1 Offset(-192,36) A_SetAngle(angle+24)
    SEMR C 0 Offset(-192,36) ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",1)
    SEMR C 0 Offset(-192,36) A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",0,15) == 1,"SceptreSpinAttackLv2End")
    Loop
  SceptreSpinAttackLv3End:
    TNT1 A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(862,0,1,1,0) // Increase EXP by 1 Point for Sceptre
    SEMR A 0 A_TakeInventory("SceptreSpinDefense1",1)
    SEMR A 0 A_TakeInventory("SceptreSpinDefense2",1)
    SEMR A 0 A_TakeInventory("SceptreSpinDefense3",1)
    SEMR A 0 A_TakeInventory("SceptreSpinDefense4",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Refire
    goto Ready

  SceptreSpinAttackLv2:

    goto Ready

    SEMR C 0 Offset(-192,36) A_FireBullets(0,0,1,ACS_ExecuteWithResult(898,2,1),"SceptrePuff",FBF_NORANDOM | FBF_NOFLASH,231)
    SEMR C 0 Offset(-192,36) A_SpawnItemEx ("ShieldSpawnerSpinattack2", 77, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0)
    SEMR C 0 Offset(-192,36) A_SpawnItemEx ("ShieldSpawnerSpinattack2", 154, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0)
    SEMR C 0 Offset(-192,36) A_SpawnItemEx ("ShieldSpawnerSpinattack2D", 231, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0)
    SEMR C 1 Offset(-192,36) A_SetAngle(angle+24)
    SEMR C 0 Offset(-192,36) ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",1)
    SEMR C 0 Offset(-192,36) A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",0,15) == 1,"SceptreSpinAttackLv2End")
    Loop
  SceptreSpinAttackLv1End:
    TNT1 A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(862,0,1,1,0) // Increase EXP by 1 Point for Sceptre
    SEMR A 0 A_TakeInventory("SceptreSpinDefense1",1)
    SEMR A 0 A_TakeInventory("SceptreSpinDefense2",1)
    SEMR A 0 A_TakeInventory("SceptreSpinDefense3",1)
    SEMR A 0 A_TakeInventory("SceptreSpinDefense4",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Refire
    goto Ready

//    SEMR C 0 Offset(-192,36) A_CustomPunch(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(898,2,0),1,0,"SceptrePuff",168)

  SceptreSpinAttackLv0:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("UseStaminaAttack",1005,2) == 0, "Ready")
    SEMR A 0 A_GiveInventory("SceptreSpinDefense1",1)
    SEMR A 0 A_PlaySound("SceptreSwingLvl4",CHAN_WEAPON)
  SceptreSpinAttackLv0Loop:
    SEMR C 0 Offset(-192,36) A_FireBullets(0,0,1,ACS_ExecuteWithResult(898,2,0),"SceptrePuff",FBF_NORANDOM | FBF_NOFLASH,168)
    SEMR C 0 Offset(-192,36) A_SpawnItemEx ("ShieldSpawnerSpinattack1", 56, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0)
    SEMR C 0 Offset(-192,36) A_SpawnItemEx ("ShieldSpawnerSpinattack1", 112, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0)
    SEMR C 0 Offset(-192,36) A_SpawnItemEx ("ShieldSpawnerSpinattack1D", 168, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0)
    SEMR C 1 Offset(-192,36) A_SetAngle(angle+24)
    SEMR C 0 Offset(-192,36) ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",1)
    SEMR C 0 Offset(-192,36) A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",0,15) == 1,"SceptreSpinAttackLv2End")
    Loop
  SceptreSpinAttackLv0End:
    TNT1 A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(862,0,1,1,0) // Increase EXP by 1 Point for Sceptre
    SEMR A 0 A_TakeInventory("SceptreSpinDefense1",1)
    SEMR A 0 A_TakeInventory("SceptreSpinDefense2",1)
    SEMR A 0 A_TakeInventory("SceptreSpinDefense3",1)
    SEMR A 0 A_TakeInventory("SceptreSpinDefense4",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_Refire
    goto Ready

  ReadySpinningSwing:
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(248,2)
    TNT1 A 0 A_AlertMonsters // Sometimes a swing will be enough to wake up all monsters in the area.
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfInventory("SceptreLevel16",0,"SceptreSpinAttackLv3")
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfInventory("SceptreLevel15",0,"SceptreSpinAttackLv3")
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfInventory("SceptreLevel14",0,"SceptreSpinAttackLv2")
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfInventory("SceptreLevel13",0,"SceptreSpinAttackLv2")
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfInventory("SceptreLevel12",0,"SceptreSpinAttackLv2")
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfInventory("SceptreLevel11",0,"SceptreSpinAttackLv2")
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfInventory("SceptreLevel10",0,"SceptreSpinAttackLv2")
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfInventory("SceptreLevel9",0,"SceptreSpinAttackLv1")
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfInventory("SceptreLevel8",0,"SceptreSpinAttackLv1")
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfInventory("SceptreLevel7",0,"SceptreSpinAttackLv1")
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfInventory("SceptreLevel6",0,"SceptreSpinAttackLv1")
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfInventory("SceptreLevel5",0,"SceptreSpinAttackLv1")
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfInventory("SceptreLevel4",0,"SceptreSpinAttackLv0")
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfInventory("SceptreLevel3",0,"SceptreSpinAttackLv0")
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfInventory("SceptreLevel2",0,"SceptreSpinAttackLv0")
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfInventory("SceptreLevel1",0,"SceptreSpinAttackLv0")
    goto SceptreSpinAttackLv0

  Fire:
    TNT1 A 0 
    SEMR A 0 A_TakeInventory("ShieldDefense",1)
    SEMR A 0 A_TakeInventory("ShieldDefense2",1)
    SEMR A 0 A_TakeInventory("ShieldDefense3",1)
    SEMR A 0 A_TakeInventory("ShieldSlowdown",1)
    SEMR A 0 A_TakeInventory("ShieldSlowdown2",1)
    SEMR A 0 A_TakeInventory("ShieldSlowdown3",1)
    SEMR A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(897) == 2, "ReadySpinningSwing")
    goto ReadySceptreSwing

  // Twirling - A
  Twirl1:
    TNT1 A 0 bright A_SpawnItemEx ("ShieldSpawner", 0, 32, 0, 0, 0, 0, -270, 32)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx ("SceptrePartVisual1", 44, 0, 32, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0)
    goto AltHold2
  Twirl2:
    TNT1 A 0 bright A_SpawnItemEx ("ShieldSpawner", 0, 32, 0, 0, 0, 0, -270, 32)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx ("SceptrePartVisual2", 44, 0, 32, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0)
    goto AltHold2
  Twirl3:
    TNT1 A 0 bright A_SpawnItemEx ("ShieldSpawner", 0, 32, 0, 0, 0, 0, -270, 32)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx ("SceptrePartVisual3", 44, 0, 32, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0)
    goto AltHold2
  Twirl4:

    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx ("SceptrePartVisual4", 44, 0, 32, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0)
    goto AltHold2
  Twirl5:
    TNT1 A 0 bright A_SpawnItemEx ("ShieldSpawner", 0, 32, 0, 0, 0, 0, -270, 32)
    SEMR A 0 bright A_PlaySound("SceptreTwirl1",CHAN_WEAPON)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx ("SceptrePartVisual5", 44, 0, 32, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0)
    goto AltHold2
  Twirl6:
    TNT1 A 0 bright A_SpawnItemEx ("ShieldSpawner", 0, 32, 0, 0, 0, 0, -270, 32)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx ("SceptrePartVisual6", 44, 0, 32, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0)

    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx ("SceptrePartVisual7", 44, 0, 32, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0)

    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx ("SceptrePartVisual8", 44, 0, 32, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0)

  // Twirling - B

    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx ("SceptrePartVisual8b", 44, 0, 32, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0)

  TwirlNoMana:
    TNT1 A 0 A_TakeInventory("ShieldDefense",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_TakeInventory("ShieldDefense2",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_TakeInventory("ShieldDefense3",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_TakeInventory("ShieldSlowdown",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_TakeInventory("ShieldSlowdown2",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_TakeInventory("ShieldSlowdown3",1)
    goto Ready

  TwirlCheckA:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(894,0) == 0, "TwirlNoMana")
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("UseStaminaAttack",21,2) == 0, "TwirlNoMana")
    TNT1 A 0 ACS_Execute(845,0,3,0,0) // ACS_ExecuteAlways(845,0,3,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("ShieldDefense",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_TakeInventory("ShieldDefense2",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_TakeInventory("ShieldDefense3",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("ShieldSlowdown",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_TakeInventory("ShieldSlowdown2",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_TakeInventory("ShieldSlowdown3",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfInventory("SceptreTwirlTimer32",0,"Twirl8")
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfInventory("SceptreTwirlTimer31",0,"Twirl8")
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfInventory("SceptreTwirlTimer30",0,"Twirl8")

    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfInventory("SceptreTwirlTimer21",0,"Twirl6")

  TwirlCheckB:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(894) == 0, "TwirlNoMana")
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("UseStaminaAttack",18,2) == 0, "TwirlNoMana")
    TNT1 A 0 ACS_Execute(845,0,4,0,0) // ACS_ExecuteAlways(845,0,4,0,0)
    TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("ShieldDefense2",1)

    TNT1 A 0 A_TakeInventory("ShieldDefense3",1)

  AltFire:
    TNT1 A 0 
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_ExecuteWithResult(894) == 0, "TwirlNoMana")
    TNT1 A 0 ACS_Execute(845,0,0,0,0) // ACS_ExecuteAlways(845,0,0,0,0)
  AltHold:
    TNT1 A 1 // bright A_SpawnItemEx ("ShieldSpawner", 0, 32, 0, 0, 0, 0, -270, 32)
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfInventory("SceptreLevel16",0,"TwirlCheckC")
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfInventory("SceptreLevel15",0,"TwirlCheckB")
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfInventory("SceptreLevel14",0,"TwirlCheckB")
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfInventory("SceptreLevel13",0,"TwirlCheckB")
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfInventory("SceptreLevel12",0,"TwirlCheckB")
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfInventory("SceptreLevel11",0,"TwirlCheckB")
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfInventory("SceptreLevel10",0,"TwirlCheckB")
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfInventory("SceptreLevel9",0,"TwirlCheckB")
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfInventory("SceptreLevel8",0,"TwirlCheckB")
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfInventory("SceptreLevel7",0,"TwirlCheckA")
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfInventory("SceptreLevel6",0,"TwirlCheckA")
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfInventory("SceptreLevel5",0,"TwirlCheckA")
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfInventory("SceptreLevel4",0,"TwirlCheckA")
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfInventory("SceptreLevel3",0,"TwirlCheckA")
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfInventory("SceptreLevel2",0,"TwirlCheckA")
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIfInventory("SceptreLevel1",0,"TwirlCheckA")
    goto TwirlCheckA

  AltHold2:
    TNT1 A 0 A_Refire
    TNT1 A 0 A_TakeInventory("ShieldDefense",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_TakeInventory("ShieldDefense2",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_TakeInventory("ShieldDefense3",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_TakeInventory("ShieldSlowdown",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_TakeInventory("ShieldSlowdown2",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_TakeInventory("ShieldSlowdown3",1)
    goto Ready

  Deselect:
    SEMR A 1 A_Lower
    TNT1 A 0 A_TakeInventory("ShieldDefense",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_TakeInventory("ShieldDefense2",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_TakeInventory("ShieldDefense3",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_TakeInventory("ShieldSlowdown",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_TakeInventory("ShieldSlowdown2",1)
    TNT1 A 0 A_TakeInventory("ShieldSlowdown3",1)
    Loop
  Select:
    SEMR A 1 A_Raise
    Loop
  Spawn:
    SERP C -1
    stop
  }
}

actor DiarisHolyArrow : FastProjectile
{
 Scale 0.25
 Damage (384+random(-48,192))
 +MISSILE
 +PIERCEARMOR
 +FORCERADIUSDMG
 +FORCEPAIN
 +NODAMAGETHRUST
 +CANNOTPUSH
 +RIPPER
 DamageType "Holy"
 Alpha 1
 Speed 320
 Radius 4
 Height 4
 FastSpeed 320
 SeeSound "null"
 DeathSound "null"
 decal "BulletChip"
 MissileType "DiarisHolyArrowGlitter1"

 States
 {
  Spawn:
   DIAH A 0
   DIAH A 1
   loop
  Death:
   TNT1 A 0 
   TNT1 A 0 A_Playsound("ArrowHit")
   stop
 }
}

// Implied for Slowdown while drawing the bow [to simulate the need to have a steady aim at lower levels]
actor BowDrawnSlowdown : PowerSpeed
{
 Powerup.Duration -604800
 inventory.icon "TNT1A0"
 Speed 0.5
 +POWERSPEED.NOTRAIL
}

actor BowDrawnSlowdown0 : BowDrawnSlowdown { Speed 0.50 }

// Diaris Bow Weapon - Magic Weapon #1
ACTOR DiarisLongBow : Weapon 27328
{
  +WEAPON.NOALERT
  +FLOATBOB
  +NOAUTOAIM
  Scale 0.30
  Inventory.PickupMessage "You got the Diaris Longbow!"
  Obituary "%o was purified by %k's Diaris Longbow."
  Tag "Diaris Longbow"
  Weapon.AmmoType1 "DiarisArrow"
  Weapon.AmmoGive 3
  States
  {
   FloraNotDetected: // Bow will be removed
      TNT1 A 0 A_FadeOut(1.0)
      Loop
   Idle:
      TNT1 A 0
      TNT1 A 1 ACS_ExecuteAlways(860,0,0,0,0)
      TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(args[4] != 2,"FloraNotDetected")
      TNT1 A 1 ACS_ExecuteAlways(860,0,0,0,0)
      TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(args[4] != 2,"FloraNotDetected")
      TNT1 A 1 ACS_ExecuteAlways(860,0,0,0,0)
      TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(args[4] != 2,"FloraNotDetected")
   Spawn:
      DIBO A -1 bright
      Loop
   Ready: 
      DBOW A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(836,0,0,0,0) // A_TakeInventory("BowDrawnSlowdown",1)
      DBOW A 0 A_JumpIfInventory("DiarisArrow",1,1)
      Goto ReadyEmpty
      DBOW A 1 A_WeaponReady
      Loop
   ReadyEmpty: 
      DBOW Z 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(836,0,0,0,0) // A_TakeInventory("BowDrawnSlowdown",1)
      DBOW Z 1 A_WeaponReady
      DBOW Z 0 A_JumpIfInventory("DiarisArrow",1,1)
      Loop
      DBOW A 0
      Goto Ready
   Deselect: 
      DBOW A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(836,0,0,0,0) // A_TakeInventory("BowDrawnSlowdown",1)
      DBOW A 0 A_JumpIfInventory("DiarisArrow",1,1)
      Goto DeselectEmpty
      DBOW A 1 A_Lower
      Loop
   DeselectEmpty: 
      DBOW Z 1 A_Lower
      DBOW Z 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(836,0,0,0,0) // A_TakeInventory("BowDrawnSlowdown",1)
      DBOW Z 0 A_JumpIfInventory("DiarisArrow",1,1)
      Loop
      DBOW A 0
      Goto Deselect
   Select: 
      DBOW A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(836,0,0,0,0) // A_TakeInventory("BowDrawnSlowdown",1)
      DBOW A 0 A_JumpIfInventory("DiarisArrow",1,1)
      Goto SelectEmpty
      DBOW A 1 A_Raise
      Loop
   SelectEmpty: 
      DBOW A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(836,0,0,0,0) // A_TakeInventory("BowDrawnSlowdown",1)
      DBOW A 0 A_JumpIfInventory("DiarisArrow",1,1)
      DBOW Z 1 A_Raise
      Loop
      DBOW A 0
      Goto Select

   Fire: 
      DBOW A 0 A_JumpIfInventory("DiarisArrow",1,1)
      Goto ReadyEmpty
      DBOW A 3 
      DBOW B 3
      DBOW C 3
      DBOW D 3 A_Playsound("DrawDiarisBow",CHAN_WEAPON)
      DBOW E 3
      DBOW F 3
      DBOW G 3
   Hold:
      DBOW H 3 ACS_ExecuteAlways(836,0,1,0,0) // Executes the script to slow you down based on your bow-level
      DBOW H 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("BowAntics") == 0, "ReleaseArrow")
      DBOW H 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("BowAntics") == 1, "DeleaseArrow")
      DBOW H 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("BowAntics") == 2, "Hold")
      loop

   ReleaseArrow:
      DBOW I 0 A_Playsound("BowFired",CHAN_WEAPON)
      DBOW I 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(836,0,0,0,0) // A_TakeInventory("BowDrawnSlowdown",1)
      DBOW I 0 A_TakeInventory("DiarisArrow",1)
      DBOW I 0 A_Jump(224,"HolyNormalShot")
      DBOW I 0 A_Jump(192,"HolyDoubleDmgShot")
      goto HolyTripleDmgShot

   DeleaseArrow:
      DBOW G 3
      DBOW F 3
      DBOW E 3
      DBOW D 3 A_Playsound("DrawDiarisBow",CHAN_WEAPON)
      DBOW I 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(836,0,0,0,0) // A_TakeInventory("BowDrawnSlowdown",1)
      DBOW C 3
      DBOW B 3
      DBOW A 3 
      Goto Ready

   ArrowNormalSpread2:
      DBOW I 0 A_FireCustomMissile("DiarisHolyArrow",15,0,0,0,0,0) // Left
      DBOW I 0 A_FireCustomMissile("DiarisHolyArrow",7.5,0,0,0,0,7.5) // Left-Top
      DBOW I 0 A_FireCustomMissile("DiarisHolyArrow",7.5,0,0,0,0,-7.5) // Left-Bottom
      DBOW I 0 A_FireCustomMissile("DiarisHolyArrow",0,0,0,0,0,0) // Center
      DBOW I 0 A_FireCustomMissile("DiarisHolyArrow",-7.5,0,-0,0,0,-7.5) // Right-Bottom
      DBOW I 0 A_FireCustomMissile("DiarisHolyArrow",-7.5,0,0,0,0,7.5) // Right-Top
      DBOW I 0 A_FireCustomMissile("DiarisHolyArrow",-15,0,0,0,0,0) // Right
      DBOW I 3
      goto EndShot
   ArrowNormalSpread1:
      DBOW I 0 A_FireCustomMissile("DiarisHolyArrow",15,0,0,0,0,0) // Left
      DBOW I 0 A_FireCustomMissile("DiarisHolyArrow",0,0,0,0,0,0) // Center
      DBOW I 0 A_FireCustomMissile("DiarisHolyArrow",-15,0,0,0,0,0) // Right
      DBOW I 3
      goto EndShot
   HolyNormalShot:
      DBOW A 0 A_JumpIfInventory("SpreaderAura2",1,"ArrowNormalSpread2")
      DBOW A 0 A_JumpIfInventory("SpreaderAura1",1,"ArrowNormalSpread1")
      DBOW I 3 A_FireCustomMissile("DiarisHolyArrow",0,0,0,0)
      goto EndShot

   ArrowDoubleSpread2:
      DBOW I 0 A_FireCustomMissile("DiarisHolyArrow2XDmg",15,0,0,0,0,0) // Left
      DBOW I 0 A_FireCustomMissile("DiarisHolyArrow2XDmg",7.5,0,0,0,0,7.5) // Left-Top
      DBOW I 0 A_FireCustomMissile("DiarisHolyArrow2XDmg",7.5,0,0,0,0,-7.5) // Left-Bottom
      DBOW I 0 A_FireCustomMissile("DiarisHolyArrow2XDmg",0,0,0,0,0,0) // Center
      DBOW I 0 A_FireCustomMissile("DiarisHolyArrow2XDmg",-7.5,0,0,0,0,-7.5) // Right-Bottom
      DBOW I 0 A_FireCustomMissile("DiarisHolyArrow2XDmg",-7.5,0,0,0,0,7.5) // Right-Top
      DBOW I 0 A_FireCustomMissile("DiarisHolyArrow2XDmg",-15,0,0,0,0,0) // Right
      DBOW I 3
      goto EndShot
   ArrowDoubleSpread1:
      DBOW I 0 A_FireCustomMissile("DiarisHolyArrow2XDmg",15,0,0,0,0,0) // Left
      DBOW I 0 A_FireCustomMissile("DiarisHolyArrow2XDmg",0,0,0,0,0,0) // Center
      DBOW I 0 A_FireCustomMissile("DiarisHolyArrow2XDmg",-15,0,0,0,0,0) // Right
      DBOW I 3
      goto EndShot
   HolyDoubleDmgShot:
      DBOW A 0 A_JumpIfInventory("SpreaderAura2",1,"ArrowDoubleSpread2")
      DBOW A 0 A_JumpIfInventory("SpreaderAura1",1,"ArrowDoubleSpread1")
      DBOW I 3 A_FireCustomMissile("DiarisHolyArrow2XDmg",0,0,0,0)
      goto EndShot

   ArrowTripleSpread2:
      DBOW I 0 A_FireCustomMissile("DiarisHolyArrow3XDmg",15,0,10,0,0,0) // Left
      DBOW I 0 A_FireCustomMissile("DiarisHolyArrow3XDmg",7.5,0,0,0,0,7.5) // Left-Top
      DBOW I 0 A_FireCustomMissile("DiarisHolyArrow3XDmg",7.5,0,0,0,0,-7.5) // Left-Bottom
      DBOW I 0 A_FireCustomMissile("DiarisHolyArrow3XDmg",0,0,0,0,0,0) // Center
      DBOW I 0 A_FireCustomMissile("DiarisHolyArrow3XDmg",-7.5,0,0,0,0,-7.5) // Right-Bottom
      DBOW I 0 A_FireCustomMissile("DiarisHolyArrow3XDmg",-7.5,0,0,0,0,7.5) // Right-Top
      DBOW I 0 A_FireCustomMissile("DiarisHolyArrow3XDmg",-15,0,0,0,0,0) // Right
      DBOW I 3
      goto EndShot
   ArrowTripleSpread1:
      DBOW I 0 A_FireCustomMissile("DiarisHolyArrow3XDmg",15,0,0,0,0,0) // Left
      DBOW I 0 A_FireCustomMissile("DiarisHolyArrow3XDmg",0,0,0,0,0,0) // Center
      DBOW I 0 A_FireCustomMissile("DiarisHolyArrow3XDmg",-15,0,0,0,0,0) // Right
      DBOW I 3
      goto EndShot
   HolyTripleDmgShot:
      DBOW A 0 A_JumpIfInventory("SpreaderAura2",1,"ArrowTripleSpread2")
      DBOW A 0 A_JumpIfInventory("SpreaderAura1",1,"ArrowTripleSpread1")
      DBOW I 3 A_FireCustomMissile("DiarisHolyArrow3XDmg",0,0,0,0)
      goto EndShot

   EndShot:
      TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(252,2)
      TNT1 A 0 A_AlertMonsters // Sometimes a shot arrow will be enough to wake up all monsters in the area.
      DBOW I 12
      Goto Ready
  }
}

// Magic Boomerrang Weapon - Magic Weapon #2
// TODO

actor NormalHealth : PlaceholderItem { } // For Both HUD and Hellcore-Weapon Checks [when in "normal" health range]
actor LowHealth : PlaceholderItem { } // For Both HUD and Hellcore-Weapon Checks [when in "low" health range]
actor CriticalHealth : PlaceholderItem { } // For Both HUD and Hellcore-Weapon Checks [when in "critical" health range]
actor PlayerIsDead : PlaceholderItem { } // For HUD Checks [when player is dead]
actor PlayerDeathFadeOut : PlaceholderItem { } // For Controlling death-fadeout screens

// Beginning the reforging of DVII's Flying Balrog [for future use in general]. We can remake him, and we can make him better than ever before! >:D
Actor FlyingBalrog 21122 // Afrit
{
  var int user_theta;
  var int user_MaxHP; var int user_HPLowRange; var int user_HPCritRange; var int user_HPBuffRange; var int user_HPXDeathRange;
  var int user_checkmapskill; // For checking if a monster has been given Skill/Map inventory items yet.
  dropitem DoomSpellMana1 36 50
  dropitem DoomSpellMana1 36 50
  dropitem DoomSpellMana2 30 125
  dropitem DoomSpellMana2 30 125
  dropitem DoomSpellMana3 24 350
  dropitem Berserk 2
  dropitem Berserk 2
  dropitem Berserk 2
  dropitem Berserk 2
  dropitem DiamondSkin 2
  dropitem DiamondSkin 2
  dropitem HealthBonus 2
  dropitem HealthBonus 2
  dropitem HealthBonus 2
  dropitem HealthBonus 2
  dropitem HealthBonus 2
  dropitem HealthBonus 2
  dropitem HealthBonus 2
  dropitem HealthBonus 2
  dropitem ArmorBonus 2
  dropitem ArmorBonus 2
  dropitem ArmorBonus 2
  dropitem ArmorBonus 2
  dropitem ArmorBonus 2
  dropitem ArmorBonus 2
  dropitem ArmorBonus 2
  dropitem ArmorBonus 2
  dropitem MaxHealthBonus 1
  dropitem MaxHealthBonus 1
  dropitem MaxHealthBonus 1
  dropitem MaxHealthBonus 1
  dropitem MaxHealthBonus 1
  dropitem MaxHealthBonus 1
  dropitem MaxHealthBonus 1
  dropitem MaxHealthBonus 1
  dropitem SauronGauntlets 1
  dropitem SauronHelmet 1
  dropitem FloraRandomArmor
  dropitem BalrogFistCI 5

  Health 1500
  Speed 8
  Radius 24
  Height 72
  Mass 400
  Meleedamage 10
  SeeSound "flyingbalrog/sight"
  PainSound "flyingbalrog/pain"
  DeathSound "flyingbalrog/death"
  ActiveSound "flyingbalrog/idle"
  MeleeSound "Baron/Melee"
  ReactionTime 5
  Monster
  +NoGravity
  +NoBlood
  +Float
  +DontHurtSpecies
  Obituary "%o was flash-fried by a Flying Balrog."
  HitObituary "%o found the Flying Balrog too hot to handle."

  Damagefactor "Crush", 8.0
  Damagefactor "Fire", 0.125
  Damagefactor "Ice", 1.875
  DamageFactor "Holy", 2 // Demons = +200% Holy Damage

  PainChance 30
  PainChance "Ice", 100
  PainChance "Fire", 4
  Painchance "Holy", 90 // Demons = +300% Pain Chance
  Painchance "GravityHP", 255
  Painchance "GravityMP", 255
  Painchance "GravityHPMP", 255 

  States
  {
  CheckMapSkillSpawn:
    TNT1 A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(872,0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 1 A_SetUserVar("user_checkmapskill",user_checkmapskill+1)
    Goto Spawn+2
  CheckMapSkillSee:
    TNT1 A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(872,0,0,0,0)
    TNT1 A 1 A_SetUserVar("user_checkmapskill",user_checkmapskill+1)
    Goto See+1
  Spawn:
    FRIT A 0
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_checkmapskill < 1,"CheckMapSkillSpawn")
    FRIT AABB 4 Bright A_Look
    Goto Spawn+4
  Idle:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_checkmapskill < 1,"CheckMapSkillSpawn")
    FRIT ABCD 4 Bright A_Look
    Loop
  See:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_checkmapskill < 1,"CheckMapSkillSee")
    FRIT AABBCCDD 2 Bright A_Chase
    Loop
  StartShockCheck1:
    FRIT G 0 A_Jump(192, "Attack1")
  StartShock1:
    FRIT E 6 Bright A_FaceTarget
    FRIT F 6 Bright A_FaceTarget
    FRIT G 0 A_SetUserVar("user_theta",0)
  Shock1:
    FRIT G 0 Bright A_CustomMissile("FlyingBalrogShot1", 44, 12, 15+user_theta) // Off Left
    FRIT G 0 Bright A_CustomMissile("FlyingBalrogShot1", 44, 0, 0+user_theta) // Center
    FRIT G 0 Bright A_CustomMissile("FlyingBalrogShot1", 44, -12, -15+user_theta) // Off Right
    FRIT G 0 A_SetUserVar("user_theta",user_theta+6)
    FRIT G 0 A_JumpIf(user_theta==360,"StartShock1b")
    Loop
  StartShock1b:
    FRIT G 1 Bright A_FaceTarget
    FRIT G 0 A_SetUserVar("user_theta",0)
  Shock1b:
    FRIT G 0 Bright A_CustomMissile("FlyingBalrogShot1", 44, 8, 10+user_theta) // Partially Left
    FRIT G 0 Bright A_CustomMissile("FlyingBalrogShot1", 44, -8, -10+user_theta) // Partially Right
    FRIT G 0 A_SetUserVar("user_theta",user_theta+6)
    FRIT G 0 A_JumpIf(user_theta==360,"StartShock1c")
    Loop
  StartShock1c:
    FRIT G 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
    FRIT G 0 A_SetUserVar("user_theta",0)
  Shock1c:
    FRIT G 0 Bright A_CustomMissile("FlyingBalrogShot2", 44, 6, 9+user_theta)
    FRIT G 0 Bright A_CustomMissile("FlyingBalrogShot2", 44, 0, 0+user_theta)
    FRIT G 0 Bright A_CustomMissile("FlyingBalrogShot2", 44, -6, -9+user_theta)
    FRIT G 0 A_SetUserVar("user_theta",user_theta+6)
    FRIT G 0 A_JumpIf(user_theta==360,"EndShock1")
    Loop
  EndShock1:
    FRIT G 4 Bright A_FaceTarget
    FRIT G 6 Bright A_FaceTarget
    goto See

  Missile:
    FRIT E 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(user_HPCritRange, "StartShock1")
    FRIT E 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(user_HPLowRange, "StartShockCheck1")
  Attack1:
    FRIT E 6 Bright A_FaceTarget
    FRIT F 6 Bright A_FaceTarget
// Five Shot1s (spreading pattern)
    FRIT G 0 Bright A_FaceTarget
    FRIT G 0 Bright A_CustomMissile("FlyingBalrogShot1", 44, 12, 15) // Off Left
    FRIT G 0 Bright A_CustomMissile("FlyingBalrogShot1", 44, 0, 0) // Center
    FRIT G 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("FlyingBalrogShot1", 44, -12, -15) // Off Right
    FRIT G 0 Bright A_FaceTarget
  Attack1b:
    FRIT G 0 Bright A_CustomMissile("FlyingBalrogShot1", 44, 8, 10) // Partially Left
    FRIT G 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("FlyingBalrogShot1", 44, -8, -10) // Partially Right
// Three Shot2s (straight shots)
    FRIT G 0 Bright A_FaceTarget
  Attack1c:
    FRIT G 0 Bright A_CustomMissile("FlyingBalrogShot2", 44, 6, 9)
    FRIT G 0 Bright A_CustomMissile("FlyingBalrogShot2", 44, 0, 0)
    FRIT G 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("FlyingBalrogShot2", 44, -6, -9)
    FRIT G 6 Bright A_FaceTarget
    Goto See

  Pain:
    FRIT H 4 Bright
    FRIT H 4 Bright A_Pain
    Goto See
  Pain.GravityHP:
    TNT1 A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(871,0,0,0,0)
    Goto See
  Pain.GravityMP:
    TNT1 A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(871,0,1,0,0)
    Goto See
  Pain.GravityHPMP:
    TNT1 A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(871,0,2,0,0)
    Goto See
  Pain.Sceptre:
    TNT1 A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(862,0,6,0,0) // Increase EXP for Sceptre [1+(HP/300)]
    Goto Pain
  Death.Sceptre:
    TNT1 A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(862,0,6,0,0) // Increase EXP for Sceptre [1+(HP/300)]
    Goto Death
  Pain.Gauntlets:
    TNT1 A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(850,0,0,1,0) // Give some life when hurting a monster [1+(HP/500)]
    Goto Pain
  Death.Gauntlets:
    TNT1 A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(850,0,0,2,0) // Give some life when killing a monster [3+(HP/100)]
    Goto Death
  DeathCheck:
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(255, 3)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("TheOneRing",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0)   	 
    TNT1 A 0 
    goto Death+1
  Death:
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(1, "DeathCheck")
    FRIT I 0 Bright A_NoGravity
    FRIT I 6 Bright A_Scream
    FRIT I 0 Bright A_PlaySound("flyingbalrog/death2",3)
    FRIT J 5 Bright A_NoBlocking
    FRIT KLMNOPQR 4 Bright
    TNT1 A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(872,0,1,0,0)
    Stop
  }
}

// The Special "Weakened" Flying Balrog that serves as a mini-boss in the prolouge level
Actor WeakenedFlyingBalrog : FlyingBalrog 26557
{
 var int user_theta;
  var int user_MaxHP; var int user_HPLowRange; var int user_HPCritRange; var int user_HPBuffRange; var int user_HPXDeathRange;
 var int user_checkmapskill; // For checking if a monster has been given Skill/Map inventory items yet.
  dropitem DoomSpellMana1 36 50
  dropitem DoomSpellMana2 30 125
  dropitem DoomSpellMana3 24 350
  dropitem Berserk 2
  dropitem HealthBonus 2
  dropitem HealthBonus 2
  dropitem ArmorBonus 2
  dropitem ArmorBonus 2
  dropitem MaxHealthBonus 1
  dropitem MaxHealthBonus 1
  dropitem FloraRandomArmor

 Health 375 // 75% weaker
 PainChance 120 // 4x more likely to flinch
 Mass 100 // 75% lighter
 Meleedamage 3 // 75% weaker
 Alpha 0.75

  States
  {
  Missile:
    FRIT E 6 Bright A_FaceTarget
    FRIT F 6 Bright A_FaceTarget
// Five Shot1s (spreading pattern)
    FRIT G 0 Bright A_FaceTarget
    FRIT G 0 Bright A_CustomMissile("WeakenedBalrogShot1", 44, 12, 15) // Off Left
    FRIT G 0 Bright A_CustomMissile("WeakenedBalrogShot1", 44, 0, 0) // Center
    FRIT G 1 Bright A_CustomMissile("WeakenedBalrogShot1", 44, -12, -15) // Off Right
    FRIT G 0 Bright A_FaceTarget
    FRIT G 0 Bright A_CustomMissile("WeakenedBalrogShot1", 44, 8, 10) // Partially Left
    FRIT G 3 Bright A_CustomMissile("WeakenedBalrogShot1", 44, -8, -10) // Partially Right
// Three Shot2s (straight shots)
    FRIT G 0 Bright A_FaceTarget
    FRIT G 0 Bright A_CustomMissile("WeakenedBalrogShot2", 44, 6, 9)
    FRIT G 0 Bright A_CustomMissile("WeakenedBalrogShot2", 44, 0, 0)
    FRIT G 4 Bright A_CustomMissile("WeakenedBalrogShot2", 44, -6, -9)
    FRIT G 6 Bright A_FaceTarget
    Goto See
  Pain.GravityHP:
    TNT1 A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(871,0,0,0,0)
    Goto See
  Pain.GravityMP:
    TNT1 A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(871,0,1,0,0)
    Goto See
  Pain.GravityHPMP:
    TNT1 A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(871,0,2,0,0)
    Goto See
  Pain.Sceptre:
    TNT1 A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(862,0,2,0,0) // Increase EXP for Sceptre [1+(HP/300)]
    Goto Pain
  Death.Sceptre:
    TNT1 A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(862,0,2,0,0) // Increase EXP for Sceptre [1+(HP/300)]
    Goto Death
  Pain.Gauntlets:
    TNT1 A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(850,0,0,1,0) // Give some life when hurting a monster [1+(HP/500)]
    Goto Pain
  Death.Gauntlets:
    TNT1 A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(850,0,0,2,0) // Give some life when killing a monster [3+(HP/100)]
    Goto Death
  DeathCheck:
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(255, 3)
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("TheOneRing",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0)   	 
    TNT1 A 0 
    goto Death+1
  Death:
    TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(1, "DeathCheck")
    FRIT I 0 Bright A_NoGravity
    FRIT I 6 Bright A_Scream
    FRIT I 0 Bright A_PlaySound("flyingbalrog/death2",3)
    FRIT J 5 Bright A_NoBlocking
    FRIT KLMNOPQR 4 Bright
    TNT1 A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(872,0,1,0,0)
    Stop
 }
}

// TODO - Hell Cleric
Actor HellClericBall : DoomImpBall
{
 Scale 1.25
 Speed 15
 Fastspeed 30
 Damage (32+(random(3,6)*random(9,16))) // 59-128 per shot
 Obituary "%o was burned and flamed by a Hell Cleric."

 states
 {
  Spawn:
   FRB1 A 4 Bright
   FRB1 B 4 Bright
   FRB1 C 4 Bright
   loop
  Death:
   FRB1 DEFGH 4 Bright
   stop
 }
}

Actor HellClericDarkBall : DarkImpBall
{
 Scale 1.25
 Speed 30
 Fastspeed 90
 Damage (24+(random(4,7)*random(9,16))) // 60-136 per shot
 Obituary "%o was burned and flamed by a Hell Cleric."

 states
 {
  Spawn:
   FX15 A 4 Bright
   FX15 B 4 Bright A_SeekerMissile (10,20)
   FX15 C 4 Bright
   FX15 D 4 Bright A_SeekerMissile (10,20)
   loop
  Death:
   FX15 DEFG 4 Bright
   stop
 }
}

Actor HellCleric 21123
{
 var int user_theta;
 var int user_MaxHP; var int user_HPLowRange; var int user_HPCritRange; var int user_HPBuffRange; var int user_HPXDeathRange;
 var int user_checkmapskill; // For checking if a monster has been given Skill/Map inventory items yet.
 dropitem DoomSpellMana1 36 50
 dropitem DoomSpellMana2 30 125
 dropitem DoomSpellMana3 24 350
 dropitem HealthBonus 2
 dropitem HealthBonus 2
 dropitem HealthBonus 2
 dropitem HealthBonus 2
 dropitem ArmorBonus 2
 dropitem ArmorBonus 2
 dropitem ArmorBonus 2
 dropitem ArmorBonus 2
 dropitem MaxHealthBonus 1
 dropitem MaxHealthBonus 1
 dropitem MaxHealthBonus 1
 dropitem MaxHealthBonus 1
 dropitem SauronGauntlets 1
 dropitem SauronHelmet 1
 dropitem FloraRandomArmor

 Health 200
 Height 56
 Radius 20
 Mass 250
 Painchance 16
 Speed 12
 ReactionTime 5
 seesound "hellcleric/sight"
 painsound "hellcleric/pain"
 deathsound "hellcleric/death"
 activesound "hellcleric/active" 
 Monster
 +Solid
 +FloorClip
 +DontHurtSpecies
 Damage (3+(11*(random(6,13)))) // 69-146 per whack
 Obituary "%o was burned and flamed by a Hell Cleric."
 HitObituary "%o had %p head bashed in by a Hell Cleric."

  Damagefactor "Crush", 16
  DamageFactor "Holy", 2 // Demons = +200% Holy Damage

  Painchance "Holy", 15 // Demons = +300% Pain Chance
  Painchance "GravityHP", 255
  Painchance "GravityMP", 255
  Painchance "GravityHPMP", 255 

 states
 {
  CheckMapSkillSpawn:
   TNT1 A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(872,0,0,0,0)
   TNT1 A 1 A_SetUserVar("user_checkmapskill",user_checkmapskill+1)
   Goto Spawn+2
  CheckMapSkillSee:
   TNT1 A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(872,0,0,0,0)
   TNT1 A 1 A_SetUserVar("user_checkmapskill",user_checkmapskill+1)
   Goto See+1

  Spawn:
   HELC A 0
   TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_checkmapskill < 1,"CheckMapSkillSpawn")
   HELC A 4 A_Look
   HELC A 4 A_Look
   Goto Spawn+2

  See:
   TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(user_checkmapskill < 1,"CheckMapSkillSee")
   HELC A 4 A_Chase
   HELC B 4 A_Chase
   HELC C 4 A_Chase
   HELC D 0 A_Jump(32, 3)
   HELC D 4 A_Chase
   HELC D 0 A_Jump(256, "See")
   HELC D 4 A_Chase ("Melee","Missile", CHF_FASTCHASE | CHF_NIGHTMAREFAST)
   loop

  StartShockCheck:
    HELC E 0 A_Jump(64, "StartShockCheck2")
    goto StartShockCheck1
  StartShock:
    HELC E 0 A_Jump(64, "StartShock2")
    goto StartShock1

  StartShockCheck1:
    HELC E 0 A_Jump(192, "AttackType1")
  StartShock1:
    HELC E 4 Bright A_FaceTarget
    HELC E 0 A_SetUserVar("user_theta",0)
  Shock1:
    HELC G 0 Bright A_CustomMissile("HellClericBall", 24, 0, user_theta)
    HELC G 0 Bright A_CustomMeleeAttack( 3+(11*(random(6,13))), "imp/melee", "none")
    HELC G 0 A_SetUserVar("user_theta",user_theta+4)
    HELC G 0 A_JumpIf(user_theta==360,"StartShock1b")
    Loop
  StartShock1b:
    HELC G 4 Bright A_FaceTarget
    HELC F 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
    HELC F 0 A_SetUserVar("user_theta",0)
  Shock1b:
    HELC G 0 Bright A_CustomMissile("HellClericBall", 24, 0, user_theta)
    HELC G 0 Bright A_CustomMeleeAttack( 3+(11*(random(6,13))), "imp/melee", "none")
    HELC G 0 A_SetUserVar("user_theta",user_theta+4)
    HELC G 0 A_JumpIf(user_theta==360,"StartShock1c")
    Loop
  StartShock1c:
    HELC G 4 Bright A_FaceTarget
    HELC F 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
    HELC E 0 A_SetUserVar("user_theta",0)
  Shock1c:
    HELC G 0 Bright A_CustomMissile("HellClericBall", 24, 0, user_theta)
    HELC G 0 Bright A_CustomMeleeAttack( 3+(11*(random(6,13))), "imp/melee", "none")
    HELC G 0 A_SetUserVar("user_theta",user_theta+4)
    HELC G 0 A_JumpIf(user_theta==360,"EndShock1")
    Loop
  EndShock1:
    HELC G 4 Bright A_FaceTarget
    goto See

  StartShockCheck2:
    HELC E 0 A_Jump(192, "AttackType2")
  StartShock2:
    HELC E 4 Bright A_FaceTarget
    HELC E 0 A_SetUserVar("user_theta",0)
  Shock2:
    HELC G 0 Bright A_CustomMissile("HellClericDarkBall", 24, 0, user_theta)
    HELC G 0 Bright A_CustomMeleeAttack( 7+(12*(random(6,12))), "imp/melee", "none")
    HELC G 0 A_SetUserVar("user_theta",user_theta+4)
    HELC G 0 A_JumpIf(user_theta==360,"StartShock2b")
    Loop
  StartShock2b:
    HELC G 4 Bright A_FaceTarget
    HELC F 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
    HELC F 0 A_SetUserVar("user_theta",0)
  Shock2b:
    HELC G 0 Bright A_CustomMissile("HellClericDarkBall", 24, 0, user_theta)
    HELC G 0 Bright A_CustomMeleeAttack( 7+(12*(random(6,12))), "imp/melee", "none")
    HELC G 0 A_SetUserVar("user_theta",user_theta+4)
    HELC G 0 A_JumpIf(user_theta==360,"StartShock2c")
    Loop
  StartShock2c:
    HELC G 4 Bright A_FaceTarget
    HELC F 3 Bright A_FaceTarget
    HELC E 0 A_SetUserVar("user_theta",0)
  Shock2c:
    HELC G 0 Bright A_CustomMissile("HellClericDarkBall", 24, 0, user_theta)
    HELC G 0 Bright A_CustomMeleeAttack( 7+(12*(random(6,12))), "imp/melee", "none")
    HELC G 0 A_SetUserVar("user_theta",user_theta+4)
    HELC G 0 A_JumpIf(user_theta==360,"EndShock2")
    Loop
  EndShock2:
    HELC G 4 Bright A_FaceTarget
    goto See

  Melee:
  Missile:
   HELC E 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(user_HPCritRange, "StartShock")
   HELC E 0 A_JumpIfHealthLower(user_HPLowRange, "StartShockCheck")
   HELC E 0 A_Jump(64, "AttackType2")
  AttackType1:
   // Imp-like Attack
   HELC E 4 A_FaceTarget
   HELC G 4 A_BasicAttack (3+(11*(random(6,13))), "imp/melee", "HellClericBall", 24) 
   HELC F 3 A_FaceTarget
   HELC G 4 A_BasicAttack (3+(11*(random(6,13))), "imp/melee", "HellClericBall", 24) 
   HELC F 3 A_FaceTarget
   HELC G 4 A_BasicAttack (3+(11*(random(6,13))), "imp/melee", "HellClericBall", 24) 
   Goto See
  AttackType2:
   // Dark Imp-like Attack
   HELC E 4 A_FaceTarget
   HELC G 4 A_BasicAttack (7+(12*(random(6,12))), "imp/melee", "HellClericDarkBall", 24) 
   HELC F 3 A_FaceTarget
   HELC G 4 A_BasicAttack (7+(12*(random(6,12))), "imp/melee", "HellClericDarkBall", 24) 
   HELC F 3 A_FaceTarget
   HELC G 4 A_BasicAttack (7+(12*(random(6,12))), "imp/melee", "HellClericDarkBall", 24) 
   Goto See

  Pain:
   HELC H 2 A_PlaySound("hellcleric/pain")
   goto See

  Pain.GravityHP:
   TNT1 A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(871,0,0,0,0)
   Goto See
  Pain.GravityMP:
   TNT1 A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(871,0,1,0,0)
   Goto See
  Pain.GravityHPMP:
   TNT1 A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(871,0,2,0,0)
   Goto See
  Pain.Sceptre:
   TNT1 A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(862,0,2,0,0) // Increase EXP for Sceptre [1+(HP/300)]
   Goto Pain
  Death.Sceptre:
   TNT1 A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(862,0,2,0,0) // Increase EXP for Sceptre [1+(HP/300)]
   Goto Death
  Pain.Gauntlets:
   TNT1 A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(850,0,0,1,0) // Give some life when hurting a monster [1+(HP/500)]
   Goto Pain
  Death.Gauntlets:
   TNT1 A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(850,0,0,2,0) // Give some life when killing a monster [3+(HP/100)]
   Goto Death
  DeathCheck:
   TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(255, 3)
   TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("TheOneRing",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0)   	 
   TNT1 A 0 
   goto Death+1
  Death:
   TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(1, "DeathCheck")
   HELC I 5
   HELC J 5 A_PlaySound("hellcleric/death")
   HELC K 5
   HELC L 5 A_NoBlocking
   TNT1 A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(872,0,1,0,0)
   HELC M -1

  XDeathCheck:
   TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(255, 3)
   TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("TheOneRing",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0)
   TNT1 A 0 
   goto XDeath+1
  XDeath:
   TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(1, "XDeathCheck")
   HELC N 5
   HELC O 5 A_XScream
   HELC P 5
   HELC Q 5 A_NoBlocking
   HELC RSTU 5
   TNT1 A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(872,0,1,0,0)
   HELC V -1

  Raise:
   HELC LKJI 5 ACS_ExecuteAlways(872,0,0,0,0)
   goto See
 }
}

Actor StealthHellCleric : HellCleric 26558
{
  dropitem DoomSpellMana1 36 50
  dropitem DoomSpellMana2 30 125
  dropitem DoomSpellMana3 24 350
  dropitem HealthBonus 2
  dropitem HealthBonus 2
  dropitem HealthBonus 2
  dropitem HealthBonus 2
  dropitem ArmorBonus 2
  dropitem ArmorBonus 2
  dropitem ArmorBonus 2
  dropitem ArmorBonus 2

  dropitem MaxHealthBonus 1
  dropitem MaxHealthBonus 1
  dropitem MaxHealthBonus 1
  dropitem MaxHealthBonus 1
  dropitem SauronGauntlets 1
  dropitem SauronHelmet 1
  dropitem FloraRandomArmor

  obituary "%o thought %g saw a Hell Cleric."
  renderstyle Translucent
  alpha 0
  +STEALTH
}

actor BaseAttackMonster : PowerDamage { inventory.icon "NULLA0" Powerup.Duration -604800 }
actor BaseDefenseMonster : PowerProtection { inventory.icon "NULLA0" Powerup.Duration -604800 }
actor BaseSpeedMonster : PowerSpeed { inventory.icon "NULLA0" Powerup.Duration -604800 +POWERSPEED.NOTRAIL }

actor MonsterAttack-VeryEasy : BaseAttackMonster { damagefactor "normal", 0.6667 }
actor MonsterDefense-VeryEasy : BaseDefenseMonster { damagefactor "normal", 1.5 }
actor MonsterSpeed-VeryEasy : BaseSpeedMonster { speed 0.916666 }

actor MonsterAttack-Easy : BaseAttackMonster { damagefactor "normal", 0.8333 }
actor MonsterDefense-Easy : BaseDefenseMonster { damagefactor "normal", 1.2 }
actor MonsterSpeed-Easy : BaseSpeedMonster { speed 0.958333 }

actor MonsterAttack-Normal : BaseAttackMonster { damagefactor "normal", 1 }
actor MonsterDefense-Normal : BaseDefenseMonster { damagefactor "normal", 1 }
actor MonsterSpeed-Normal : BaseSpeedMonster { speed 1 }

actor MonsterAttack-Hard : BaseAttackMonster { damagefactor "normal", 1.1667 }
actor MonsterDefense-Hard : BaseDefenseMonster { damagefactor "normal", 0.857143 }
actor MonsterSpeed-Hard : BaseSpeedMonster { speed 1.041667 }

actor MonsterAttack-VeryHard : BaseAttackMonster { damagefactor "normal", 1.5 }
actor MonsterDefense-VeryHard : BaseDefenseMonster { damagefactor "normal", 0.666667 }
actor MonsterSpeed-VeryHard : BaseSpeedMonster { speed 1.125 }

actor MonsterAttack-ExtremelyHard : BaseAttackMonster { damagefactor "normal", 2 }
actor MonsterDefense-ExtremelyHard : BaseDefenseMonster { damagefactor "normal", 0.5 }
actor MonsterSpeed-ExtremelyHard : BaseSpeedMonster { speed 1.25 }


//*****************************************************************************************
//** Definitions to make monsters progressively stronger as the maps advance on [DVI-DS] **
//*****************************************************************************************
// MAP01: Insurgents [baseline]
actor MonsterAttack-DVI-MAP01 : BaseAttackMonster { damagefactor "normal", 1 }
actor MonsterDefense-DVI-MAP01 : BaseDefenseMonster { damagefactor "normal", 1 }
actor MonsterSpeed-DVI-MAP01 : BaseSpeedMonster { speed 1 }

// MAP02: Torture Chamber [+25%]
actor MonsterAttack-DVI-MAP02 : BaseAttackMonster { damagefactor "normal", 1.25 }
actor MonsterDefense-DVI-MAP02 : BaseDefenseMonster { damagefactor "normal", 0.8 }
actor MonsterSpeed-DVI-MAP02 : BaseSpeedMonster { speed 1.0625 }

// MAP03: Cathedral [+50%]
actor MonsterAttack-DVI-MAP03 : BaseAttackMonster { damagefactor "normal", 1.75 }
actor MonsterDefense-DVI-MAP03 : BaseDefenseMonster { damagefactor "normal", 0.571429 }
actor MonsterSpeed-DVI-MAP03 : BaseSpeedMonster { speed 1.1875 }

// MAP04: End of Days [+75%]
actor MonsterAttack-DVI-MAP04 : BaseAttackMonster { damagefactor "normal", 2.5 }
actor MonsterDefense-DVI-MAP04 : BaseDefenseMonster { damagefactor "normal", 0.4 }
actor MonsterSpeed-DVI-MAP04 : BaseSpeedMonster { speed 1.375 }

//******************************************************************************************
//** Definitions to make monsters progressively stronger as the maps advance on [DVII-DS] **
//******************************************************************************************
// MAP01: Entryway Pass [baseline]
actor MonsterAttack-DVII-MAP01 : BaseAttackMonster { damagefactor "normal", 1 }
actor MonsterDefense-DVII-MAP01 : BaseDefenseMonster { damagefactor "normal", 1 }
actor MonsterSpeed-DVII-MAP01 : BaseSpeedMonster { speed 1 }

// MAP02: Mutagen [+3%]
actor MonsterAttack-DVII-MAP02 : BaseAttackMonster { damagefactor "normal", 1.03 }
actor MonsterDefense-DVII-MAP02 : BaseDefenseMonster { damagefactor "normal", 0.970874 }
actor MonsterSpeed-DVII-MAP02 : BaseSpeedMonster { speed 1.0075 }

// MAP03: Crouching Demon, Hidden Archvile [+6%]

//********************
//**Monster Spawners**
//********************

// Zombieman
actor ZombiemanSpawner : CustomInventory replaces Zombieman
{
 +ISMONSTER
 +RANDOMIZE
 states
 {
    UpgradeClassStealth2aalt:
     TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PlasmaGuy",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_TRANSFERAMBUSHFLAG,0)
     stop

    UpgradeClassStealth2a:
     TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf( ACS_ExecuteWithResult(878) == 1, "UpgradeClassStealth2aalt") // Prevents Repeater and Karasawa Zombies from spawning in DVI-DS.
     TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128, 3)
     TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RepeaterZombie",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_TRANSFERAMBUSHFLAG,0)
     TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256, 2)
     TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("KarasawaGuy",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_TRANSFERAMBUSHFLAG,0)
     stop
    UpgradeClassStealth2: 
     TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf( random(1,256) <= ACS_ExecuteWithResult(876) , "UpgradeClassStealth2a")
     TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PlasmaGuy",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_TRANSFERAMBUSHFLAG,0)
     stop

    UpgradeClassStealth:
     TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128, 3)
     TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256, "UpgradeClassStealth2")
     TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256, 2)
     TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("StealthRocketLauncherGuy",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_TRANSFERAMBUSHFLAG,0)
     stop

  UpgradeStealth:
   TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf( random(1,256) <= ACS_ExecuteWithResult(876) , "UpgradeClassStealth")
   TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DSStealthZombieman",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_TRANSFERAMBUSHFLAG,0)
   stop

    UpgradeClass2aalt:
     TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PlasmaGuy",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_TRANSFERAMBUSHFLAG,0)
     stop

    UpgradeClass2a:
     TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf( ACS_ExecuteWithResult(878) == 1, "UpgradeClass2aalt") // Prevents Repeater and Karasawa Zombies from spawning in DVI-DS.
     TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128, 3)
     TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RepeaterZombie",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_TRANSFERAMBUSHFLAG,0)
     TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256, 2)
     TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("KarasawaGuy",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_TRANSFERAMBUSHFLAG,0)
     stop
    UpgradeClass2: 
     TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf( random(1,256) <= ACS_ExecuteWithResult(876) , "UpgradeClass2a")
     TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PlasmaGuy",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_TRANSFERAMBUSHFLAG,0)
     stop

    UpgradeClass:
     TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128, 3)
     TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256, "UpgradeClass2")
     TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256, 2)
     TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("RocketLauncherGuy",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_TRANSFERAMBUSHFLAG,0)
     stop

  Spawn:
   TNT1 A 0 
   TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf( random(1,256) <= ACS_ExecuteWithResult(877) , "UpgradeStealth")
   TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf( random(1,256) <= ACS_ExecuteWithResult(876) , "UpgradeClass")
   TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DSZombieman",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_TRANSFERAMBUSHFLAG,0)
   stop
 }
}

actor StealthZombiemanSpawner : CustomInventory replaces StealthZombieman
{
 +ISMONSTER
 +RANDOMIZE
 states
 {
    UpgradeClass2a:
     TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128, 3)
     TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("StealthRepeaterZombie",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_TRANSFERAMBUSHFLAG,0)
     TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256, 2)
     TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("StealthKarasawaGuy",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_TRANSFERAMBUSHFLAG,0)
     stop
    UpgradeClass2: 
     TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf( random(1,256) <= ACS_ExecuteWithResult(876) , "UpgradeClass2a")
     TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("StealthPlasmaGuy",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_TRANSFERAMBUSHFLAG,0)
     stop

    UpgradeClass:
     TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128, 3)
     TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256, "UpgradeClass2")
     TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(256, 2)
     TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("StealthRocketLauncherGuy",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_TRANSFERAMBUSHFLAG,0)
     stop

  NormalSpawn:
   TNT1 A 0 
   TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf( random(1,256) <= ACS_ExecuteWithResult(876) , "UpgradeClass")
   TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DSStealthZombieman",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_TRANSFERAMBUSHFLAG,0)
   stop
 }
}

// Demon
actor DemonSpawner : CustomInventory replaces Demon
{
 +ISMONSTER
 +RANDOMIZE
 states
 {
  UpgradeSpectre:
   TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("BloodSpectre",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_TRANSFERAMBUSHFLAG,0)
   stop
  MakeSpectre:
   TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf( random(1,256) <= ACS_ExecuteWithResult(876) , "UpgradeSpectre")
   TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf( random(1,256) <= ACS_ExecuteWithResult(877) , "UpgradeStealth")
   TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DSSpectre",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_TRANSFERAMBUSHFLAG,0)
   stop

    UpgradeClassStealth:
     TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("StealthBloodDemon",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_TRANSFERAMBUSHFLAG,0)
     stop

  UpgradeStealth:
   TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf( random(1,256) <= ACS_ExecuteWithResult(876) , "UpgradeClassStealth")
   TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DSStealthDemon",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_TRANSFERAMBUSHFLAG,0)
   stop

    UpgradeClass:
     TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("BloodDemon",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_TRANSFERAMBUSHFLAG,0)
     stop

  Spawn:
   TNT1 A 0 
   TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf( random(1,256) <= ACS_ExecuteWithResult(876) , "MakeSpectre")
   TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf( random(1,256) <= ACS_ExecuteWithResult(876) , "UpgradeClass")
   TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf( random(1,256) <= ACS_ExecuteWithResult(877) , "UpgradeStealth")
   TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DSDemon",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_TRANSFERAMBUSHFLAG,0)
   stop
 }
}

     stop

    stop
   UpgradeClassHadesStealth:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf( random(1,1024) <= ACS_ExecuteWithResult(876) , "UpgradeClassHadesStealth2")
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf( random(1,256) <= ACS_ExecuteWithResult(877) , "UpgradeClassHadesStealth")
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("StealthHadesElemental",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_TRANSFERAMBUSHFLAG,0)
    stop

   UpgradeClassHades2:
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HadesOverlord",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_TRANSFERAMBUSHFLAG,0)
    stop
   UpgradeClassHades:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf( random(1,768) <= ACS_ExecuteWithResult(876) , "UpgradeClassHades2")
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf( random(1,256) <= ACS_ExecuteWithResult(877) , "UpgradeClassHadesStealth")
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HadesElemental",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_TRANSFERAMBUSHFLAG,0)
    stop

  Spawn:
   TNT1 A 0 
   TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf( random(1,256) <= ACS_ExecuteWithResult(876) , "UpgradeClass")
   TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf( random(1,256) <= ACS_ExecuteWithResult(877) , "UpgradeStealth")
   TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf( random(1,768) <= ACS_ExecuteWithResult(876) , "UpgradeClassHades")
   TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DSCacoDemon",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_TRANSFERAMBUSHFLAG,0)
   stop
 }
}

actor StealthCacodemonSpawner : CustomInventory replaces StealthCacodemon
{
 +ISMONSTER
 +RANDOMIZE
 states
 {
    UpgradeClass4alt:
     TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("StealthAbaddon",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_TRANSFERAMBUSHFLAG,0)
     stop
    UpgradeClass4:
     TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf( ACS_ExecuteWithResult(878) == 1, "UpgradeClass4alt") // Prevents Repeater and Karasawa Zombies from spawning in DVI-DS.
     TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("StealthHadesOverlord",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_TRANSFERAMBUSHFLAG,0)
     stop
    UpgradeClass3alt:
     TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("StealthAbaddon",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_TRANSFERAMBUSHFLAG,0)
     stop
    UpgradeClass3:
     TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf( ACS_ExecuteWithResult(878) == 1, "UpgradeClass3alt") // Prevents Repeater and Karasawa Zombies from spawning in DVI-DS.
     TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf( random(1,256) <= ACS_ExecuteWithResult(876) , "UpgradeClass4")
     TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("StealthHadesElemental",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_TRANSFERAMBUSHFLAG,0)
     stop
    UpgradeClass2:
     TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf( random(1,256) <= ACS_ExecuteWithResult(876) , "UpgradeClass3")
     TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("StealthAbaddon",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_TRANSFERAMBUSHFLAG,0)
     stop
    UpgradeClass:
     TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf( random(1,256) <= ACS_ExecuteWithResult(876) , "UpgradeClass2")
     TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("StealthCacolantern",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_TRANSFERAMBUSHFLAG,0)
     stop

   UpgradeClassHades2:
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("StealthHadesOverlord",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_TRANSFERAMBUSHFLAG,0)
    stop
   UpgradeClassHades:
    TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf( random(1,768) <= ACS_ExecuteWithResult(876) , "UpgradeClassHades2")
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("StealthHadesElemental",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_TRANSFERAMBUSHFLAG,0)
    stop

  Spawn:
   TNT1 A 0 
   TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf( random(1,256) <= ACS_ExecuteWithResult(876) , "UpgradeClass")
   TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf( random(1,768) <= ACS_ExecuteWithResult(876) , "UpgradeClassHades")
   TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DSStealthCacoDemon",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_TRANSFERAMBUSHFLAG,0)
   stop
 }

     stop

   TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("StealthPainElemental",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_TRANSFERAMBUSHFLAG,0)
   stop

    UpgradeClass2:
     TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HadesOverlord",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_TRANSFERAMBUSHFLAG,0)
     stop
    UpgradeClass:
     TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf( random(1,256) <= ACS_ExecuteWithResult(876) , "UpgradeClass2")
     TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("HadesElemental",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_TRANSFERAMBUSHFLAG,0)
     stop

   TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("StealthPainElemental",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_TRANSFERAMBUSHFLAG,0)
   stop
  Spawnalt:
   TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf( random(1,256) <= ACS_ExecuteWithResult(877) , "Spawnalt2")
   TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DSPainElemental",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_TRANSFERAMBUSHFLAG,0)
   stop
  Spawn:
   TNT1 A 0

   TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DSPainElemental",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_TRANSFERAMBUSHFLAG,0)
   stop
 }
}

// Arachnotron
actor ArachnotronSpawner : CustomInventory replaces Arachnotron
{
 +ISMONSTER
 +RANDOMIZE
 states
 {
    UpgradeClassStealth:
     TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("StealthFusionArachnotron",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_TRANSFERAMBUSHFLAG,0)
     stop

  UpgradeStealth:
   TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf( random(1,256) <= ACS_ExecuteWithResult(876) , "UpgradeClassStealth")
   TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(64,"SpawnStealthRail")
   TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DSStealthArachnotron",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_TRANSFERAMBUSHFLAG,0)
   stop

   SpawnStealthRail:
    TNT1 A 0 
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("StealthRailArachnotron",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_TRANSFERAMBUSHFLAG,0)
    stop


    UpgradeClass:
     TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("FusionArachnotron",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_TRANSFERAMBUSHFLAG,0)
     stop

  Spawn:
   TNT1 A 0 
   TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf( random(1,256) <= ACS_ExecuteWithResult(876) , "UpgradeClass")
   TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf( random(1,256) <= ACS_ExecuteWithResult(877) , "UpgradeStealth")
   TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(64,"SpawnRail")
   TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DSArachnotron",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_TRANSFERAMBUSHFLAG,0)
   stop

   SpawnRail:
    TNT1 A 0 
    TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DSRailArachnotron",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_TRANSFERAMBUSHFLAG,0)
    stop

 }
}

     stop

     TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DSStealthBaron",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_TRANSFERAMBUSHFLAG,0)
     stop

   TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DSStealthHellKnight",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_TRANSFERAMBUSHFLAG,0)
   stop

    UpgradeClass4:
     TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("PyroDemon",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_TRANSFERAMBUSHFLAG,0)
     stop

    UpgradeClass3:
     TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf( random(1,256) <= ACS_ExecuteWithResult(876) , "UpgradeClass4")
     TNT1 A 0 A_Jump(128, 3)
     TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("BruiserDemon",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_TRANSFERAMBUSHFLAG,0)

     TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("ArchonofHell",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_TRANSFERAMBUSHFLAG,0)
     stop
    UpgradeClass2:
     TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf( random(1,256) <= ACS_ExecuteWithResult(876) , "UpgradeClass3")
     TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("Belphegor",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_TRANSFERAMBUSHFLAG,0)
     stop
    UpgradeClass:
     TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf( random(1,256) <= ACS_ExecuteWithResult(876) , "UpgradeClass2")
     TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DSBaronofHell",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_TRANSFERAMBUSHFLAG,0)
     stop

  Spawn:
   TNT1 A 0 
   TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf( random(1,256) <= ACS_ExecuteWithResult(876) , "UpgradeClass")
   TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf( random(1,256) <= ACS_ExecuteWithResult(877) , "UpgradeStealth")
   TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DSHellKnight",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_TRANSFERAMBUSHFLAG,0)
   stop
 }

// Spider Mastermind
actor SpiderMastermindSpawner : CustomInventory replaces SpiderMastermind
{
 +ISMONSTER
 +RANDOMIZE
 states
 {
    UpgradeClassStealth:
     TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("StealthDemolisher",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_TRANSFERAMBUSHFLAG,0)
     stop

  UpgradeStealth:
   TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf( random(1,256) <= ACS_ExecuteWithResult(876) , "UpgradeClassStealth")
   TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DSStealthSpiderMastermind",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_TRANSFERAMBUSHFLAG,0)
   stop

    UpgradeClass:
     TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("Demolisher",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_TRANSFERAMBUSHFLAG,0)
     stop

  Spawn:
   TNT1 A 0 
   TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf( random(1,256) <= ACS_ExecuteWithResult(876) , "UpgradeClass")
   TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf( random(1,256) <= ACS_ExecuteWithResult(877) , "UpgradeStealth")
   TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DSSpiderMastermind",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_TRANSFERAMBUSHFLAG,0)
   stop
 }
}

actor StealthSpiderMastermindSpawner : CustomInventory
{
 +ISMONSTER
 +RANDOMIZE
 states
 {
  UpgradeClass:
   TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("StealthDemolisher",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_TRANSFERAMBUSHFLAG,0)
   stop
  Spawn:
   TNT1 A 0 
   TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf( random(1,256) <= ACS_ExecuteWithResult(876) , "UpgradeClass")
   TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DSStealthSpiderMastermind",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_TRANSFERAMBUSHFLAG,0)
   stop
 }
}

// Spider-Demolisher
actor DemolisherSpawner : CustomInventory
{
 +ISMONSTER
 +RANDOMIZE
 states
 {
  UpgradeStealth:
   TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("StealthDemolisher",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_TRANSFERAMBUSHFLAG,0)
   stop

  Spawn:
   TNT1 A 0 
   TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf( random(1,256) <= ACS_ExecuteWithResult(877) , "UpgradeStealth")
   TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("Demolisher",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_TRANSFERAMBUSHFLAG,0)
   stop
 }
}

 +ISMONSTER
 +RANDOMIZE
 states
 {
  Spawn:
   TNT1 A 0 
   TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("StealthDemolisher",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_TRANSFERAMBUSHFLAG,0)
   stop
 }

// Cyberdemon
actor CyberdemonSpawner : CustomInventory replaces Cyberdemon
{
 +ISMONSTER
 +RANDOMIZE
 states
 {
    UpgradeClassStealth:
     TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("StealthAnnihilator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_TRANSFERAMBUSHFLAG,0)
     stop

  UpgradeStealth:
   TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf( random(1,256) <= ACS_ExecuteWithResult(876) , "UpgradeClassStealth")
   TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DSStealthCyberdemon",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_TRANSFERAMBUSHFLAG,0)
   stop

    UpgradeClass:
     TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("Annihilator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_TRANSFERAMBUSHFLAG,0)
     stop

  Spawn:
   TNT1 A 0 
   TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf( random(1,256) <= ACS_ExecuteWithResult(876) , "UpgradeClass")
   TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf( random(1,256) <= ACS_ExecuteWithResult(877) , "UpgradeStealth")
   TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DSCyberdemon",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_TRANSFERAMBUSHFLAG,0)
   stop
 }
}

  Spawn:

   TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf( random(1,256) <= ACS_ExecuteWithResult(876) , "UpgradeClass")
   TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("DSStealthCyberdemon",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_TRANSFERAMBUSHFLAG,0)
   stop
 }
}

 +ISMONSTER

  UpgradeStealth:
   TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("StealthAnnihilator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_TRANSFERAMBUSHFLAG,0)
   stop

  Spawn:
   TNT1 A 0 
   TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf( random(1,256) <= ACS_ExecuteWithResult(877) , "UpgradeStealth")
   TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("Annihilator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_TRANSFERAMBUSHFLAG,0)
   stop
 }
}

   TNT1 A 0 A_SpawnItemEx("StealthAnnihilator",0,0,0,0,0,0,0,SXF_TRANSFERAMBUSHFLAG,0)
   stop
 }
}

// Imp's Claw Weapon - Hellcore Weapon #1
Actor DoomImpBall-Claw : DoomImpBall { DamageType "ImpClaw" }
ACTOR ImpClaw : Weapon
{
   Scale 0.625
   +FLOATBOB
   +NOAUTOAIM
   +INVENTORY.ALWAYSPICKUP
   +WEAPON.NOALERT
   Inventory.PickupMessage "You got the Imp's Claw!"
   Tag "Imp's Claw"
   States
   {
   Spawn:
      HLC2 A 0 bright
      HLC2 A 1 bright ACS_ExecuteAlways(873,0,0,0,0)
      Loop
   Ready: 
      CLAW A 1 A_WeaponReady
      Loop
   Deselect: 
      CLAW A 1 A_Lower
      Loop
   Select: 
      CLAW A 1 A_Raise
      Loop
   Fire: 
      CLAW A 0 A_JumpIfNoAmmo(1)
      CLAW B 4 A_GunFlash
      CLAW CDEF 4
      Goto Ready

   StartShockCheck:
      CLAW B 0 A_Jump(192, "Flash2")
   StartShock:
      CLAW B 0 A_Light2
      CLAW B 0 // A_LightInverse
      CLAW B 0 A_Playsound ("imp/attack")
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,100,1,0) // +1.0% Hellcore Heat, Deal Damage if already above 100% Heat
   Shock:
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("DoomImpBall-Claw",ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",3,0,1),1,8,0)
      TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",0,360) == 1,"EndShock")
      Loop
   EndShock:
      CLAW B 4 A_Light0
      Goto See
   // 10/500 [2%], 80/500 [16%]

   Flash:
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIfInventory("CriticalHealth", 0, "StartShock")
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIfInventory("LowHealth", 0, "StartShockCheck")
   Flash2: // Flash2:
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIfInventory("SpreaderAura2", 0, "Flash2Spread2")
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIfInventory("SpreaderAura1", 0, "Flash2Spread1")
      CLAW B 0 A_Playsound ("imp/attack")
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,100,1,0) // +1.0% Hellcore Heat, Deal Damage if already above 100% Heat
      CLAW B 4 A_FireCustomMissile("DoomImpBall-Claw",0,1,8,0)
      Stop

   Flash2Spread1:
      CLAW B 0 A_Playsound ("imp/attack")
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,100,1,0) // +1.0% Hellcore Heat, Deal Damage if already above 100% Heat
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("DoomImpBall-Claw",15,1,8,0,0,0) // Left
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("DoomImpBall-Claw",0,1,8,0,0,0) // Center
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("DoomImpBall-Claw",-15,1,8,0,0,0) // Right
      CLAW B 4 
      Stop

   Flash2Spread2:
      CLAW B 0 A_Playsound ("imp/attack")
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,100,1,0) // +1.0% Hellcore Heat, Deal Damage if already above 100% Heat
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("DoomImpBall-Claw",15,1,8,0,0,0) // Left
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("DoomImpBall-Claw",7.5,1,8,0,0,7.5) // Left-Top
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("DoomImpBall-Claw",7.5,1,8,0,0,-7.5) // Left-Bottom
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("DoomImpBall-Claw",0,1,8,0,0,0) // Center
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("DoomImpBall-Claw",-7.5,1,8,0,0,-7.5) // Right-Bottom
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("DoomImpBall-Claw",-7.5,1,8,0,0,7.5) // Right-Top
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("DoomImpBall-Claw",-15,1,8,0,0,0) // Right
      CLAW B 4 
      Stop

   } 
}
ACTOR ImpClawCI : CustomInventory
{
   Scale 0.625
   +FLOATBOB
   +INVENTORY.ALWAYSPICKUP
   Inventory.PickupMessage "You got the Imp's Claw!"
   States
   {
    Spawn:
      HLC2 A 0 bright
      HLC2 A 1 bright ACS_ExecuteAlways(873,0,0,0,0)
      Loop
    Pickup:
      TNT1 A 0 
      TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("ImpClaw", 1)
      TNT1 A 0 A_Playsound("pickuphellcore")
      TNT1 A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(896,0,1,0,0)
      Stop
   }
}

// Dark Imp's Claw Weapon - Hellcore Weapon #2 [placeholder sprites]
Actor DarkImpBall-Claw : DarkImpBall { DamageType "DarkImpClaw" }
ACTOR DarkImpClaw : Weapon
{
   Scale 0.625
   +FLOATBOB
   +NOAUTOAIM
   +INVENTORY.ALWAYSPICKUP
   +WEAPON.NOALERT
   Tag "Dark Imp's Claw"
   Inventory.PickupMessage "You got the Dark Imp's Claw!"
   States
   {
   Spawn:
      HLC2 B 0
      HLC2 B 1 bright ACS_ExecuteAlways(873,0,1,0,0)
      Loop
   Ready: 
      CLAW A 1 A_WeaponReady
      Loop
   Deselect: 
      CLAW A 1 A_Lower
      Loop
   Select: 
      CLAW A 1 A_Raise
      Loop
   Fire: 
      CLAW A 0 A_JumpIfNoAmmo(1)
      CLAW B 4 A_GunFlash
      CLAW CDEF 4
      Goto Ready

   StartShockCheck:
      CLAW B 0 A_Jump(192, "Flash2")
   StartShock:
      CLAW B 0 A_Light2
      CLAW B 0 // A_LightInverse
      CLAW B 0 A_Playsound ("imp/attack")
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,250,1,0) // +2.5% Hellcore Heat, Deal Damage if already above 100% Heat
   Shock:
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("DarkImpBall-Claw",ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",3,0,1),1,8,0)
      TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",0,360) == 1,"EndShock")
      Loop
   EndShock:
      CLAW B 4 A_Light0
      Goto See
   // 10/500 [2%], 80/500 [16%]

   Flash:
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIfInventory("CriticalHealth", 0, "StartShock")
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIfInventory("LowHealth", 0, "StartShockCheck")
   Flash2: // Flash2:
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIfInventory("SpreaderAura2", 0, "Flash2Spread2")
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIfInventory("SpreaderAura1", 0, "Flash2Spread1")
      CLAW B 0 A_Playsound ("imp/attack")
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,250,1,0) // +2.5% Hellcore Heat, Deal Damage if already above 100% Heat
      CLAW B 4 A_FireCustomMissile("DarkImpBall-Claw",0,1,8,0)
      Stop

   Flash2Spread1:
      CLAW B 0 A_Playsound ("imp/attack")
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,250,1,0) // +2.5% Hellcore Heat, Deal Damage if already above 100% Heat
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("DarkImpBall-Claw",15,1,8,0,0,0) // Left
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("DarkImpBall-Claw",0,1,8,0,0,0) // Center
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("DarkImpBall-Claw",-15,1,8,0,0,0) // Right
      CLAW B 4 
      Stop

   Flash2Spread2:
      CLAW B 0 A_Playsound ("imp/attack")
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,250,1,0) // +2.5% Hellcore Heat, Deal Damage if already above 100% Heat
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("DarkImpBall-Claw",15,1,8,0,0,0) // Left
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("DarkImpBall-Claw",7.5,1,8,0,0,7.5) // Left-Top
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("DarkImpBall-Claw",7.5,1,8,0,0,-7.5) // Left-Bottom
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("DarkImpBall-Claw",0,1,8,0,0,0) // Center
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("DarkImpBall-Claw",-7.5,1,8,0,0,-7.5) // Right-Bottom
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("DarkImpBall-Claw",-7.5,1,8,0,0,7.5) // Right-Top
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("DarkImpBall-Claw",-15,1,8,0,0,0) // Right
      CLAW B 4 
      Stop

   } 
}

{
   Scale 0.625
   +FLOATBOB
   +INVENTORY.ALWAYSPICKUP
   Inventory.PickupMessage "You got the Dark Imp's Claw!"
   States
   {
    Spawn:

      Stop
   }

// Cacodemon's Eye Weapon - Hellcore Weapon #3 [placeholder sprites]
Actor CacodemonBall-Claw : CacodemonBall { DamageType "CacodemonEye" }
ACTOR CacodemonEye : Weapon
{
   Scale 0.625
   +FLOATBOB
   +NOAUTOAIM
   +INVENTORY.ALWAYSPICKUP
   +WEAPON.NOALERT
   Inventory.PickupMessage "You got the Cacodemon's Eye!"
   Tag "Cacodemon's Eye"
   States
   {
   Spawn:
      HLC2 C 0
      HLC2 C 1 bright ACS_ExecuteAlways(873,0,2,0,0)
      Loop
   Ready: 
      CLAW A 1 A_WeaponReady
      Loop
   Deselect: 
      CLAW A 1 A_Lower
      Loop
   Select: 
      CLAW A 1 A_Raise
      Loop
   Fire: 
      CLAW A 0 A_JumpIfNoAmmo(1)
      CLAW B 4 A_GunFlash
      CLAW CDEF 4

      Goto Ready

   StartShockCheck:
      CLAW B 0 A_Jump(192, "Flash2")
   StartShock:
      CLAW B 0 A_Light2
      CLAW B 0 // A_LightInverse
      CLAW B 0 A_Playsound ("caco/attack")
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,150,1,0) // +1.5% Hellcore Heat, Deal Damage if already above 100% Heat
   Shock:
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("CacodemonBall-Claw",ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",4,0,1),1,8,0)
      TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",0,360) == 1,"EndShock")
      Loop
   EndShock:
      CLAW B 6 A_Light0
      Goto See
   // 10/500 [2%], 80/500 [16%]

   Flash:
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIfInventory("CriticalHealth", 0, "StartShock")
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIfInventory("LowHealth", 0, "StartShockCheck")
   Flash2: // Flash2:
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIfInventory("SpreaderAura2", 0, "Flash2Spread2")
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIfInventory("SpreaderAura1", 0, "Flash2Spread1")
      CLAW B 0 A_Playsound ("caco/attack")
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,150,1,0) // +1.5% Hellcore Heat, Deal Damage if already above 100% Heat
      CLAW B 4 A_FireCustomMissile("CacodemonBall-Claw",0,1,8,0)
      Stop

   Flash2Spread1:
      CLAW B 0 A_Playsound ("caco/attack")
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,150,1,0) // +1.5% Hellcore Heat, Deal Damage if already above 100% Heat
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("CacodemonBall-Claw",15,1,8,0,0,0) // Left
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("CacodemonBall-Claw",0,1,8,0,0,0) // Center
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("CacodemonBall-Claw",-15,1,8,0,0,0) // Right
      CLAW B 4 
      Stop

   Flash2Spread2:
      CLAW B 0 A_Playsound ("caco/attack")
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,150,1,0) // +1.5% Hellcore Heat, Deal Damage if already above 100% Heat
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("CacodemonBall-Claw",15,1,8,0,0,0) // Left
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("CacodemonBall-Claw",7.5,1,8,0,0,7.5) // Left-Top
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("CacodemonBall-Claw",7.5,1,8,0,0,-7.5) // Left-Bottom
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("CacodemonBall-Claw",0,1,8,0,0,0) // Center
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("CacodemonBall-Claw",-7.5,1,8,0,0,-7.5) // Right-Bottom
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("CacodemonBall-Claw",-7.5,1,8,0,0,7.5) // Right-Top
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("CacodemonBall-Claw",-15,1,8,0,0,0) // Right
      CLAW B 4 
      Stop

   } 
}

{
   Scale 0.625
   +FLOATBOB

   }
