// Cacolantern's Eye Weapon - Hellcore Weapon #4 [placeholder sprites]
Actor CacolanternBall-Claw : CacolanternBall { DamageType "CacolanternEye" }
ACTOR CacolanternEye : Weapon
{
   Tag "Cacolantern's Eye"
   Scale 0.625
   +FLOATBOB
   +NOAUTOAIM
   +INVENTORY.ALWAYSPICKUP
   +WEAPON.NOALERT
   Inventory.PickupMessage "You got the Cacolantern's Eye!"
   States
   {
   Spawn:
      HLC2 D 0
      HLC2 D 1 bright ACS_ExecuteAlways(873,0,3,0,0)
      Loop
   Ready: 
      CLAW A 1 A_WeaponReady
      Loop
   Deselect: 
      CLAW A 1 A_Lower
      Loop
   Select: 
      CLAW A 1 A_Raise
      Loop
   Fire: 
      CLAW A 0 A_JumpIfNoAmmo(1)
      CLAW B 4 A_GunFlash
      CLAW CDEF 4
      Goto Ready


   StartShockCheck:
      CLAW B 0 A_Jump(192, "Flash2")
   StartShock:
      CLAW B 0 A_Light2
      CLAW B 0 // A_LightInverse
      CLAW B 0 A_Playsound ("caco/attack")
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,200,1,0) // +2% Hellcore Heat, Deal Damage if already above 100% Heat
   Shock:
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("CacolanternBall-Claw",ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",4,0,1),1,8,0)
      TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",0,360) == 1,"EndShock")
      Loop
   EndShock:
      CLAW B 6 A_Light0
      Goto See
   // 10/500 [2%], 80/500 [16%]

   Flash:
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIfInventory("CriticalHealth", 0, "StartShock")
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIfInventory("LowHealth", 0, "StartShockCheck")
   Flash2: // Flash2:
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIfInventory("SpreaderAura2", 0, "Flash2Spread2")
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIfInventory("SpreaderAura1", 0, "Flash2Spread1")
      CLAW B 0 A_Playsound ("caco/attack")
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,200,1,0) // +2% Hellcore Heat, Deal Damage if already above 100% Heat
      CLAW B 4 A_FireCustomMissile("CacolanternBall-Claw",0,1,8,0)
      Stop

   Flash2Spread1:
      CLAW B 0 A_Playsound ("caco/attack")
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,200,1,0) // +2% Hellcore Heat, Deal Damage if already above 100% Heat
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("CacolanternBall-Claw",15,1,8,0,0,0) // Left
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("CacolanternBall-Claw",0,1,8,0,0,0) // Center
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("CacolanternBall-Claw",-15,1,8,0,0,0) // Right
      CLAW B 4 
      Stop

   Flash2Spread2:
      CLAW B 0 A_Playsound ("caco/attack")
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,200,1,0) // +2% Hellcore Heat, Deal Damage if already above 100% Heat
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("CacolanternBall-Claw",15,1,8,0,0,0) // Left
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("CacolanternBall-Claw",7.5,1,8,0,0,7.5) // Left-Top
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("CacolanternBall-Claw",7.5,1,8,0,0,-7.5) // Left-Bottom
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("CacolanternBall-Claw",0,1,8,0,0,0) // Center
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("CacolanternBall-Claw",-7.5,1,8,0,0,-7.5) // Right-Bottom
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("CacolanternBall-Claw",-7.5,1,8,0,0,7.5) // Right-Top
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("CacolanternBall-Claw",-15,1,8,0,0,0) // Right
      CLAW B 4 
      Stop
   } 
}

// Abaddon's Eye Weapon - Hellcore Weapon #5 [placeholder sprites]
Actor AbaddonBall-Claw : AbaddonBall { DamageType "AbaddonEye" }
ACTOR AbaddonEye : Weapon
{
   Tag "Abaddon's Eye"
   Scale 0.625
   +FLOATBOB
   +NOAUTOAIM
   +INVENTORY.ALWAYSPICKUP
   +WEAPON.NOALERT
   Inventory.PickupMessage "You got the Abaddon's Eye!"
   States
   {
   Spawn:
      HLC2 E 0
      HLC2 E 1 bright ACS_ExecuteAlways(873,0,4,0,0)
      Loop
   Ready: 
      CLAW A 1 A_WeaponReady
      Loop
   Deselect: 
      CLAW A 1 A_Lower
      Loop
   Select: 
      CLAW A 1 A_Raise
      Loop
   Fire: 
      CLAW A 0 A_JumpIfNoAmmo(1)
      CLAW B 4 A_GunFlash
      CLAW CDEF 4
      Goto Ready

   StartShockCheck:
      CLAW B 0 A_Jump(192, "Flash2")
   StartShock:
      CLAW B 0 A_Light2
      CLAW B 0 // A_LightInverse
      CLAW B 0 A_Playsound ("caco/attack")
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,125,1,0) // +1.25% Hellcore Heat, Deal Damage if already above 100% Heat
   Shock:
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("AbaddonBall-Claw",ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",4,0,1),1,8,0)
      TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",0,360) == 1,"Shock1toShock2")
      Loop
   Shock1toShock2:
      CLAW B 6 
      CLAW B 0 A_Playsound ("caco/attack")
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,125,0,0) // +1.25% Hellcore Heat
   Shock2:
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("AbaddonBall-Claw",ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",4,0,1),1,8,0)
      TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",0,360) == 1,"EndShock2")
      Loop
   EndShock2:
      CLAW B 6 A_Light0
      Goto See
   // 10/500 [2%], 80/500 [16%]

   Flash:
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIfInventory("CriticalHealth", 0, "StartShock")
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIfInventory("LowHealth", 0, "StartShockCheck")
   Flash2: // Flash2:
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIfInventory("SpreaderAura2", 0, "Flash2Spread2")
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIfInventory("SpreaderAura1", 0, "Flash2Spread1")
      CLAW B 0 A_Playsound ("caco/attack")
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,125,1,0) // +1.25% Hellcore Heat, Deal Damage if already above 100% Heat
      CLAW B 6 A_FireCustomMissile("AbaddonBall-Claw",0,1,8,0)
      CLAW B 0 A_Playsound ("caco/attack")
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,125,0,0) // +1.25% Hellcore Heat
      CLAW B 6 A_FireCustomMissile("AbaddonBall-Claw",0,1,8,0)
      Stop

   Flash2Spread1:
      CLAW B 0 A_Playsound ("caco/attack")
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,125,1,0) // +1.25% Hellcore Heat, Deal Damage if already above 100% Heat
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("AbaddonBall-Claw",15,1,8,0,0,0) // Left
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("AbaddonBall-Claw",0,1,8,0,0,0) // Center
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("AbaddonBall-Claw",-15,1,8,0,0,0) // Right
      CLAW B 6 
      CLAW B 0 A_Playsound ("caco/attack")
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,125,0,0) // +1.25% Hellcore Heat
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("AbaddonBall-Claw",15,1,8,0,0,0) // Left
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("AbaddonBall-Claw",0,1,8,0,0,0) // Center
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("AbaddonBall-Claw",-15,1,8,0,0,0) // Right
      CLAW B 6 
      Stop

   Flash2Spread2:
      CLAW B 0 A_Playsound ("caco/attack")
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,125,1,0) // +1.25% Hellcore Heat, Deal Damage if already above 100% Heat
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("AbaddonBall-Claw",15,1,8,0,0,0) // Left
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("AbaddonBall-Claw",7.5,1,8,0,0,7.5) // Left-Top
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("AbaddonBall-Claw",7.5,1,8,0,0,-7.5) // Left-Bottom
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("AbaddonBall-Claw",0,1,8,0,0,0) // Center
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("AbaddonBall-Claw",-7.5,1,8,0,0,-7.5) // Right-Bottom
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("AbaddonBall-Claw",-7.5,1,8,0,0,7.5) // Right-Top
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("AbaddonBall-Claw",-15,1,8,0,0,0) // Right
      CLAW B 6 
      CLAW B 0 A_Playsound ("caco/attack")
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,125,0,0) // +1.25% Hellcore Heat
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("AbaddonBall-Claw",15,1,8,0,0,0) // Left
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("AbaddonBall-Claw",7.5,1,8,0,0,7.5) // Left-Top
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("AbaddonBall-Claw",7.5,1,8,0,0,-7.5) // Left-Bottom
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("AbaddonBall-Claw",0,1,8,0,0,0) // Center
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("AbaddonBall-Claw",-7.5,1,8,0,0,-7.5) // Right-Bottom
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("AbaddonBall-Claw",-7.5,1,8,0,0,7.5) // Right-Top
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("AbaddonBall-Claw",-15,1,8,0,0,0) // Right
      CLAW B 6 
      Stop

   }

// Hell Knight's Fist Weapon - Hellcore Weapon #6 [placeholder sprites]
Actor HellKnightBall-Claw : HellKnightBall { DamageType "KnightFist" }
Actor HellKnightBall2-Claw : HellKnightBall2 { DamageType "KnightFist" }
Actor HellKnightBall3-Claw : HellKnightBall3 { DamageType "KnightFist" }
ACTOR KnightFist : Weapon
{
   var int user_theta;
   Tag "Hell Knight's Fist"
   Scale 0.625
   +FLOATBOB
   +NOAUTOAIM
   +INVENTORY.ALWAYSPICKUP
   +WEAPON.NOALERT
   Inventory.PickupMessage "You got the Hell Knight's Fist!"
   States
   {
   Spawn:
      HLC2 F 0
      HLC2 F 1 bright ACS_ExecuteAlways(873,0,5,0,0)
      Loop
   Ready: 
      CLAW A 1 A_WeaponReady
      Loop
   Deselect: 
      CLAW A 1 A_Lower
      Loop
   Select: 
      CLAW A 1 A_Raise
      Loop
   Fire: 
      CLAW A 0 A_JumpIfNoAmmo(1)
      CLAW B 4 A_GunFlash
      CLAW CDEF 4
      Goto Ready

   FlashShockKnight1:
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("HellKnightBall-Claw",ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",6,0,1),1,8,0)
      TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",0,360) == 1,"EndShock")
      Loop
   FlashShockKnight2:
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("HellKnightBall2-Claw",ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",6,0,1),1,8,0)
      TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",0,360) == 1,"EndShock")
      Loop
   FlashShockKnight3:
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("HellKnightBall3-Claw",ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",6,0,1),1,8,0)
      TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",0,360) == 1,"EndShock")
      Loop
   StartShockCheck:
      CLAW B 0 A_Jump(192, "Flash2")
   StartShock:
      CLAW B 0 A_Light2
      CLAW B 0 // A_LightInverse
   Shock:
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,250,1,0) // +2.5% Hellcore Heat, Deal Damage if already above 100% Heat
      CLAW B 0 A_Jump(177, "FlashShockKnight1") // Throw a ring of normal Knight Balls
      CLAW B 0 A_Jump(177, "FlashShockKnight2") // Throw a ring of stronger Knight Balls
      goto FlashShockKnight3 // Throw a ring of strongest Knight Balls
   EndShock:
      CLAW B 4 A_Light0
      Goto See

   FlashKnight1:
      CLAW B 4 A_FireCustomMissile("HellKnightBall-Claw",0,1,8,0)
      Stop
   FlashKnight2:
      CLAW B 4 A_FireCustomMissile("HellKnightBall2-Claw",0,1,8,0)
      Stop
   FlashKnight3:
      CLAW B 4 A_FireCustomMissile("HellKnightBall3-Claw",0,1,8,0)
      Stop

   // 10/500 [2%], 80/500 [16%]
   Flash:
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIfInventory("CriticalHealth", 0, "StartShock")
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIfInventory("LowHealth", 0, "StartShockCheck")
   Flash2: // Flash2:
      CLAW B 0 A_Playsound ("caco/attack")
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,250,1,0) // +2.5% Hellcore Heat, Deal Damage if already above 100% Heat
      CLAW B 0 A_Jump(177, "FlashKnight1") // Throw a normal Knight Ball
      CLAW B 0 A_Jump(177, "FlashKnight2") // Throw a stronger Knight Ball
      goto FlashKnight3 // Throw the strongest Knight Ball
   } 
}
ACTOR KnightFistCI : CustomInventory
{
   Scale 0.625
   +FLOATBOB
   +INVENTORY.ALWAYSPICKUP
   Inventory.PickupMessage "You got the Hell Knight's Fist!"
   States
   {
    Spawn:
      HLC2 F 0 bright
      HLC2 F 1 bright ACS_ExecuteAlways(873,0,5,0,0)
      Loop
    Pickup:
      TNT1 A 0 
      TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("KnightFist", 1)
      TNT1 A 0 A_Playsound("pickuphellcore")
      TNT1 A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(896,0,6,0,0)
      Stop
   }
}

      CLAW B 4 A_FireCustomMissile("BaronofHellBall3-Claw",0,1,8,0)
      Stop

   // 10/500 [2%], 80/500 [16%]
   Flash:
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIfInventory("CriticalHealth", 0, "StartShock")
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIfInventory("LowHealth", 0, "StartShockCheck")

   Flash2: // Flash2:
      CLAW B 0 A_Playsound ("caco/attack")
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,250,1,0) // +2.5% Hellcore Heat, Deal Damage if already above 100% Heat
      CLAW B 0 A_Jump(177, "FlashBaron1") // Throw a normal Baron Ball
      CLAW B 0 A_Jump(177, "FlashBaron2") // Throw a stronger Baron Ball
      goto FlashBaron3 // Throw the strongest Baron Ball
   } 
}
ACTOR BaronFistCI : CustomInventory
{
   Scale 0.625
   +FLOATBOB
   +INVENTORY.ALWAYSPICKUP
   Inventory.PickupMessage "You got the Baron of Hell's Fist!"
   States
   {
    Spawn:
      HLC2 G 0 bright
      HLC2 G 1 bright ACS_ExecuteAlways(873,0,6,0,0)
      Loop
    Pickup:
      TNT1 A 0 
      TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("BaronFist", 1)
      TNT1 A 0 A_Playsound("pickuphellcore")
      TNT1 A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(896,0,7,0,0)
      Stop
   }
}


// Belphegor's Fist Weapon - Hellcore Weapon #8 [placeholder sprites]
Actor BelphegorBall-Claw : BelphegorBall { DamageType "BelphegorFist" }
Actor BelphegorBall2-Claw : BelphegorBall2 { DamageType "BelphegorFist" }
Actor BelphegorBall3-Claw : BelphegorBall3 { DamageType "BelphegorFist" }
ACTOR BelphegorFist : Weapon
{
   Scale 0.625
   Tag "Belphegor's Fist"
   +FLOATBOB
   +NOAUTOAIM
   +INVENTORY.ALWAYSPICKUP
   +WEAPON.NOALERT
   Inventory.PickupMessage "You got the Belphegor's Fist!"
   States
   {
   Spawn:
      HLC2 H 0
      HLC2 H 1 bright ACS_ExecuteAlways(873,0,7,0,0)
      Loop
   Ready: 
      CLAW A 1 A_WeaponReady
      Loop
   Deselect: 
      CLAW A 1 A_Lower
      Loop
   Select: 
      CLAW A 1 A_Raise
      Loop
   Fire: 
      CLAW A 0 A_JumpIfNoAmmo(1)
      CLAW B 4 A_GunFlash
      CLAW CDEF 4
      Goto Ready

// Shot Type 1
   FlashShockBelphegor1:
      CLAW B 0 A_Light2
      CLAW B 0 // A_LightInverse
      CLAW B 0 A_Playsound ("caco/attack")
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,150,1,0) // +1.5% Hellcore Heat, Deal Damage if already above 100% Heat
   FlashShockBelphegor1Shoot:
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("BelphegorBall-Claw",ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",2,0,1),1,8,0)
      TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",0,360) == 1,"Shock1toShock1b")
      Loop
   Shock1toShock1b:
      CLAW B 6 A_Light0
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIfInventory("CriticalHealth", 0, "StartShock1b")
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIfInventory("LowHealth", 0, "StartShockCheck1b")
   FlashShockBelphegor1b:
      CLAW B 0 A_Light2
      CLAW B 0 // A_LightInverse
      CLAW B 0 A_Playsound ("caco/attack")
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,150,0,0) // +1.5% Hellcore Heat
   FlashShockBelphegor1bShoot:
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("BelphegorBall-Claw",ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",2,0,1),1,8,0)
      TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",0,360) == 1,"Shock1btoShock1c")
      Loop
   Shock1btoShock1c:
      CLAW B 6 A_Light0
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIfInventory("CriticalHealth", 0, "StartShock1c")
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIfInventory("LowHealth", 0, "StartShockCheck1c")
   FlashShockBelphegor1c:
      CLAW B 0 A_Light2
      CLAW B 0 // A_LightInverse
      CLAW B 0 A_Playsound ("caco/attack")
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,150,0,0) // +1.5% Hellcore Heat
   FlashShockBelphegor1cShoot:
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("BelphegorBall-Claw",ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",2,0,1),1,8,0)
      TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",0,360) == 1,"FlashShockBelphegor1End")
      Loop
   FlashShockBelphegor1End:
      CLAW B 6 A_Light0
      Stop


// Shot Type 2
   FlashShockBelphegor2:
      CLAW B 0 A_Light2
      CLAW B 0 // A_LightInverse
      CLAW B 0 A_Playsound ("caco/attack")
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,150,1,0) // +1.5% Hellcore Heat, Deal Damage if already above 100% Heat
   FlashShockBelphegor2Shoot:
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("BelphegorBall2-Claw",ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",2,0,1),1,8,0)
      TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",0,360) == 1,"Shock2toShock2b")
      Loop
   Shock2toShock2b:
      CLAW B 6 A_Light0
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIfInventory("CriticalHealth", 0, "StartShock2b")
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIfInventory("LowHealth", 0, "StartShockCheck2b")
   FlashShockBelphegor2b:
      CLAW B 0 A_Light2
      CLAW B 0 // A_LightInverse
      CLAW B 0 A_Playsound ("caco/attack")
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,150,0,0) // +1.5% Hellcore Heat
   FlashShockBelphegor2bShoot:
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("BelphegorBall2-Claw",ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",2,0,1),1,8,0)
      TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",0,360) == 1,"Shock2btoShock2c")
      Loop
   Shock2btoShock2c:
      CLAW B 6 A_Light0
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIfInventory("CriticalHealth", 0, "StartShock2c")
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIfInventory("LowHealth", 0, "StartShockCheck2c")
   FlashShockBelphegor2c:
      CLAW B 0 A_Light2
      CLAW B 0 // A_LightInverse
      CLAW B 0 A_Playsound ("caco/attack")
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,150,0,0) // +1.5% Hellcore Heat
   FlashShockBelphegor2cShoot:
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("BelphegorBall2-Claw",ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",2,0,1),1,8,0)
      TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",0,360) == 1,"FlashShockBelphegor2End")
      Loop
   FlashShockBelphegor2End:
      CLAW B 6 A_Light0
      Stop


// Shot Type 3
   FlashShockBelphegor3:
      CLAW B 0 A_Light2
      CLAW B 0 // A_LightInverse
      CLAW B 0 A_Playsound ("caco/attack")
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,150,1,0) // +1.5% Hellcore Heat, Deal Damage if already above 100% Heat
   FlashShockBelphegor3Shoot:
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("BelphegorBall3-Claw",ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",2,0,1),1,8,0)
      TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",0,360) == 1,"Shock3toShock3b")
      Loop
   Shock3toShock3b:
      CLAW B 6 A_Light0
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIfInventory("CriticalHealth", 0, "StartShock3b")
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIfInventory("LowHealth", 0, "StartShockCheck3b")
   FlashShockBelphegor3b:
      CLAW B 0 A_Light2
      CLAW B 0 // A_LightInverse
      CLAW B 0 A_Playsound ("caco/attack")
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,150,0,0) // +1.5% Hellcore Heat
   FlashShockBelphegor3bShoot:
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("BelphegorBall3-Claw",ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",2,0,1),1,8,0)
      TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",0,360) == 1,"Shock3btoShock3c")
      Loop
   Shock3btoShock3c:
      CLAW B 6 A_Light0
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIfInventory("CriticalHealth", 0, "StartShock3c")
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIfInventory("LowHealth", 0, "StartShockCheck3c")
   FlashShockBelphegor3c:
      CLAW B 0 A_Light2
      CLAW B 0 // A_LightInverse
      CLAW B 0 A_Playsound ("caco/attack")
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,150,0,0) // +1.5% Hellcore Heat
   FlashShockBelphegor3cShoot:
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("BelphegorBall3-Claw",ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",2,0,1),1,8,0)
      TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",0,360) == 1,"FlashShockBelphegor3End")
      Loop
   FlashShockBelphegor3End:
      CLAW B 6 A_Light0
      Stop


   StartShockCheck:
      CLAW B 0 A_Jump(192, "Flash2")
   StartShock:
      CLAW B 0 A_Jump(177, "FlashShockBelphegor1") // Throw a ring of normal Belphegor Balls
      CLAW B 0 A_Jump(177, "FlashShockBelphegor2") // Throw a ring of stronger Belphegor Balls
      goto FlashShockBelphegor3 // Throw a ring of strongest Belphegor Balls

   FlashBelphegor1:
      CLAW B 0 A_Playsound ("caco/attack")
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,150,1,0) // +1.5% Hellcore Heat, Deal Damage if already above 100% Heat
      CLAW B 6 A_FireCustomMissile("BelphegorBall-Claw",0,1,8,0)
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIfInventory("CriticalHealth", 0, "StartShock1b")
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIfInventory("LowHealth", 0, "StartShockCheck1b")
      goto FlashBelphegor1b
   StartShockCheck1b:
      CLAW B 0 A_Jump(192, "FlashBelphegor1b")
   StartShock1b:
      goto FlashShockBelphegor1b
   FlashBelphegor1b:
      CLAW B 0 A_Playsound ("caco/attack")
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,150,0,0) // +1.5% Hellcore Heat
      CLAW B 6 A_FireCustomMissile("BelphegorBall-Claw",0,1,8,0)
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIfInventory("CriticalHealth", 0, "StartShock1c")
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIfInventory("LowHealth", 0, "StartShockCheck1c")
      goto FlashBelphegor1c
   StartShockCheck1c:
      CLAW B 0 A_Jump(192, "FlashBelphegor1c")
   StartShock1c:
      goto FlashShockBelphegor1c
   FlashBelphegor1c:
      CLAW B 0 A_Playsound ("caco/attack")
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,150,0,0) // +1.5% Hellcore Heat
      CLAW B 6 A_FireCustomMissile("BelphegorBall-Claw",0,1,8,0)
      Stop

   FlashBelphegor2:
      CLAW B 0 A_Playsound ("caco/attack")
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,150,1,0) // +1.5% Hellcore Heat, Deal Damage if already above 100% Heat
      CLAW B 6 A_FireCustomMissile("BelphegorBall2-Claw",0,1,8,0)
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIfInventory("CriticalHealth", 0, "StartShock2b")
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIfInventory("LowHealth", 0, "StartShockCheck2b")
      goto FlashBelphegor2b
   StartShockCheck2b:
      CLAW B 0 A_Jump(192, "FlashBelphegor2b")
   StartShock2b:
      goto FlashShockBelphegor2b
   FlashBelphegor2b:
      CLAW B 0 A_Playsound ("caco/attack")
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,150,0,0) // +1.5% Hellcore Heat
      CLAW B 6 A_FireCustomMissile("BelphegorBall2-Claw",0,1,8,0)
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIfInventory("CriticalHealth", 0, "StartShock2c")
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIfInventory("LowHealth", 0, "StartShockCheck2c")
      goto FlashBelphegor2c
   StartShockCheck2c:
      CLAW B 0 A_Jump(192, "FlashBelphegor2c")
   StartShock2c:
      goto FlashShockBelphegor2c
   FlashBelphegor2c:
      CLAW B 0 A_Playsound ("caco/attack")
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,150,0,0) // +1.5% Hellcore Heat
      CLAW B 6 A_FireCustomMissile("BelphegorBall2-Claw",0,1,8,0)
      Stop

   FlashBelphegor3:
      CLAW B 0 A_Playsound ("caco/attack")
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,150,1,0) // +1.5% Hellcore Heat, Deal Damage if already above 100% Heat
      CLAW B 6 A_FireCustomMissile("BelphegorBall3-Claw",0,1,8,0)
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIfInventory("CriticalHealth", 0, "StartShock3b")
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIfInventory("LowHealth", 0, "StartShockCheck3b")
      goto FlashBelphegor3b
   StartShockCheck3b:
      CLAW B 0 A_Jump(192, "FlashBelphegor3b")
   StartShock3b:
      goto FlashShockBelphegor3b
   FlashBelphegor3b:
      CLAW B 0 A_Playsound ("caco/attack")
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,150,0,0) // +1.5% Hellcore Heat
      CLAW B 6 A_FireCustomMissile("BelphegorBall3-Claw",0,1,8,0)
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIfInventory("CriticalHealth", 0, "StartShock3c")
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIfInventory("LowHealth", 0, "StartShockCheck3c")
      goto FlashBelphegor3c
   StartShockCheck3c:
      CLAW B 0 A_Jump(192, "FlashBelphegor3c")
   StartShock3c:
      goto FlashShockBelphegor3c
   FlashBelphegor3c:
      CLAW B 0 A_Playsound ("caco/attack")
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,150,0,0) // +1.5% Hellcore Heat
      CLAW B 6 A_FireCustomMissile("BelphegorBall3-Claw",0,1,8,0)
      Stop

   // 10/500 [2%], 80/500 [16%]
   Flash:
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIfInventory("CriticalHealth", 0, "StartShock")
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIfInventory("LowHealth", 0, "StartShockCheck")
   Flash2: // Flash2:
      CLAW B 0 A_Jump(177, "FlashBelphegor1") // Throw a normal Belphegor Ball
      CLAW B 0 A_Jump(177, "FlashBelphegor2") // Throw a stronger Belphegor Ball
      goto FlashBelphegor3 // Throw the strongest Belphegor Ball

   } 
}
ACTOR BelphegorFistCI : CustomInventory
{
   Scale 0.625
   +FLOATBOB
   +INVENTORY.ALWAYSPICKUP
   Inventory.PickupMessage "You got the Belphegor's Fist!"
   States
   {
    Spawn:
      HLC2 H 0 bright
      HLC2 H 1 bright ACS_ExecuteAlways(873,0,7,0,0)
      Loop
    Pickup:
      TNT1 A 0 
      TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("BelphegorFist", 1)
      TNT1 A 0 A_Playsound("pickuphellcore")
      TNT1 A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(896,0,8,0,0)
      Stop
   }
}



// Bruiser Demon's Fist Weapon - Hellcore Weapon #9 [placeholder sprites]
Actor BruiserBall-Claw : BruiserBall { DamageType "BruiserFist" }
Actor BruiserBall2-Claw : BruiserBall2 { DamageType "BruiserFist" }
Actor BruiserFireSpawner-Claw : BruiserFireSpawner { DamageType "BruiserFist" }
ACTOR BruiserFist : Weapon
{
   Scale 0.625
   Tag "Bruiser Demon's Fist"
   +FLOATBOB
   +NOAUTOAIM
   +INVENTORY.ALWAYSPICKUP
   +WEAPON.NOALERT
   Inventory.PickupMessage "You got the Bruiser Demon's Fist!"
   States
   {
   Spawn:
      HLC2 I 0
      HLC2 I 1 bright ACS_ExecuteAlways(873,0,8,0,0)
      Loop
   Ready: 
      CLAW A 1 A_WeaponReady
      Loop
   Deselect: 
      CLAW A 1 A_Lower
      Loop
   Select: 
      CLAW A 1 A_Raise
      Loop
   Fire: 
      CLAW A 0 A_JumpIfNoAmmo(1)
      CLAW B 4 A_GunFlash
      CLAW CDDEEF 4
      Goto Ready
   AltFire:
      CLAW A 0 
      CLAW A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("HellcoreFireMode",0,0,0)
      CLAW A 10
      Goto Ready

   StartShockCheck:
      CLAW B 0 A_Jump(192, "Flash1")
   StartShock:
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("HellcoreFireMode",1,0) == 0, "StartShock1")
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("HellcoreFireMode",1,0) == 1, "StartShock2")
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("HellcoreFireMode",1,0) == 2, "StartShock3")
      Stop

   StartShock1:
      CLAW B 0 A_Light2
      CLAW B 0 // A_LightInverse
      CLAW B 0 A_Playsound ("caco/attack")
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,71,1,0) // +0.71% Hellcore Heat, Deal Damage if already above 100% Heat
   Shock1:
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("BruiserBall2-Claw",ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",8,0,1,-40),1,0,0)
      TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",0,360) == 1,"Shock1toShock1b")
      Loop
   Shock1toShock1b:
      CLAW B 2
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,71,0,0) // +0.71% Hellcore Heat
   Shock1b:
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("BruiserBall2-Claw",ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",8,0,1,-30),1,0,0)
      TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",0,360) == 1,"Shock1btoShock1c")
      Loop
   Shock1btoShock1c:
      CLAW B 1
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,71,0,0) // +0.71% Hellcore Heat
   Shock1c:
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("BruiserBall2-Claw",ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",8,0,1,-20),1,0,0)
      TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",0,360) == 1,"Shock1ctoShock1d")
      Loop
   Shock1ctoShock1d:
      CLAW B 1
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,71,0,0) // +0.71% Hellcore Heat
   Shock1d:
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("BruiserBall2-Claw",ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",8,0,1,-10),1,0,0)
      TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",0,360) == 1,"Shock1dtoShock1e")
      Loop
   Shock1dtoShock1e:
      CLAW B 1
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,71,0,0) // +0.71% Hellcore Heat
   Shock1e:
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("BruiserBall2-Claw",ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",8,0,1,0),1,0,0)
      TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",0,360) == 1,"Shock1etoShock1f")
      Loop
   Shock1etoShock1f:
      CLAW B 1
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,71,0,0) // +0.71% Hellcore Heat
   Shock1f:
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("BruiserBall2-Claw",ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",8,0,1,10),1,0,0)
      TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",0,360) == 1,"Shock1ftoShock1g")
      Loop
   Shock1ftoShock1g:
      CLAW B 1
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,71,0,0) // +0.71% Hellcore Heat
   Shock1g:
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("BruiserBall2-Claw",ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",8,0,1,20),1,0,0)
      TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",0,360) == 1,"Shock1gtoShock1h")
      Loop
   Shock1gtoShock1h:
      CLAW B 4
      CLAW B 5
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,71,0,0) // +0.71% Hellcore Heat
   Shock1h:
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("BruiserBall2-Claw",ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",8,0,1,40),1,0,0)
      TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",0,360) == 1,"Shock1htoShock1i")
      Loop
   Shock1htoShock1i:
      CLAW B 2
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,71,0,0) // +0.71% Hellcore Heat
   Shock1i:
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("BruiserBall2-Claw",ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",8,0,1,30),1,0,0)
      TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",0,360) == 1,"Shock1itoShock1j")
      Loop
   Shock1itoShock1j:
      CLAW B 1
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,71,0,0) // +0.71% Hellcore Heat
   Shock1j:
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("BruiserBall2-Claw",ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",8,0,1,20),1,0,0)
      TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",0,360) == 1,"Shock1jtoShock1k")
      Loop
   Shock1jtoShock1k:
      CLAW B 1
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,71,0,0) // +0.71% Hellcore Heat
   Shock1k:
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("BruiserBall2-Claw",ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",8,0,1,10),1,0,0)
      TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",0,360) == 1,"Shock1ktoShock1l")
      Loop
   Shock1ktoShock1l:
      CLAW B 1
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,71,0,0) // +0.71% Hellcore Heat
   Shock1l:
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("BruiserBall2-Claw",ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",8,0,1,0),1,0,0)
      TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",0,360) == 1,"Shock1ltoShock1m")
      Loop
   Shock1ltoShock1m:
      CLAW B 1
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,71,0,0) // +0.71% Hellcore Heat
   Shock1m:
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("BruiserBall2-Claw",ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",8,0,1,-10),1,0,0)
      TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",0,360) == 1,"Shock1mtoShock1n")
      Loop
   Shock1mtoShock1n:
      CLAW B 1
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,71,0,0) // +0.71% Hellcore Heat
   Shock1n:
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("BruiserBall2-Claw",ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",8,0,1,-20),1,0,0)
      TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",0,360) == 1,"Shock1End")
      Loop
   Shock1End:
      CLAW B 4
      CLAW B 10
      Stop

   StartShock2:
      CLAW B 0 A_Playsound ("caco/attack")
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,400,1,0) // +4% Hellcore Heat, Deal Damage if already above 100% Heat
   Shock2:
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("BruiserBall-Claw",ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",4,0,1,0),1,0,0)
      TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",0,360) == 1,"Shock2End")
      Loop
   Shock2End:
      CLAW B 4
      CLAW B 10
      Stop

   StartShock3:
      CLAW B 0 A_Playsound ("caco/attack")
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,250,1,0) // +2.5% Hellcore Heat, Deal Damage if already above 100% Heat
   Shock3a:
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("BruiserFireSpawner-Claw",ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",12,0,1,-15),1,0,0)
      TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",0,360) == 1,"Shock3toShock3b")
      Loop
   Shock3toShock3b:
      CLAW B 2
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,250,0,0) // +2.5% Hellcore Heat
   Shock3b:
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("BruiserFireSpawner-Claw",ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",12,0,1,0),1,0,0)
      TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",0,360) == 1,"Shock3btoShock3c")
      Loop
   Shock3btoShock3c:
      CLAW B 2
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,250,0,0) // +2.5% Hellcore Heat
   Shock3c:
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("BruiserFireSpawner-Claw",ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",12,0,1,15),1,0,0)
      TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",0,360) == 1,"Shock3End")
      Loop
   Shock3End:
      CLAW B 2
      CLAW B 5 A_Light0
      Stop
   // 10/500 [2%], 80/500 [16%]

   Flash:
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIfInventory("CriticalHealth", 0, "StartShock")
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIfInventory("LowHealth", 0, "StartShockCheck")
   Flash1:
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("HellcoreFireMode",1,0) == 0, "Flash2")
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("HellcoreFireMode",1,0) == 1, "Flash2b")
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("HellcoreFireMode",1,0) == 2, "Flash2c")
      Stop

   Flash2: // Flash2:
      CLAW B 0 A_Playsound ("caco/attack")
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,71,1,0) // +0.71% Hellcore Heat, Deal Damage if already above 100% Heat
      CLAW B 2 A_FireCustomMissile("BruiserBall2-Claw",-40,1,0,0)
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,71,0,0) // +0.71% Hellcore Heat
      CLAW B 1 A_FireCustomMissile("BruiserBall2-Claw",-30,1,0,0)
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,71,0,0) // +0.71% Hellcore Heat
      CLAW B 1 A_FireCustomMissile("BruiserBall2-Claw",-20,1,0,0)
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,71,0,0) // +0.71% Hellcore Heat
      CLAW B 1 A_FireCustomMissile("BruiserBall2-Claw",-10,1,0,0)
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,71,0,0) // +0.71% Hellcore Heat
      CLAW B 1 A_FireCustomMissile("BruiserBall2-Claw",0,1,0,0)
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,71,0,0) // +0.71% Hellcore Heat
      CLAW B 1 A_FireCustomMissile("BruiserBall2-Claw",10,1,0,0)
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,71,0,0) // +0.71% Hellcore Heat
      CLAW B 4 A_FireCustomMissile("BruiserBall2-Claw",20,1,0,0)
      CLAW B 5
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,71,1,0) // +0.71% Hellcore Heat, Deal Damage if already above 100% Heat
      CLAW B 2 A_FireCustomMissile("BruiserBall2-Claw",40,1,0,0)
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,71,0,0) // +0.71% Hellcore Heat
      CLAW B 1 A_FireCustomMissile("BruiserBall2-Claw",30,1,0,0)
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,71,0,0) // +0.71% Hellcore Heat
      CLAW B 1 A_FireCustomMissile("BruiserBall2-Claw",20,1,0,0)
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,71,0,0) // +0.71% Hellcore Heat
      CLAW B 1 A_FireCustomMissile("BruiserBall2-Claw",10,1,0,0)
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,71,0,0) // +0.71% Hellcore Heat
      CLAW B 1 A_FireCustomMissile("BruiserBall2-Claw",0,1,0,0)
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,71,0,0) // +0.71% Hellcore Heat
      CLAW B 1 A_FireCustomMissile("BruiserBall2-Claw",-10,1,0,0)
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,71,0,0) // +0.71% Hellcore Heat
      CLAW B 4 A_FireCustomMissile("BruiserBall2-Claw",-20,1,0,0)
      CLAW B 10
      Goto See
   Flash2b:
      CLAW B 0 A_Playsound ("caco/attack")
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,400,1,0) // +4% Hellcore Heat, Deal Damage if already above 100% Heat
      CLAW B 4 A_FireCustomMissile("BruiserBall-Claw",0,1,8,0)
      CLAW B 10
      Goto See
   Flash2c:
      CLAW B 0 A_Playsound ("caco/attack")
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,250,1,0) // +2.5% Hellcore Heat, Deal Damage if already above 100% Heat
      CLAW B 2 A_FireCustomMissile("BruiserFireSpawner-Claw",-15,1,0,0)
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,250,0,0) // +2.5% Hellcore Heat
      CLAW B 2 A_FireCustomMissile("BruiserFireSpawner-Claw",0,1,0,0)
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,250,0,0) // +2.5% Hellcore Heat
      CLAW B 2 A_FireCustomMissile("BruiserFireSpawner-Claw",15,1,0,0)
      Stop
   } 
}
ACTOR BruiserFistCI : CustomInventory
{
   Scale 0.625
   +FLOATBOB
   +INVENTORY.ALWAYSPICKUP
   Inventory.PickupMessage "You got the Bruiser Demon's Fist!"
   States
   {
    Spawn:
      HLC2 I 0 bright
      HLC2 I 1 bright ACS_ExecuteAlways(873,0,8,0,0)
      Loop
    Pickup:
      TNT1 A 0 
      TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("BruiserFist", 1)
      TNT1 A 0 A_Playsound("pickuphellcore")
      TNT1 A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(896,0,9,0,0)
      Stop
   }
}


// Archon of Hell's Fist Weapon - Hellcore Weapon #10 [placeholder sprites]
Actor ArchonOfHellBall-Claw : ArchonOfHellBall { DamageType "ArchonFist" }
Actor ArchonOfHellBall2-Claw : ArchonOfHellBall2 { DamageType "ArchonFist" }
Actor ArchonOfHellBall3-Claw : ArchonOfHellBall3 { DamageType "ArchonFist" }
Actor ArchonComet-Claw : ArchonComet { DamageType "ArchonFist" }
ACTOR ArchonFist : Weapon
{
   Scale 0.625
   Tag "Archon of Hell's Fist"
   +FLOATBOB
   +NOAUTOAIM
   +INVENTORY.ALWAYSPICKUP
   +WEAPON.NOALERT
   Inventory.PickupMessage "You got the Archon of Hell's Fist!"
   States
   {
   Spawn:
      HLC2 J 0
      HLC2 J 1 bright ACS_ExecuteAlways(873,0,9,0,0)
      Loop
   Ready: 
      CLAW A 1 A_WeaponReady
      Loop
   Deselect: 
      CLAW A 1 A_Lower
      Loop
   Select: 
      CLAW A 1 A_Raise
      Loop
   Fire: 
      CLAW A 0 A_JumpIfNoAmmo(1)
      CLAW B 4 A_GunFlash
      CLAW CDEF 4
      Goto Ready
   AltFire:
      CLAW A 0 
      CLAW A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("HellcoreFireMode",0,0,1)
      CLAW A 10
      Goto Ready

   StartShockCheck:
      CLAW B 0 A_Jump(192, "FlashA")
   StartShock:
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("HellcoreFireMode",1,1) == 0, "StartShockChoose1")
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("HellcoreFireMode",1,1) == 1, "StartShockChoose2")
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("HellcoreFireMode",1,1) == 2, "FlashShockD")
      Stop

   StartShockChoose1:
      CLAW B 0 A_Jump(177, "FlashShock1A") // Throw normal Archon Balls [Nova]
      CLAW B 0 A_Jump(177, "FlashShock2A") // Throw stronger Archon Balls [Nova]
      goto FlashShock3A // Throw the strongest Archon Balls [Nova]

   StartShockChoose2:
      CLAW B 0 A_Jump(177, "FlashShock1B") // Throw normal Archon Balls [Nova]
      CLAW B 0 A_Jump(177, "FlashShock2B") // Throw stronger Archon Balls [Nova]
      goto FlashShock3B // Throw the strongest Archon Balls [Nova]

   FlashShock1A:
      CLAW B 0 A_Light2
      CLAW B 0 // A_LightInverse
      CLAW B 0 A_Playsound ("caco/attack")
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,400,1,0) // +4% Hellcore Heat, Deal Damage if already above 100% Heat
   FlashShock1AShoot:
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("ArchonOfHellBall-Claw",ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",6,0,1,0),1,0,0)
      TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",0,360) == 1,"FlashShock1AShoot2")
      Loop
   FlashShock1AShoot2:
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("ArchonOfHellBall-Claw",ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",6,0,1,-4),1,0,0)
      TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",0,360) == 1,"FlashShock1AShoot3")
      Loop
   FlashShock1AShoot3:
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("ArchonOfHellBall-Claw",ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",6,0,1,4),1,0,0)
      TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",0,360) == 1,"FlashShock1AEnd")
      Loop
   FlashShock1AEnd:
      CLAW B 3
      CLAW B 3 A_Light0
      Stop
   // 10/500 [2%], 80/500 [16%]

   FlashShock2A:
      CLAW B 0 A_Light2
      CLAW B 0 // A_LightInverse
      CLAW B 0 A_Playsound ("caco/attack")
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,400,1,0) // +4% Hellcore Heat, Deal Damage if already above 100% Heat
   FlashShock2AShoot:
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("ArchonOfHellBall2-Claw",ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",6,0,1,0),1,0,0)
      TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",0,360) == 1,"FlashShock2AShoot2")
      Loop
   FlashShock2AShoot2:
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("ArchonOfHellBall2-Claw",ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",6,0,1,-4),1,0,0)
      TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",0,360) == 1,"FlashShock2AShoot3")
      Loop
   FlashShock2AShoot3:
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("ArchonOfHellBall2-Claw",ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",6,0,1,4),1,0,0)
      TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",0,360) == 1,"FlashShock2AEnd")
      Loop
   FlashShock2AEnd:
      CLAW B 3
      CLAW B 3 A_Light0
      Stop
   // 10/500 [2%], 80/500 [16%]

   FlashShock3A:
      CLAW B 0 A_Light2
      CLAW B 0 // A_LightInverse
      CLAW B 0 A_Playsound ("caco/attack")
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,400,1,0) // +4% Hellcore Heat, Deal Damage if already above 100% Heat
   FlashShock3AShoot:

      TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",0,360) == 1,"FlashShock3AShoot2")
      Loop
   FlashShock3AShoot2:
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("ArchonOfHellBall3-Claw",ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",6,0,1,-4),1,0,0)
      TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",0,360) == 1,"FlashShock3AShoot3")
      Loop

      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("ArchonOfHellBall3-Claw",ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",6,0,1,4),1,0,0)

      Loop
   FlashShock3AEnd:
      CLAW B 3
      CLAW B 3 A_Light0
      Stop
   // 10/500 [2%], 80/500 [16%]

   FlashShock1B:
      CLAW B 0 A_Playsound ("caco/attack")
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,750,1,0) // +7.5% Hellcore Heat, Deal Damage if already above 100% Heat
   FlashShock1BShoot:

      TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",0,360) == 1,"FlashShock1BShoot2")
      Loop
   FlashShock1BShoot2:
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("ArchonOfHellBall-Claw",ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",6,0,1,-4),1,0,0)
      TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",0,360) == 1,"FlashShock1BShoot3")
      Loop

      TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",0,360) == 1,"FlashShock1BShoot4")

      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("ArchonOfHellBall-Claw",ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",6,0,1,2),1,0,0)
      TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",0,360) == 1,"FlashShock1BShoot6")

      Stop

   FlashShock2BShoot4:

      TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",0,360) == 1,"FlashShock3BShoot5")
      Loop
   FlashShock3BShoot5:

      Loop

      Loop
   FlashShock3BEnd:
      CLAW B 3 A_Light0
      Stop
   // 10/500 [2%], 80/500 [16%]

   FlashShockD:
      CLAW B 10
      CLAW B 0 A_Playsound ("weapons/firbfi")
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,650,1,0) // +6.5% Hellcore Heat, Deal Damage if already above 100% Heat
   FlashShockDStart:
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("ArchonComet-Claw",ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",8,0,1,6),1,0,0)
      TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",0,360) == 1,"FlashShockDEnd")
      Loop
   FlashShockDEnd:

      Goto See

   Flash:
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIfInventory("CriticalHealth", 0, "StartShock")
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIfInventory("LowHealth", 0, "StartShockCheck")
   FlashA:
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("HellcoreFireMode",1,1) == 0, "FlashChoose1")
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("HellcoreFireMode",1,1) == 1, "FlashChoose2")
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("HellcoreFireMode",1,1) == 2, "FlashD")
      Stop

   FlashChoose1: // Flash2:
      CLAW B 0 A_Jump(177, "Flash1A") // Throw normal Archon Balls
      CLAW B 0 A_Jump(177, "Flash2A") // Throw stronger Archon Balls
      goto Flash3A // Throw the strongest Archon Balls

   FlashChoose2: // Flash2:
      CLAW B 0 A_Jump(177, "Flash1B") // Throw normal Archon Balls
      CLAW B 0 A_Jump(177, "Flash2B") // Throw stronger Archon Balls
      goto Flash3B // Throw the strongest Archon Balls

   Flash1A:
      CLAW B 0 A_Playsound ("caco/attack")
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,400,1,0) // +4% Hellcore Heat, Deal Damage if already above 100% Heat
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("ArchonOfHellBall-Claw",0,1,0,0)
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("ArchonOfHellBall-Claw",-4,1,0,0)
      CLAW B 3 A_FireCustomMissile("ArchonOfHellBall-Claw",4,1,0,0)
      Stop
   Flash1B:
      CLAW B 6
      CLAW B 0 A_Playsound ("caco/attack")
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,750,1,0) // +7.5% Hellcore Heat, Deal Damage if already above 100% Heat
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("ArchonOfHellBall-Claw",-6,1,0,0)
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("ArchonOfHellBall-Claw",-4,1,0,0)
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("ArchonOfHellBall-Claw",-2,1,0,0)
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("ArchonOfHellBall-Claw",0,1,0,0)
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("ArchonOfHellBall-Claw",2,1,0,0)
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("ArchonOfHellBall-Claw",4,1,0,0)
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("ArchonOfHellBall-Claw",6,1,0,0)
      CLAW B 3
      Stop

   Flash2A:
      CLAW B 0 A_Playsound ("caco/attack")
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,400,1,0) // +4% Hellcore Heat, Deal Damage if already above 100% Heat
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("ArchonOfHellBall2-Claw",0,1,0,0)
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("ArchonOfHellBall2-Claw",-4,1,0,0)

      CLAW B 0 A_Playsound ("caco/attack")
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,750,1,0) // +7.5% Hellcore Heat, Deal Damage if already above 100% Heat
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("ArchonOfHellBall2-Claw",-6,1,0,0)
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("ArchonOfHellBall2-Claw",-4,1,0,0)
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("ArchonOfHellBall2-Claw",-2,1,0,0)
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("ArchonOfHellBall2-Claw",0,1,0,0)
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("ArchonOfHellBall2-Claw",2,1,0,0)
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("ArchonOfHellBall2-Claw",4,1,0,0)
      CLAW B 3 A_FireCustomMissile("ArchonOfHellBall2-Claw",6,1,0,0)
      Stop

   Flash3A:
      CLAW B 0 A_Playsound ("caco/attack")
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,400,1,0) // +4% Hellcore Heat, Deal Damage if already above 100% Heat
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("ArchonOfHellBall3-Claw",0,1,0,0)
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("ArchonOfHellBall3-Claw",-4,1,0,0)
      CLAW B 3 A_FireCustomMissile("ArchonOfHellBall3-Claw",4,1,0,0)
      Stop
   Flash3B:
      CLAW B 6
      CLAW B 0 A_Playsound ("caco/attack")
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,750,1,0) // +7.5% Hellcore Heat, Deal Damage if already above 100% Heat
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("ArchonOfHellBall3-Claw",-6,1,0,0)
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("ArchonOfHellBall3-Claw",-4,1,0,0)
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("ArchonOfHellBall3-Claw",-2,1,0,0)
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("ArchonOfHellBall3-Claw",0,1,0,0)
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("ArchonOfHellBall3-Claw",2,1,0,0)
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("ArchonOfHellBall3-Claw",4,1,0,0)
      CLAW B 3 A_FireCustomMissile("ArchonOfHellBall3-Claw",6,1,0,0)
      Stop

   FlashD:
      CLAW B 10
      CLAW B 0 A_Playsound ("weapons/firbfi")
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,650,1,0) // +6.5% Hellcore Heat, Deal Damage if already above 100% Heat
      CLAW B 4 A_FireCustomMissile("ArchonComet-Claw",0,1,0,0)
      Stop

   } 
}

// Pyro Demon's Fist Weapon - Hellcore Weapon #11 [placeholder sprites]
Actor FireShot-Claw : FireShot { DamageType "PyroFist" }
Actor PyroBlast-Claw : PyroBlast { DamageType "PyroFist" }
Actor RainCometNull-Claw : RainCometNull { DamageType "PyroFist" }
Actor EscapeExplosion-Claw : EscapeExplosion { DamageType "PyroFist" }
ACTOR PyroFist : Weapon
{
   Scale 0.625
   Tag "Pyro Demon's Fist"
   +FLOATBOB
   +NOAUTOAIM
   +INVENTORY.ALWAYSPICKUP
   +WEAPON.NOALERT
   Inventory.PickupMessage "You got the Pyro Demon's Fist!"
   States
   {
   Spawn:
      HLC2 K 0
      HLC2 K 1 bright ACS_ExecuteAlways(873,0,10,0,0)
      Loop
   Ready: 
      CLAW A 1 A_WeaponReady
      Loop
   Deselect: 
      CLAW A 1 A_Lower
      Loop
   Select: 
      CLAW A 1 A_Raise
      Loop
   Fire: 
      CLAW A 0 A_JumpIfNoAmmo(1)
      CLAW B 4 A_GunFlash
      CLAW CDEF 4
      Goto Ready
   AltFire:
      CLAW A 0 
      CLAW A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("HellcoreFireMode",0,0,2)
      CLAW A 10
      Goto Ready

   StartShockCheck:
      CLAW B 0 A_Jump(192, "FlashChoose")
   StartShock:
      CLAW B 0 A_Light2
      CLAW B 0 // A_LightInverse
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("HellcoreFireMode",1,2) == 0, "Shock1AStart")
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("HellcoreFireMode",1,2) == 1, "Shock2Start")
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("HellcoreFireMode",1,2) == 2, "Shock3Start")
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("HellcoreFireMode",1,2) == 3, "Shock4")
      Stop

   Shock1AStart:
      CLAW B 0 A_Playsound ("caco/attack")
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,350,1,0) // +3.5% Hellcore Heat, Deal Damage if already above 100% Heat
   Shock1AShoot1:
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("FireShot-Claw",ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",3,0,1,0),1,0,0)
      TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",0,360) == 1,"Shock1AShoot2")
      Loop
   Shock1AShoot2:
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("FireShot-Claw",ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",3,0,1,-4),1,0,0)
      TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",0,360) == 1,"Shock1AShoot3")
      Loop
   Shock1AShoot3:
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("FireShot-Claw",ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",3,0,1,4),1,0,0)
      TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",0,360) == 1,"Shock1AEnd")
      Loop
   Shock1AEnd:
      CLAW B 3
      CLAW B 8
      Stop

   Shock1BStart:
      CLAW B 0 A_Playsound ("caco/attack")
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,350,1,0) // +3.5% Hellcore Heat, Deal Damage if already above 100% Heat
   Shock1BShoot1:
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("FireShot-Claw",ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",3,0,1,0),1,0,0)
      TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",0,360) == 1,"Shock1BShoot2")
      Loop
   Shock1BShoot2:
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("FireShot-Claw",ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",3,0,1,-4),1,0,0)
      TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",0,360) == 1,"Shock1BShoot3")
      Loop
   Shock1BShoot3:
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("FireShot-Claw",ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",3,0,1,4),1,0,0)
      TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",0,360) == 1,"Shock1BEnd")
      Loop
   Shock1BEnd:
      CLAW B 3
      CLAW B 12
      Stop

   Shock2Start:
      CLAW B 0 A_Playsound ("caco/attack")
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,450,1,0) // +4.5% Hellcore Heat, Deal Damage if already above 100% Heat
   Shock2:
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("PyroBlast-Claw",ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",12,0,1,0),1,0,0)
      TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",0,360) == 1,"Shock2End")
      Loop
   Shock2End:
      CLAW B 4
      CLAW B 12
      Stop

   Shock3Start:
      CLAW B 0 A_Playsound ("caco/attack")
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,250,1,0) // +2.5% Hellcore Heat, Deal Damage if already above 100% Heat
   Shock3:
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("RainCometNull-Claw",ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",22.5,0,1,0),1,0,0)
      TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",0,360) == 1,"Shock3End")
      Loop
   Shock3End:
      CLAW B 4 
      CLAW B 8 
      Stop

   Shock4:
      CLAW B 0 A_UnSetShootable
      CLAW B 0 A_SetInvulnerable
      TNT1 AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA 0 A_Wander
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,800,1,0) // +8% Hellcore Heat, Deal Damage if already above 100% Heat
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("EscapeExplosion-Claw",0,1,0,0)
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("EscapeExplosion-Claw",0,1,0,0)
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("EscapeExplosion-Claw",0,1,0,0)
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("EscapeExplosion-Claw",0,1,0,0)
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("EscapeExplosion-Claw",0,1,0,0)
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("EscapeExplosion-Claw",0,1,0,0)
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("EscapeExplosion-Claw",0,1,0,0)
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("EscapeExplosion-Claw",0,1,0,0)
      CLAW B 0 A_Mushroom ("Pyroball",128,MSF_DontHurt)
      CLAW B 12
      TNT1 AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA 0 A_Wander // A_ExtChase(0,0,1,1)
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("EscapeExplosion-Claw",0,1,0,0)
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("EscapeExplosion-Claw",0,1,0,0)
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("EscapeExplosion-Claw",0,1,0,0)
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("EscapeExplosion-Claw",0,1,0,0)
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("EscapeExplosion-Claw",0,1,0,0)
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("EscapeExplosion-Claw",0,1,0,0)
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("EscapeExplosion-Claw",0,1,0,0)
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("EscapeExplosion-Claw",0,1,0,0)
      CLAW B 0 A_Mushroom ("Pyroball",128,MSF_DontHurt)
      CLAW B 0 A_UnSetInvulnerable
      CLAW B 0 A_SetShootable
      CLAW B 1
      Goto EndShock // Loop
   EndShock:
      CLAW B 5 A_Light0
      Goto See
   // 10/500 [2%], 80/500 [16%]

   Flash:
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIfInventory("CriticalHealth", 0, "StartShock")
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIfInventory("LowHealth", 0, "StartShockCheck")
   FlashChoose:
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("HellcoreFireMode",1,2) == 0, "Flash1A")
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("HellcoreFireMode",1,2) == 1, "Flash2")
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("HellcoreFireMode",1,2) == 2, "Flash3")
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("HellcoreFireMode",1,2) == 3, "Flash4")
      Stop

   Flash1A:
      CLAW B 0 A_Playsound ("caco/attack")
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,350,1,0) // +3.5% Hellcore Heat, Deal Damage if already above 100% Heat
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("FireShot-Claw",0,1,0,0)
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("FireShot-Claw",-4,1,0,0)
      CLAW B 3 A_FireCustomMissile("FireShot-Claw",4,1,0,0)
      CLAW B 8
      Stop
   Flash1B:
      CLAW B 0 A_Playsound ("caco/attack")
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,350,1,0) // +3.5% Hellcore Heat, Deal Damage if already above 100% Heat
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("FireShot-Claw",0,1,0,0)
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("FireShot-Claw",-4,1,0,0)
      CLAW B 3 A_FireCustomMissile("FireShot-Claw",4,1,0,0)
      CLAW B 12
      Stop

   Flash2:
      CLAW B 0 A_Playsound ("caco/attack")
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,450,1,0) // +4.5% Hellcore Heat, Deal Damage if already above 100% Heat
      CLAW B 4 A_FireCustomMissile("PyroBlast-Claw",0,1,0,0)
      CLAW B 12
      Stop

   Flash3:
      CLAW B 0 A_Playsound ("caco/attack")
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,250,1,0) // +2.5% Hellcore Heat, Deal Damage if already above 100% Heat
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("RainCometNull-Claw",0,1,0,0)
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("RainCometNull-Claw",90,1,0,0)
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("RainCometNull-Claw",180,1,0,0)
      CLAW B 4 A_FireCustomMissile("RainCometNull-Claw",270,1,0,0)
      CLAW B 8
      Stop

   Flash4:
      CLAW B 0 A_UnSetShootable
      CLAW B 0 A_SetInvulnerable
      TNT1 AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA 0 A_Wander
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,800,1,0) // +8% Hellcore Heat, Deal Damage if already above 100% Heat
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("EscapeExplosion-Claw",0,1,0,0)
      CLAW B 0 A_Mushroom ("Pyroball",16,MSF_DontHurt)
      CLAW B 12
      TNT1 AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA 0 A_Wander // A_ExtChase(0,0,1,1)
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("EscapeExplosion-Claw",0,1,0,0)
      CLAW B 0 A_Mushroom ("Pyroball",16,MSF_DontHurt)
      CLAW B 0 A_UnSetInvulnerable
      CLAW B 0 A_SetShootable
      CLAW B 1
      Stop
   } 
}

// Death Incarnate's Skull Weapon - Hellcore Weapon #12 [placeholder sprites]
Actor DIPuff-Claw : DIPuff { DamageType "IncarnateSkull" }
ACTOR IncarnateSkull : Weapon
{
   Scale 0.625
   Tag "Death Incarnate's Skull"
   +FLOATBOB
   +NOAUTOAIM
   +INVENTORY.ALWAYSPICKUP
   +WEAPON.NOALERT
   Inventory.PickupMessage "You got the Death Incarnate's Skull!"
   States
   {
   Spawn:
      HLC2 M 0
      HLC2 M 1 bright ACS_ExecuteAlways(873,0,11,0,0)
      Loop
   Ready: 
      CLAW A 1 A_WeaponReady
      Loop
   Deselect: 
      CLAW A 1 A_Lower
      Loop
   Select: 
      CLAW A 1 A_Raise
      Loop
   Fire: 
      CLAW A 0 A_JumpIfNoAmmo(1)
      CLAW B 4 A_GunFlash
      CLAW CDEF 4
      Goto Ready

   StartShockCheck:
      CLAW B 0 A_Jump(192, "Flash2")
   StartShock:
      CLAW B 0 A_Light2
      CLAW B 0 // A_LightInverse
      CLAW B 0 A_Playsound("monster/incatk")
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,300,1,0) // +3% Hellcore Heat, Deal Damage if already above 100% Heat
   Shock:
      CLAW B 0 A_SetAngle(angle+4)
      CLAW B 0 A_FireBullets(30,0,5,3,"DIPuff-Claw",0,1024)
      CLAW B 0 A_FireBullets(30,0,5,3,"DIPuff-Claw",0,1024)
      CLAW B 0 ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",1)
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",0,90) == 1,"EndShock")
      Loop
   EndShock:
      CLAW B 5 A_Light0
      Goto See
   // 10/500 [2%], 80/500 [16%]

   Flash:
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIfInventory("CriticalHealth", 0, "StartShock")
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIfInventory("LowHealth", 0, "StartShockCheck")
   Flash2: // Flash2:
      CLAW B 0 A_Playsound("monster/incatk")
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,300,1,0) // +3% Hellcore Heat, Deal Damage if already above 100% Heat
      CLAW B 0 A_FireBullets(30,0,5,3,"DIPuff-Claw",0,1024)
      CLAW B 5 A_FireBullets(30,0,5,3,"DIPuff-Claw",0,1024)
      Stop
   } 
}

// Archvile's Hand Weapon - Hellcore Weapon #13 [placeholder sprites]
ACTOR ArchvileHand : Weapon
{
   Tag "Archvile's Hand"
   Scale 0.625
   +FLOATBOB
   +NOAUTOAIM
   +INVENTORY.ALWAYSPICKUP
   +WEAPON.NOALERT
   Inventory.PickupMessage "You got the Archvile's Hand!"
   States
   {
   Spawn:
      HLC2 N 0
      HLC2 N 1 bright ACS_ExecuteAlways(873,0,12,0,0)
      Loop
   Ready: 
      CLAW A 1 A_WeaponReady
      Loop
   Deselect: 
      CLAW A 1 A_Lower
      Loop
   Select: 
      CLAW A 1 A_Raise
      Loop
   Fire: 
      CLAW A 0 A_JumpIfNoAmmo(1)
      CLAW B 4 A_GunFlash
      CLAW CCCDDEEFFF 4
      Goto Ready


   StartShockCheck:
      CLAW B 0 A_Jump(192, "Flash2")
   StartShock:
      CLAW B 0 A_Light2
      CLAW B 0 // A_LightInverse
   Shock:
      CLAW B 1 A_VileChase
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,500,1,0) // +5% Hellcore Heat, Deal Damage if already above 100% Heat
      CLAW B 1 A_VileStart
      CLAW B 4 // A_FaceTarget
      CLAW B 4 A_VileTarget("ArchvileSuperFire")
      CLAW BBBBBB 4 // A_FaceTarget
      CLAW B 4 A_VileAttack("vile/stop",640,2240,560,8.0,"Fire")
      Goto EndShock // Loop
   EndShock:
      CLAW B 10 A_Light0
      Goto See
   // 10/500 [2%], 80/500 [16%]

   Flash:
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIfInventory("CriticalHealth", 0, "StartShock")
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIfInventory("LowHealth", 0, "StartShockCheck")
   Flash2: // Flash2:
      CLAW B 1 A_VileChase
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,500,1,0) // +5% Hellcore Heat, Deal Damage if already above 100% Heat
      CLAW B 1 A_VileStart
      CLAW B 4 // A_FaceTarget
      CLAW B 4 A_VileTarget("ArchvileFire")
      CLAW BBBBBB 4 // A_FaceTarget
      CLAW B 4 A_VileAttack("vile/stop",20,70,70,1.0,"Fire")
   Flash3:
      CLAW B 10
      Stop
   } 
}

actor GravityHPBall : FastProjectile
{
 Damage (0)
 +MISSILE
 +PIERCEARMOR
 +FORCERADIUSDMG
 +FORCEPAIN
 +NODAMAGETHRUST
 +CANNOTPUSH
 +NOTIMEFREEZE
 RenderStyle Add
 DamageType "GravityHP"
 Alpha 0.0
 Speed 255
 Radius 6
 Height 8
 FastSpeed 255
 SeeSound "null"
 DeathSound "null"

 States
 {
  Spawn:
   TNT1 A 0
   TNT1 A 4
   loop
  Death:
   TNT1 A 0 
   TNT1 A 0 A_PlaySound("monster/diagra")
   TNT1 A 0 bright A_SpawnItem("DiabloistGravityHPTargeter")
   stop
 }
}

// Diabloist's Hand Weapon - Hellcore Weapon #14 [placeholder sprites]
Actor DFlare-Claw : DFlare { DamageType "DiabloistHand" }
Actor DTracer-Claw : DTracer { DamageType "DiabloistHand" }
Actor DMissile-Claw : DMissile { DamageType "DiabloistHand" }
Actor DFire-Claw : DFire { DamageType "DiabloistHand" }
Actor DSuperFire-Claw : DSuperFire { DamageType "DiabloistHand" }
ACTOR DiabloistHand : Weapon
{
   Tag "Diabloist's Hand"
   Scale 0.625
   +FLOATBOB
   +NOAUTOAIM
   +INVENTORY.ALWAYSPICKUP
   +WEAPON.NOALERT
   Inventory.PickupMessage "You got the Diabloist's Hand!"
   States
   {
   Spawn:
      HLC2 O 0
      HLC2 O 1 bright ACS_ExecuteAlways(873,0,13,0,0)
      Loop
   Ready: 
      CLAW A 1 A_WeaponReady
      Loop
   Deselect: 
      CLAW A 1 A_Lower
      Loop
   Select: 
      CLAW A 1 A_Raise
      Loop
   Fire: 
      CLAW A 0 A_JumpIfNoAmmo(1)
      CLAW B 4 A_GunFlash
      CLAW CDEF 4
      Goto Ready
   AltFire:
      CLAW A 0 
      CLAW A 0 ACS_NamedExecuteAlways("HellcoreFireMode",0,0,3)
      CLAW A 10
      Goto Ready


   StartShockCheck:
      CLAW B 0 A_Jump(192, "FlashChoose")
   StartShock:
      CLAW B 0 A_Light2
      CLAW B 0 // A_LightInverse
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("HellcoreFireMode",1,3) == 0, "Shock1")
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("HellcoreFireMode",1,3) == 1, "Shock2")
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("HellcoreFireMode",1,3) == 2, "Shock3Start")
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("HellcoreFireMode",1,3) == 3, "Shock4Start")
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("HellcoreFireMode",1,3) == 4, "Shock5Start")
      Stop

   Shock1:
      // Attack Part 1
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,1250,1,0) // +12.5% Hellcore Heat, Deal Damage if already above 100% Heat
      CLAW B 0 BRIGHT A_FireCustomMissile("GravityHPBall")
      CLAW B 12 BRIGHT // A_FaceTarget
      CLAW B 1 A_VileChase
      Stop

   Shock2:
      // Attack Part 2
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,600,1,0) // +6% Hellcore Heat, Deal Damage if already above 100% Heat
      CLAW B 3 // A_FaceTarget
      CLAW B 4 A_VileTarget("DSuperFire-Claw")
      CLAW BBB 6 // A_FaceTarget
      CLAW B 3
      CLAW B 0 A_VileAttack("vile/stop",1280,4480,1120,12.0,"Fire")
      CLAW B 10
      Stop

   Shock3Start:
      // Attack Part 3
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,63,1,0) // +0.63% Hellcore Heat, Deal Damage if already above 100% Heat
   Shock3a:
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("DFlare-Claw",random(-4,4)+ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",9,0,1,0),1,0,0)
      TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",0,360) == 1,"Shock3atoShock3b")
      Loop
   Shock3atoShock3b:
      CLAW B 2
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,63,0,0) // +0.63% Hellcore Heat
   Shock3b:
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("DFlare-Claw",random(-4,4)+ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",9,0,1,0),1,0,0)
      TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",0,360) == 1,"Shock3btoShock3c")
      Loop
   Shock3btoShock3c:
      CLAW B 3
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,63,0,0) // +0.63% Hellcore Heat
   Shock3c:
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("DFlare-Claw",random(-4,4)+ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",9,0,1,0),1,0,0)
      TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",0,360) == 1,"Shock3ctoShock3d")
      Loop
   Shock3ctoShock3d:
      CLAW B 2
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,63,0,0) // +0.63% Hellcore Heat
   Shock3d:
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("DFlare-Claw",random(-4,4)+ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",9,0,1,0),1,0,0)
      TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",0,360) == 1,"Shock3dtoShock3e")
      Loop
   Shock3dtoShock3e:
      CLAW B 3
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,63,0,0) // +0.63% Hellcore Heat
   Shock3e:
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("DFlare-Claw",random(-4,4)+ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",9,0,1,0),1,0,0)
      TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",0,360) == 1,"Shock3etoShock3f")
      Loop
   Shock3etoShock3f:
      CLAW B 2
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,63,0,0) // +0.63% Hellcore Heat
   Shock3f:
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("DFlare-Claw",random(-4,4)+ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",9,0,1,0),1,0,0)
      TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",0,360) == 1,"Shock3ftoShock3g")
      Loop
   Shock3ftoShock3g:
      CLAW B 3
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,63,0,0) // +0.63% Hellcore Heat
   Shock3g:
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("DFlare-Claw",random(-4,4)+ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",9,0,1,0),1,0,0)
      TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",0,360) == 1,"Shock3gtoShock3h")
      Loop
   Shock3gtoShock3h:
      CLAW B 2
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,63,0,0) // +0.63% Hellcore Heat
   Shock3h:
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("DFlare-Claw",random(-4,4)+ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",9,0,1,0),1,0,0)
      TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",0,360) == 1,"Shock3htoShock3i")
      Loop
   Shock3htoShock3i:
      CLAW B 3
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,63,0,0) // +0.63% Hellcore Heat
   Shock3i:
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("DFlare-Claw",random(-4,4)+ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",9,0,1,0),1,0,0)
      TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",0,360) == 1,"Shock3itoShock3j")
      Loop
   Shock3itoShock3j:
      CLAW B 2
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,63,0,0) // +0.63% Hellcore Heat
   Shock3j:
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("DFlare-Claw",random(-4,4)+ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",9,0,1,0),1,0,0)
      TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",0,360) == 1,"Shock3jtoShock3k")
      Loop
   Shock3jtoShock3k:
      CLAW B 3
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,63,0,0) // +0.63% Hellcore Heat
   Shock3k:
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("DFlare-Claw",random(-4,4)+ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",9,0,1,0),1,0,0)
      TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",0,360) == 1,"Shock3ktoShock3l")
      Loop
   Shock3ktoShock3l:
      CLAW B 2
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,63,0,0) // +0.63% Hellcore Heat
   Shock3l:
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("DFlare-Claw",random(-4,4)+ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",9,0,1,0),1,0,0)
      TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",0,360) == 1,"Shock3End")
      Loop
   Shock3End:
      CLAW B 3
      CLAW B 10
      Stop

   Shock4Start:
      // Attack Part 4
      CLAW B 0 BRIGHT A_Playsound ("weapons/firbfi")
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,450,1,0) // +4.5% Hellcore Heat, Deal Damage if already above 100% Heat
   Shock4:
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("DMissile-Claw",0,1,0,0)
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("DMissile-Claw",0,1,0,0)
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("DMissile-Claw",0,1,0,0)
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("DMissile-Claw",0,1,0,0)
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("DMissile-Claw",0,1,0,0)
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("DMissile-Claw",0,1,0,0)
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("DMissile-Claw",0,1,0,0)
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("DMissile-Claw",0,1,0,0)
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("DMissile-Claw",0,1,0,0)
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("DMissile-Claw",0,1,0,0)
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("DMissile-Claw",0,1,0,0)
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("DMissile-Claw",0,1,0,0)
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("DMissile-Claw",0,1,0,0)
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("DMissile-Claw",0,1,0,0)
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("DMissile-Claw",0,1,0,0)
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("DMissile-Claw",0,1,0,0)
   Shock4End:
      CLAW B 3
      CLAW B 2
      CLAW B 8
      Stop

   Shock5Start:
      // Attack Part 5
      CLAW B 0 BRIGHT A_Playsound ("weapons/firbfi")
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,600,1,0) // +6% Hellcore Heat, Deal Damage if already above 100% Heat
   Shock5a:
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("DTracer-Claw",ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",36,0,1,0),1,-40,0)
      TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",0,360) == 1,"Shock5b")
      Loop
   Shock5b:
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("DTracer-Claw",ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",36,0,1,0),1,40,0)
      TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",0,360) == 1,"Shock5End")
      Loop
   Shock5End:
      CLAW B 4
      CLAW B 5
      Goto EndShock // Loop

   EndShock:
      CLAW B 5 A_Light0
      Goto See
   // 10/500 [2%], 80/500 [16%]

   Flash:
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIfInventory("CriticalHealth", 0, "StartShock")
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIfInventory("LowHealth", 0, "StartShockCheck")
   FlashChoose:
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("HellcoreFireMode",1,3) == 0, "Flash1")
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("HellcoreFireMode",1,3) == 1, "Flash2")
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("HellcoreFireMode",1,3) == 2, "Flash3")
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("HellcoreFireMode",1,3) == 3, "Flash4")
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("HellcoreFireMode",1,3) == 4, "Flash5")
      Stop

   Flash1: // Flash2:
      // Attack Part 1
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,1250,1,0) // +12.5% Hellcore Heat, Deal Damage if already above 100% Heat
      CLAW B 0 BRIGHT A_FireCustomMissile("GravityHPBall")
      CLAW B 12 BRIGHT // A_FaceTarget
      CLAW B 1 A_VileChase
      Stop

   Flash2:
      // Attack Part 2
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,600,1,0) // +6% Hellcore Heat, Deal Damage if already above 100% Heat
      CLAW B 3 // A_FaceTarget
      CLAW B 4 A_VileTarget("DFire-Claw")
      CLAW BBB 6 // A_FaceTarget
      CLAW B 3
      CLAW B 0 A_VileAttack("vile/stop",40,140,140,1.5,"Fire")
      CLAW B 10
      Stop

   Flash3:
      // Attack Part 3
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,63,1,0) // +0.63% Hellcore Heat, Deal Damage if already above 100% Heat
      CLAW B 2 A_FireCustomMissile("DFlare-Claw",random(-4,4),1,0,0)
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,63,0,0) // +0.63% Hellcore Heat
      CLAW B 3 A_FireCustomMissile("DFlare-Claw",random(-4,4),1,0,0)
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,63,0,0) // +0.63% Hellcore Heat
      CLAW B 2 A_FireCustomMissile("DFlare-Claw",random(-4,4),1,0,0)
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,63,0,0) // +0.63% Hellcore Heat
      CLAW B 3 A_FireCustomMissile("DFlare-Claw",random(-4,4),1,0,0)
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,63,0,0) // +0.63% Hellcore Heat
      CLAW B 2 A_FireCustomMissile("DFlare-Claw",random(-4,4),1,0,0)
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,63,0,0) // +0.63% Hellcore Heat
      CLAW B 3 A_FireCustomMissile("DFlare-Claw",random(-4,4),1,0,0)
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,63,0,0) // +0.63% Hellcore Heat
      CLAW B 2 A_FireCustomMissile("DFlare-Claw",random(-4,4),1,0,0)
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,63,0,0) // +0.63% Hellcore Heat
      CLAW B 3 A_FireCustomMissile("DFlare-Claw",random(-4,4),1,0,0)
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,63,0,0) // +0.63% Hellcore Heat
      CLAW B 2 A_FireCustomMissile("DFlare-Claw",random(-4,4),1,0,0)
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,63,0,0) // +0.63% Hellcore Heat
      CLAW B 3 A_FireCustomMissile("DFlare-Claw",random(-4,4),1,0,0)
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,63,0,0) // +0.63% Hellcore Heat
      CLAW B 2 A_FireCustomMissile("DFlare-Claw",random(-4,4),1,0,0)
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,63,0,0) // +0.63% Hellcore Heat
      CLAW B 3 A_FireCustomMissile("DFlare-Claw",random(-4,4),1,0,0)
      CLAW B 10
      Stop

   Flash4:
      // Attack Part 4
      CLAW B 0 BRIGHT A_Playsound ("weapons/firbfi")
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,450,1,0) // +4.5% Hellcore Heat, Deal Damage if already above 100% Heat
      CLAW B 3 A_FireCustomMissile("DMissile-Claw",0,1,0,0)
      CLAW B 2
      CLAW B 8
      Stop

   Flash5:
      // Attack Part 5
      CLAW B 0 BRIGHT A_Playsound ("weapons/firbfi")
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,600,1,0) // +6% Hellcore Heat, Deal Damage if already above 100% Heat
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("DTracer-Claw",0,1,-40,0)
      CLAW B 4 A_FireCustomMissile("DTracer-Claw",0,1,40,0)
      CLAW B 5
      Stop
   } 
}
ACTOR DiabloistHandCI : CustomInventory
{
   Scale 0.625
   +FLOATBOB
   +INVENTORY.ALWAYSPICKUP
   Inventory.PickupMessage "You got the Diabloist's Hand!"
   States
   {
    Spawn:
      HLC2 O 0 bright
      HLC2 O 1 bright ACS_ExecuteAlways(873,0,13,0,0)
      Loop
    Pickup:
      TNT1 A 0 
      TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("DiabloistHand", 1)
      TNT1 A 0 A_Playsound("pickuphellcore")
      TNT1 A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(896,0,14,0,0)
      Stop
   }
}


// Fireball Type 1
Actor FlyingBalrogShot1 : Fatshot
{
 Scale 1.25
 DamageType "Fire"
 SeeSound "Imp/Attack"
 Speed 30 // 50% faster
 Damage 12 // 50% stronger
}

Actor WeakenedBalrogShot1 : FlyingBalrogShot1
{
 SeeSound "Imp/Attack"
 Speed 5 // 75% slower
 Damage 2 // 75% weaker
}

// Fireball Type 2
Actor FlyingBalrogShot2 : RevenantTracer
{
 Scale 1.25
 DamageType "Fire"
 SeeSound "Imp/Attack"
 Speed 15 // 50% faster
 Damage 15 // 50% stronger
}

Actor WeakenedBalrogShot2 : FlyingBalrogShot2
{
 SeeSound "Imp/Attack"
 Speed 3 // 75% slower
 Damage 3 // 75% weaker
}

// Flying Balrog's Fist Weapon - Hellcore Weapon #15 [placeholder sprites]
Actor FlyingBalrogShot1-Claw : FlyingBalrogShot1 { DamageType "BalrogFist" }
Actor FlyingBalrogShot2-Claw : FlyingBalrogShot2 { DamageType "BalrogFist" }
ACTOR BalrogFist : Weapon
{
   Scale 0.625
   Tag "Flying Balrog's Fist"
   +FLOATBOB
   +NOAUTOAIM
   +INVENTORY.ALWAYSPICKUP
   +WEAPON.NOALERT
   Inventory.PickupMessage "You got the Flying Balrog's Fist!"
   States
   {
   Spawn:
      HLC2 L 0
      HLC2 L 1 bright ACS_ExecuteAlways(873,0,14,0,0)
      Loop
   Ready: 
      CLAW A 1 A_WeaponReady
      Loop
   Deselect: 
      CLAW A 1 A_Lower
      Loop
   Select: 
      CLAW A 1 A_Raise
      Loop
   Fire: 
      CLAW A 0 A_JumpIfNoAmmo(1)
      CLAW B 4 A_GunFlash
      CLAW CDEF 4
      Goto Ready

   StartShockCheck:
      CLAW B 0 A_Jump(192, "Flash2")
   StartShock:
      CLAW B 0 A_Light2
      CLAW B 0 // A_LightInverse
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,600,1,0) // +6% Hellcore Heat, Deal Damage if already above 100% Heat
   Shock1a:
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("FlyingBalrogShot1-Claw",random(-4,4)+ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",6,0,1,15),1,12,0)
      TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",0,360) == 1,"Shock1b")
      Loop
   Shock1b:
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("FlyingBalrogShot1-Claw",random(-4,4)+ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",6,0,1,0),1,0,0)
      TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",0,360) == 1,"Shock1c")
      Loop
   Shock1c:
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("FlyingBalrogShot1-Claw",random(-4,4)+ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",6,0,1,-15),1,-12,0)
      TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",0,360) == 1,"Shock1End")
      Loop
   Shock1End:
      CLAW B 1 

   Shock2a:
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("FlyingBalrogShot1-Claw",random(-4,4)+ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",6,0,1,10),1,8,0)
      TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",0,360) == 1,"Shock2b")
      Loop
   Shock2b:
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("FlyingBalrogShot1-Claw",random(-4,4)+ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",6,0,1,-10),1,-8,0)
      TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",0,360) == 1,"Shock2End")
      Loop
   Shock2End:
      CLAW B 3 

   Shock3a:
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("FlyingBalrogShot2-Claw",random(-4,4)+ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",6,0,1,9),1,6,0)
      TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",0,360) == 1,"Shock3b")
      Loop
   Shock3b:
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("FlyingBalrogShot2-Claw",random(-4,4)+ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",6,0,1,0),1,0,0)
      TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",0,360) == 1,"Shock3c")
      Loop
   Shock3c:
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("FlyingBalrogShot2-Claw",random(-4,4)+ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",6,0,1,-9),1,-6,0)
      TNT1 A 0 A_JumpIf(ACS_NamedExecuteWithResult("WeaponAngleLoop",0,360) == 1,"Shock3End")
      Loop
   Shock3End:
      CLAW B 4 
      Goto EndShock // Loop
   EndShock:
      CLAW B 8 A_Light0
      Goto See
   // 10/500 [2%], 80/500 [16%]

   Flash:
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIfInventory("CriticalHealth", 0, "StartShock")
      CLAW B 0 A_JumpIfInventory("LowHealth", 0, "StartShockCheck")
   Flash2: // Flash2:
      CLAW B 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(868,0,600,1,0) // +6% Hellcore Heat, Deal Damage if already above 100% Heat
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("FlyingBalrogShot1-Claw",15,1,12,0)
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("FlyingBalrogShot1-Claw",0,1,0,0)
      CLAW B 1 A_FireCustomMissile("FlyingBalrogShot1-Claw",-15,1,-12,0)

      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("FlyingBalrogShot1-Claw",10,1,8,0)
      CLAW B 3 A_FireCustomMissile("FlyingBalrogShot1-Claw",-10,1,-8,0)

      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("FlyingBalrogShot2-Claw",9,1,6,0)
      CLAW B 0 A_FireCustomMissile("FlyingBalrogShot2-Claw",0,1,0,0)
      CLAW B 4 A_FireCustomMissile("FlyingBalrogShot2-Claw",-9,1,-6,0)
      CLAW B 8
      Stop

   } 
}
ACTOR BalrogFistCI : CustomInventory
{
   Scale 0.625
   +FLOATBOB
   +INVENTORY.ALWAYSPICKUP
   Inventory.PickupMessage "You got the Flying Balrog's Fist!"
   States
   {
    Spawn:
      HLC2 L 0 bright
      HLC2 L 1 bright ACS_ExecuteAlways(873,0,14,0,0)
      Loop
    Pickup:
      TNT1 A 0 
      TNT1 A 0 A_GiveInventory("BalrogFist", 1)
      TNT1 A 0 A_Playsound("pickuphellcore")
      TNT1 A 0 ACS_ExecuteAlways(896,0,15,0,0)
      Stop
   }
}
